item.text: yum gzungs ma'i dngos grub chen po'i rgyud bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ ka ma la de bI sid+d+hi ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ yum gzungs ma'i dngos grub chen po'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tsha lo// sngon 'das pa'i
dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol na/ ri rab ri'i rtse lha g.yung drung gi gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dpal he ru kas/ srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga la
shar bar mkhyen nas/ yum chen mo nyid bzhi mu kha le'i mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong nas/ thig le chen po'i tshul du bzhengs te/ rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ hUM dkar po zhig
las/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du rgyun mi 'chad par bkye ba las/ yum chen mo nyid bzhi mu kha le'i b+ha ga la dgyes pa chen por thim par mdzad do// yum chen mo nyid bzhi mu kha
le dgyes pa chen por thim nas// pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas par mdzad do// pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas par mdzad pas stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par mdzad do// stong
gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rak+tar chags pa thams cad g.yos par gyur to// des srid pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdo rjer gyur pa thams cad rdo rje'i rtsa ba btegs par gyur te/
chags pa'i sems g.yos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar skyes nas// rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs kyis chags pa'i gzhi mo ga la bder dong ngo// dong nas b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor chags pa'i nang
du phyin te/ sdangs ldang yang nas gus pas bskor te phyag 'tshal ba ni/ g.yung drung lha'i gtso bo/ gnod 'dul lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha g.yung drung gi tshogs dang/ g.yung drung

lha'i rgyal mo/ srid pa'i phra men rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ ma mo bcu bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang/ srid pa sman mo'i rigs/ lha mo tshogs kyi rje mo la sogs pa/ sman mo'i tshogs thams cad dang/ gzhan yang pad+ma b+ha ga

la sogs pa thams cad chags pa'i mdangs byung nas bskor zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bstod pa bgyis pa las yum chen mo nyid bzhi mu kha le'i b+ha ga las/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal la sogs te/ ye
shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i dkyil 'khor thon par gyur to// de nas yum chen mos bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la gzigs te/ spyan gyis brda zhig mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa phyung ba dang/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das yum gyi b+ha ga la sku phyed nub tsam du bzhengs te/ rnam par thar pa'i dbus gsum du phyung nas/ g.yung drung lha'i rgyal po lha gnod 'dul la gzigs nas/ 'dzum par mdzad pa dang/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lha gnod 'dul stan la 'dug par 'gyur te/ de nas chags pa'i yid can/ de dag thams cad phyogs phyogs su gnas par gyur to// de nas yum
chen mo'i lha gnod 'dul la gzigs nas/ ljags kyis brda zhig mdzad pa las/ de nas lha gnod 'dul stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du brkyang phyag 'tshal zhing/ bag bzhi sa la
brdabs nas gsol pa/ 'byung lnga la sogs pa yi// me la sogs pa ji ltar 'byung// srid pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na// pho dang mo yi mtshan nyid ni// thabs dang shes rab su

las gyis// sems nyid rtag chad ci la bgyi// ye shes lnga nyid gang nas shar// sprul pa mang po gang nas shar// skye med chos dbyings ci la zer// yum gyi mkha' zhes ji lta bu// mngal la sogs pa mi 'tshal

na// blang dor med pa gang gis sgrub// srid pa'i bca' gzhi ji snyed kun// rabs rgyud rtsa ba ci ltar lags// dam tshig lung nod mchi ba'i tshe// srog las drang na ji ltar lags// 'jig rten 'dir sgrub ji ltar
bskul// dus min 'chi ba gang gis bskang// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// rnal

'byor rnams kyi las dbang mchog/ ma mo rnams kyi gtan tshigs su// srid pa kun gyi bca' gzhi rnams// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya'o// de la da ni ma mo bcu bzhi'i rje mo bshad par bya ste// yum chen mo

nyid bzhi mu kha le zhes bya ba sku'i khyon da ltar gyi ri rab gling bzhi tsam yod pa/ dbu gcig la zhal rnam pa lngar snang ba/ phyag bzhi pa zhabs rnam pa brgyad du bstan pa/ tsit+ta rtsa ba gcig la rtse mo rnam pa lngar

'bar ba/ shar phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na gsang ba'i mkha' grang la 'dred pa/ shel gyi b+ha ga la rdo rje'i ge sar can no// lho phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na/ gsang ba'i mkha' dro la 'jam pa/ ke ke

ru'i b+ha ga la rin po che'i ge sar can no// nub phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na/ gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la rlan pa/ pad+ma'i b+ha ga la byi ru'i ge sar can no// byang phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na/ gsang

ba'i mkha' rtsub la grang ba ste/ ge sar gyi dpal can no// de ltar mkha' bzhis sku la brgyan pa/ mkha' bzhis klong sku gting khung du sdud pa ni g.yu'i bde klong la chags pa'i ge sar can no// zangs kyi pad+ma

'dab ma stong dang ldan pa gcig yod de/ de la zhal rnam pa lnga la/ shar phyogs kyi zhal dkar la 'tsher ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ shel gyi rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin pas/ 'byung ba sar byin gyis brlabs te/
rdo rje'i rigs su gyur to// lho phyogs kyi zhal sngo la gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ ke ke ru 'bar ba dgu 'dzin pas/ 'byung ba med byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i rigs su gyur to// nub

phyogs kyi zhal dmar la gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ pad+ma dgu brtsegs bzung bas/ 'byung ba chur byin gyis brlabs pa pad+ma'i rigs su gyur to/ byang phyogs zhal ljang la gdangs pa/ mche ba
gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ rdo rje rgya gram dgu brtsegs bzung bas/ 'byung ba rlung du byin gyis brlabs te/ las kyi rigs su gyur to/ dkyil gyi zhal cir yang 'gyur ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang

nas/ gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa bzung bas/ nam mkhar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su gyur to/ 'byung ba lnga yang de ltar bskyed do// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas der byung

ngo// zhal so so yin pas na ral pa so so'i rigs dang ldan par snang ngo// tsit+ta gcig la rtse mo lngar snang ba yang/ rtse mo lnga las rigs lnga'i ye shes lnga yang de las shar to// rtsa ba gcig la chos skye ba med pa'i

dbyings kyang de las 'dus te/ mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang grags so// rtse mo lngar 'bar ba las srog gis bsdus pa'i kun gzhi la sogs pa'i dran pa thams cad kyang de las byung ba'o// rtsa ba gcig
las sems can gyi sems rtag pa chen po yang de las byung ngo// de la mkha' bzhi las shar phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' grang la 'dred pas/ dgun du byin gyis brlabs so// byang phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha'

rtsub la grang bas/ dpyid du byin gyis brlabs so// nub phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la rlan pas dbyar du byin gyis brlabs so// lho phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' dro la 'jam pa ni/ ston du byin gyis

brlabs so// dus bzhi yang de ltar cha bsnyams so// sku stod kyi zhal nas 'byung ba rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams/ sku smad gsang ba'i b+ha ga la/ sbyor ba'i tshul du sku phyed nub tsam du bzhugs pas/ skye ba rigs

so so yang der 'dus so/ phyag bzhi la g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis khol mo bcu bzhi'i gtso mo srid pa bde 'gro ma dang/ nyi zla thod phreng ma gnyis kyi tsit+ta bzung ba/ g.yas g.yon tha ma gnyis kyis khros

pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i snying nas bzung ba/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la longs spyod mngon du mdzad pa/ zhabs brgyad kyis dbyings phyug ma bzhi dang/ thugs kyi dgyes sde chen mo bzhi'i snying
ga nas brdzis pa/ dbus kyi zhal dpral ba'i dbyes nas/ mi gzur gsum pa gcig gis bltas pas/ ma mo bcu bzhi'i khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang/ shan shan ne'u dang/ e ka tsa ti la sogs pa 'dar

lcug lcug byed pa/ dkyil gyi zhal nas rkan sgra brdabs pas/ he ru ka snil sogs pa ste/ srid pa'i dman mo la sogs pa'i snying rtsar gyis 'byin pa ste ma mo dbang du yang des sdud do// dbus kyi zhal gyi ni

mkha' yel yel bar rdzogs pas/ srid pa gsum gyi gtso mo yang der rdzogs so// sku gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong zhes bya'o// sku rtag pa chen po g.yung drung du bzhugs pas/ skye shi
las 'das pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la blang dor med pas kun tu bzang mo zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad

kyi bcud len pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya'o// 'byung ba lnga sku la rdzogs pas/ 'byung ba'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya'o// dus bzhi dbyings las shar bas dus bzhi cha snyoms ma zhes kyang de la

bya'o// sku stod nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams/ sku smad gsang ba'i b+ha ga la rdubs bzhugs pas/ rigs kyi yum zhes kyang bya'o// sbas pa'i phyag gnyis nas bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i bcud 'dzag pa

mngon sum du mdzad pas/ bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya'o// snang srid thams cad gtan yang chom la 'bebs pas/ srid pa'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya'o// sku lus gcig la mtshan dgu ma zhes bya'o// de la thugs

las drangs pa'i snying po ni/ nyid bzhi mu kha le/ kro d+hI shwa rI/ b+ha ga pad+ma r+ya/ bde klong 'dus 'dus na snying dza sha yu ti hUM b+h+yo/ zhes bya'o// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms pa ni/ dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin

gsal bar bsgom la thugs ka nas yi ge oM dkar po gcig la/ ye shes lnga'i gzhal med khang/ chos kyi dbyings ltar khyab brdal ba'i dbyings su/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ snying
gar mu kha le las/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo bsgom mig g.yas par ha las mkha' 'gro ma rnam snang gsal sgom/ mig g.yon par ha las mkha' 'gro ma 'od gsal 'bar bsgom// rna ba g.yas pa la ha las
mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal 'bar ma bsgom/ rna ba g.yon pa ha las mkha' 'gro ma yang gsal g.yos bsgom/ sna la ha las mkha' gro ma bkrag gsal mnyam bsgom/ sku mdog phyag mtshan ni 'og gi tshig bshad

dang sbyar ro// yang ma mo zhes bya ba ni// ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi yab// mo ni snang srid kun gyis ma// ma ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma ni thabs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes

rab chags med klong// de lta bu yi yum chen mo// sku stod zhal nas 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang/ sku smad kyi b+ha ga sbyor ba mdzad pa'i bu mo lnga yod de/ gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal zhes bya ste/
mdog dkar mo la shel gyi ral pa can/ gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyi ga'u 'khyil ba/ ma chags pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar zhes bya ste/ sku mdog sngon po la rin po
che'i ral pa can no// gsang ba'i mkha' la rin po che'i ga'ur 'khyil ba/ mi len pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma zhes bya ste/ sku mdog dmar po byi ru'i lan phran can/
gsang ba'i mkha' byi ru'i ga 'ur bskyil ba/ gnyis su med pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsang g.yos zhes bya ste/ sku mdog ljang gu la rdo rje'i len phran can
no// gsang ba'i mkha' rdo rje'i ga 'ur bskyil ba/ grub pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam zhes bya ste/ sku mdog cir yang 'gyur ba la g.yu'i ral pa can no// gsang

ba'i mkha' g.yu'i ga 'ur bskyil ba/ gnyis med brten pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// 'di lnga ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi yum lnga zhes bya ba 'di lnga yin/ sems can dus chen po la 'bab

yang 'di lngas dbang byed de/ tshe'i bdag mo chen mo yang 'di lnga yin no// srog las drangs pa'i snying po ni/ g+hi sa mu ran hUM ha/ tra la pa raM ha/ bi sha san ti ha/ bi yaM yaM ti ha/ ma hA laM te ha/ ma mo rnams kyi gtso
mo'i yang gtso mo/ gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang// bdag nyid phyag rgyar bskyed bya ba// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i
mtshan nyid las// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan

nyid las// ji ltar dkyil 'khor lha bskyed pa// ngas bstan pa la gdon mi za// nyon cig gdon 'dul lha yi gtso// 'byung ba spro ba'i ngo bo dang// 'jug pa bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// sa bon gyis ni bstan par
bya// bdag nyid thig le mnyam sbyar ni// rnam gsum rim gyis ting 'dzin bsgom// dmigs med ting 'dzin rnam dag cing// skye med chos kyi dbyings su thim// dmigs med ma chags sa bon gyis// de bzhin

nyid du rnam par grags// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo la// blang dor med par snang ba ni// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// kun tu snang zhes grags pa yin// bdag nyid rlung las gyur pa yi// 'og gi phyogs su
sa bon brtan// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// de yi steng du sa bon brtan// bdag gi sa las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni spris mar brtan// bdag gi me las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni drod du ldan// bdag
gi nam mkha'i ngo bo la// sa bon las ni snang srid bsgom// dbyings las 'byung lngas rgyu bskyed de// mkha' la rlung brten 'gro lngar ldan// bdag nyid hUM du gsal ba las// sa bon gyis ni dkyil 'khor

bsgom// 'khor lo'i sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad pa ru rnam par gsal// gdan gyi sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad steng du bcu bzhi bskyel// dkyil du rgya mtshor thod phreng gnyis// shar
dang nub tu mgo bsnol pa'o// sgrol byed dkar mo mig gcig gnyis// brgya byin phyogs su mgo bsnol pa'o// dbang sdud nag mo ral gcig gnyis// gshin rje'i phyogs su mgo bsnol

ba'o// bdud rtsi byed dang ma mo gnyis// chu bdag phyogs su mgo bsnol pa'o// gnas sbrul ser mo las mkhan gnyis// gnod sbyin phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o// rgyan gyi rgyal mo me lha'i phyogs// dbyings phyug
ma ni bden bral phyogs/ bdag nyid ma ni rlung lha'i phyogs// gcig pu ma ni dbang ldan phyogs// rim gro skye phyir 'khor rnams bsgyel// b+ha ga bcu bzhi'i gdan steng nas// bdag nyid byang chub thig le

las// snying po ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun tu bzang// rnam par thar pa'i dbur ldan zhing// ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs kyis

bzhugs// bdag gi gzugs kyi ngo bo la// rnal 'byor nyid gzhi bde mchog ma// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtag pa thugs kyi dkyil// 'od zer lnga po rtse nas 'phro// 'byung ba lnga yi zhal mnga'

zhing// ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyis// ma gshegs par ni srid par byon// dus bzhi 'char ba'i b+ha ga las// skye ba med pa'i klong du thim// srid pa gsum gyis

sku brgyan cing// spyi dpal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// hUM ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi dpal// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' klong kun gyi gter lags kyi// mkha'
klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro yongs kyi thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas yongs kyi re skong phyir// thar lam bde ba'i lam mchog ni// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags na// dgyes pa'i rdo rje gsor

nas kyang// re skong bdud rtsi'i char chen phob// ho// hUM mnyam bzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// 'byung gnas skye 'gro thar pa'i lam// rin chen dkyil 'jam klong yangs su// spyi dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i
gter// re skong bdud rtsi'i char chen phob// ho// hUM b+ha ga pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dab brgyad sa yi dkyil 'khor ldan// phyi lcags nang rten sgo 'phar bcas// rin chen dkyil 'jam gdan steng
nas// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// lcags dkrol gdan phye gdan la bzhugs// rin chen brtsegs pa'i ga'u ru// bla med khrag 'thung sku bsil nas// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// srid gsum 'gro

ba'i bag chags bkrus// hUM mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa che// ma chags pa la chags pa bde// thar lam bde ba b+ha ga'i dbyings// blang dor med pa'i klong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags bkru ba'i phyir// spyi
dpal bla na med pa yis// gsang ba'i don ldan lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas// ye shes chu bos khrus chen mdzod// A+oM thabs las dbyings byung thar pa'i lam// dbyings las thabs

bzhengs bla med sku// bla med dbyings dang ye shes sbyor ba na// bdud rtsi chen po'i char chen srid par spro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchod par spro// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro skong ba'i tshogs su spro// 'gro

ba rigs drug sgrib ba sbyong ba'i phyag rgya chen por spro// mu stegs bdud 'dul khro rgyal tshogs su spro// sdug bsngal za byed bdud rtsi'i char chen spro// dbang po gsal byed ye shes sgron mar spro// 'dod chags

tshims byed gsang ba'i sems su spro// ho// hUM byang chub sems kyi thig le las// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pa na// thams cad thig le nyid kyi ngang// zhes glengs te// gnyis su med par gyur to// gnyis med
sbyor ba'i thig le che// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'od zer las// 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du byung// bdag gi sa yi ngo bo las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro brtan 'bar sems ma'i mchog/ mi
'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgo 'byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dang ba'i na bza'
gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ thogs

pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig ler sgo 'byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sby-in pa chen po rtag tu gtong// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang gu bai DUr+ya// rdzu 'phrul

bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// gnod sby-in gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rol pa chen po'i dbu gsum gyis// dug
gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las/ sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dmar po dbang gi na bzas brgyan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi
zhabs dag gis// chu bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi me las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro 'od gsal sems ma'i mchog/ stobs ldan mchog gi dbu gsum

gyis// srid gsum thig le'i sgo 'byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// rin chen sngon po'i na bzas brgyan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs
dag gis// gshin rje gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi bsreg las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'gyur ba yi dbu

gsum la// skye 'gro mkha' la sgo 'byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// mi bzad pa yi sbyin pa gtong// cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// btso ma gser gyi na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs
dag gis// brgya byin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi gsang ba'i thig le las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// bla na med pa'i yab yum gnyis// sbyor ba'i gdan du drug po 'ding// bdag gi

'od chen sna tshogs las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// dpal 'bar khro mo nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dngas ma bzhi po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// gsang ba'i yum bzhi nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dngas
ma brgyad po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// khams gsum brdar gcod nyid kyi sku// bdag gi bde chen gsang ba las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// dug gsum dbang sdud nyid kyi sku// bdag gi

dpag bsam shing bu las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// skye shi rtsad gcod nyid kyi sku// bdag gi zangs kyi sbu gu las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// pad+me shwa rI dbang gi sku// bdag gi srid pa'i mdo

bsdus pa'i// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// yag sha khro mchog nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dbang mo mdo bsdus las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// rag sha kro tI shwa rI'i sku// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab

las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// kro tI shwa rI sa ma ya// bdag gi srid pa 'jug byed pa'i// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// g+hu ya kro tI shwa rI'i sku// de ltar rtag tu bsgom pa ni// byed pa po dang bya ba

mo// pha ma med pa'i pho mo gnyis// srid pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// sangs rgyas nyid las shin tu bgres// lnga las gyur pa'i bud med lnga// gnyen med skyid pa'i g.yung drung yin// bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum
ni// cir mi 'ong gi spun drug ste// rus med spun drug bcu gsum yin// mtshon du med pa'i nam mkha' la// gza' skar mang po shar ba ltar// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// rol pa'i phyag rgya cir yang

snang// skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su thim// gsang chen bde ba'i thig le las// b+ha ga'i steng du ling+ga spro// rtse nas thim zhing dkyila'akhor spro// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i bca'
gzhi/ sbas pa'i thig le'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// skye 'gro sems can thams cad kun// rnam rtog nad kyi zin pa la// bdud rtsi'i sman chen ji ltar gtong// ngo
mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// bla med dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// rtog pa'i nad gzhil sman chen po// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// nyon cig g.yung

drung yang dag pa// rgyu gcig dang ni rkyen gnyis las// sa bon las ni rnam sbyangs pa// spro bsdu byas pas dri mchog 'gyur// dug gsum nad kyi gnyen po yin// rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gsum las// sa bon gyis

ni rnam sbyangs pa// spro bsdu du bar 'thul bas ni// nyon mongs lnga yi nad rnams 'byang// rgyu gsum dang ni rkyen lnga las// sa bon gyis ni yang dag sbyangs// spro bsdu g.yos par 'gyur pa la// rnam shes brgyad ni
kun tu rgyu// 'jug pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed// bdag gi dri ma chen po la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pa// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis ldan// dngos grub chen po gti mug yin// bdag gi mAM sa chen po
la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pas// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis ldan// dngos grub chen po nga rgyal yin// bdag gi khrag las gyur pa yi// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pa// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis
ldan// dngos grub chen po 'dod chags yin// bdag gi dri chu las gyur pa// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pa// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis ldan// dngos grub chen po phrag dog yin// bdag gi gsang ba'i sa bon
la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis ldan// dngos grub chen po zhe sdang yin// kun 'dus gcig tu gyur pa dang// phra mo stong dang sbom po brgyad// bsdus la gong bur dril ba

las// bsdu ba'i sngags kyis rnam sbyangs te// spro bsdus 'od du 'bar ba ni// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya yis// zos na dpal chen dngos grub thob// mkha' 'gro ma rnams bkur stir byed// rgyu gsum rkyen

lnga'i bdud rtsi chen po ste// snang ba chen po snang srid 'char ba'i rgyu// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas te// mkha' 'gro dam can kun gyi srog gi rgyu// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po'i 'byung gnas yin// rang

byung rnam dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// bdud rtsi chen po stong pa nyid bzhugs pas// dug gsum rnam rtog gnad kyi gnyen po yin// theg chen sa gzhi chen po las// rtsi mchog mang po kun skyes te// skye 'gro'i
gsos su gyur pa ltar// bdag nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor las// srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can kun// rnam rtog nad kyi gsos su che// rgyu gsum rkyen lnga'i bdud rtsi ste// ma rig brgyal ba'i dong zhes
bya// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa dang/ 'khor der 'dus pa rnams/ bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyis gtan du tshim nas/ lang tsho'i dngos grub thob
bo// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun// 'dod chags kyis ni khams gsum 'khor// zhe sdang gis ni ngan song lhung// de las nan tan ji ltar bgyi// nyag
gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar chags sdang rnam pa gnyis// dngos grub chen por ngas bshad kyi// nyon cig g.yung drung

yang dag pa// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// pha dang phu bo mes po dang// lha dang bram ze mu stegs dang// bran dang g.yog po la sogs pa'i// zhing bcu rtag tu ldan pa la// phung po bsad de snying phyung
na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// bran mo g.yog mo la sogs te// gdol pa mo dang phyal ba

dang// tshul dgur sbyar na dngos grub thob// ces bka' stsal pa dang/ lha g.yung drung la sogs pa ya mtshan du gyur nas/ dngangs te cang mi smra ba dang/ 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs

te// ye shes bzhi'i brkyang phyag phyogs bzhir btsal nas/ bag bzhi sa la brdabs te/ lus brkyang nas/ rgyal ba rdzogs pa'i zhabs spyi bor blangs te/ dngos grub myur du 'dod pa'i phyir/ phyag rgya bcas nas

gsol ba/ pha dang nye ba'i zhing bcu dag/ bsad na dngos grub thob pa yi// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// ma dang nye ba phyal pa dag/ sbyar na dngos grub thob pa yi// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin
gyis// dngos grub chen po bdag 'tshal na// spyi dpal chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus te// lus sa la lan stong du brdabs pa dang// srid pa dus thams cad gcig tu g.yos te// 'khor thams cad dus

gcig tu khams 'khrugs nas thams cad bag bzhi sa la rdebs shing ya mtshan no// spyi dpal chen po ya mtshan no// rdo rje sems dpa' ya mtshan no// zhes mgrin gcig tu smras nas/ pad+ma kha 'bus pa ltar sor
bcu spyi bo la blangs te/ mig mi ldog par mngon rdzogs rgyal po la rtog go/ de nas de lta bu'i spyod pa thugs su gsol nas/ 'khor thams cad la dgyes pa'i ye shes kyi mdangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal

pa// rdo rje'i 'khor gdung ba dang// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa legs// kun kyang dran pa gnas su sdus// srid pa thams cad bde la bkod// ngas kyang bdud rtsi'i snying po

sbyin// 'du na sa ma ya lhan s+t+waM// zhes gsung pa las// 'khor thams cad sems rnal du phebs so// srid pa thams cad dus gcig tu bde/ rna ba'i dbangapo blags nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i rjes su
zhugs nas 'khor kun nyan to// de nas spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ gnyen sdug dang ni zhing bcu la// bsad pa'i phyir na zhe sdang bsgom// sbyang ba gsum gyi sa bon gyis// sbyangs na srid

pa'i bag chags 'byang// lnga yi tshom bu'i sa bon gyis// sgo lnga bcad na 'chor ba med// snying brtse ba yi shugs dag gis// bsdus nas rgyal ba'i ril bu sbyin// sgo 'byed pa yi sa bon gyis// b+ho d+hi tsit+ta'i sgo phyes

nas// rna brgyud byin pas sems bzhu ste// ma mas yang kyang shar bzlog pa'i sa bon gyis// spros te 'bru bcu'i snying po sbyin// chu dang 'o ma bsres pa bzhin// mya ngan zlo ba'i phyag rgya yis// bcings nas bde

skyid g.yung drung sbyin// rkyen lnga'i sgo 'byed sa bon gyis// ri rab chen po'i sgo phye ste// lha mo lnga yi phyag rgya yis// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bsdams nas su// rgyu gcig dbyings nas byung nas ni// mtshams su sbyong
ba'i sa bon gyis// ye shes g.yung drung brdal ba las// spyi dpal chen pos mtshams sbyar nas// gser dang dngul du bsres pa bzhin// sdig pa byas kyang ye shes 'bar// yang na dkyil 'khor gsal bkram

ste// phung po mngon spyod lha la mchod// rtsa ba gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// sras su bskyed na bsod nams mchog/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yis// srid pa'i bud shing sreg pa
ltar// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba yis// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags bsreg/ me la shing ni bsnan pa ltar// sdig pa byas kyang ye shes 'bar// ma dang srin mo phyal pa dang// sbyor ba'i phyir ni 'dod chags

bsgom// lnga yi sa bon rnam lnga las// gcig la lnga lngar tshom bur sbyor// lam du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// b+ha ga la ni 'dab ma brgyad// gdan du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// klong la 'khor lo rtsibs su bcas// las kyi

sa bon g.yas g.yon gyi// dbu la mkha' 'gro lnga po nyid/ dril bu'i sa bon rkang mthil la// zhags pa'i sa bon lag gnyis la'o// bdag nyid snying po'i brtan pa'i sku// gnas lnga ral gri'i sa bon lnga// gcig
la mkha' 'gro lnga lngas bskor// 'dren pa'i sa bon sgal tshigs la// dgyes pa'i sa bon g.yas dang g.yon// bstim pa'i sa bon gsang ba la// lcags kyu'i sa bon rkang gnyis la// lcags sgrog sa bon lag

gnyis la// bskyod pa'i sa bon mtshams su ste// spros nas gnyis su med pa'i tshe// spros nas mtshams su spros bstim ste// mchod pa bzhi yi sa bon gyis// stong khams bkang ste mnyes mchod la// rigs drug
'gro ba'i sdig sbyongs nas// 'jug pa'i sa bon chen po yis// bsdus nas kun bzang mkha' la bstim// gting dpag med pa'i rgya mtsho las// chu bran mtha' dag 'du ba ltar// bya byed gnyis kyi klong dkyil
du// ma sring la sogs klu mo dang// gdol pa rigs ngan phyal pa la// tshul dgur sbyar na bsod nams mchog/ ces bka' stsal pas/ 'khor thams cad chags sdang gi dngos grub thob// ta na ga
Na'i bca' gzhi'o// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// mngon spyod mchod pa chen po ste// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// spyi dpal mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rgyal

po bde bas bka' stsal pa// de phyir nyon cig rdo rje sems// mngon spyod mchod pa sna tshogs te// bdag nyid mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor ldan// rgyan dang bgo ba'i longs spyod la// 'dom gang 'od kyi sa bon

gyis// sbyangs na dkyil 'khor mnyes pa yi// bza' dang bca' ba'i longs spyod la// sreg pa'i sa bon mthar bzhag la// bdud rtsi'i sa bon mchod sbyangs te// mnyes shing dgyes pa'i longs spyod kyis// mchod

cing zos na dkyil 'khor mnyes// btung bas tshim pa'i longs spyod la// sreg pa'i sa bon gyis sbyangs te// chu yi sa bon chen po yis// sbyangs te 'thung na dkyil 'khor mnyes// phar btab pa dang tshur len

pa// pho dang mo yi sa bon gyis// sbyangs na thabs dang shes rab thob// mchod pa 'od kyi sa bon spro// rtags ka dang ni ta to ta lo la/ dang// thabs dang shes rab sa bon gyis// sbyangs na sdig sbyang nyes pa

med// 'di ltar byas na 'phags pa mnyes// mngon spyod mchod pa chen po yin/ chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med ste// dngos med yi ge stong pas sbyangs// stong nyid stong pa ye nas dben// spros pa'i snod kyang
dngos kyis stong// rnam par smin pa stong pas med// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// gdod nas stong pa'i 'bras bu len// rtogs pas stong pa'i 'bras bu len// legs dang nyes pa gnyis su med// thig le chen po
len pa med// gdod nas legs pa'i rgyal po yin// de skad bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa/ 'khor kun phun sum tshogs pa kun/ stong pa'i 'bras bu la sems mi
yengs par rtogs so// de nas lha gdod 'dul stan las langs te/ spyi dpal chen po'i zhabs la 'jus nas/ mos pa chen pos gsol pa/ dgongs shig ye shes bde chen lha// srid pa 'khrug pa'i rtog pa
yis// sems kyi 'khrul pa ci mchis pa// zhabs la spyi bos gtug gyur nas// stong pa chen por bzod par gsol// 'bras bu chen por bzod par gsol// byang chub chen por bzod par gsol// thig le
chen por bzod par gsol// de nas mi dmigs pa'i tshangs pa chen po thob bo// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' de langs nas sku la sbrul bzhin 'khril te/ mdzes pa chen pos mchod pa byas// phyi dbang chen po
bdag la stsol// nang dbang chen po bdag la stsol// gsang dbang chen po bdag la stsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// nga yi gsang rgyud
chen po 'di// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad la/ gsang ba 'di las mi mnga' bas// gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang ba'i gter// gsang ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la gtad// 'gro

ba kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nga yi spyod pa mtha' dag dang// nga yi byin rlabs chen po rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyis zung// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// gsang ba kun gyi byed pa po// gsang ba'i

gsang chen gsang ba'i bdag/ sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba'i// gsang ba'i dpal du dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ste// rnal 'byor kun la bde sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyis

zung// g+hu ya ma hA rA dza sa ma ya a la la ho// zhes gnang ba dang/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' des/ rgyan dang cha lugs kun bkrol te// spyi dpal mchog la mngon par gtor// gsang dbang chen po stsol ba'i

phyir// snying dang snying gi grogs mo de// spyi dpal mchog la yon du 'bul// rgyan dang cha lugs mang po kun// gsang dbang gnang nas yon du bzhes// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// sa ma ya zhes bgyi ba
gang// sa ma ya la du zhig mchi// sa ma ya yi don rnams gang// de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// sa ma ya zhes bya ba ni// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ dam tshig
grangs la bsam mi khyab// bsdu na rnam pa gsum yin no// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// sa ma ya zhes bka' stsal pa// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de
skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ston pa bde gshegs kun gyi dpal// sku yi phyag rgya mi spang zhing// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams nyan par bya// rdo rje spun la gdung ba

bskyed// 'di ni lus kyi sa ma ya// bskyed rdzogs sa bon rgyun mi gcod// rgyal po'i phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// 'di ni ngag gi sa ma ya// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i don// snod ngan rnams la spel ba

min// 'di ni tsit+ta'i sa ma ya// ga na ta na'i 'bras bu lnga// spang bar mi bya spyad pa yin// 'di ni yan lag sa ma ya// dmigs med spyod pa mtha' dag kun// 'gro don rdzogs pa'i sa ma ya// sa ma ya ni rdo rje
che// 'da' bar ma mdzad rdo rje'i dam// bcol ba'i las rnams byed pa yin// mkha' 'gro rnam gsum sa ma ya// zhes dpal chen pos bshad do// de skad bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang rigs kyi
sangs rgyas rnams ni gsang ba'i bdag por gyur/ 'khor mang po ni g.yung drung gi dngos grub thob nas/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i dam tshig can du gyur to// rnal 'byor gyi rgyud lung chen po/ ka ma la de
bI sid+d+hi ma hA tan tra las/ bdud rtsi chen po'i bca' gzhi dang/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa'i bca' gzhi/ rin po che gter gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig
rten dbang chen 'di rnams kun// bskul ba'i cho ga ji ltar lags// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung
drung yang dag pa// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// 'jig rten dbang chen 'di rnams kun// 'jig rten 'dir bskul 'di skad do// hUM snang srid thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong// dus gsum bde gshegs

'byung ba lnga yi ngang// skye 'gro ma lus 'byung ba lnga la rdzogs// 'das dang ma byon 'byung ba lnga yi dbyings// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong// bde chen yum gyi klong la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM khams

gsum thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong/ brgyan yang/ snang srid thams cad 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi po// gru chad sgo bzhi b+ha ga'i tshul du brgyan// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo sku bskyod cig/ hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte
dbus su// ya bdud bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// yum gyi rgyal mo spyan drangs te// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// mkha' la dus bzhi'i cha snyoms

ma// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// phyag drug phyag rgya sna tshogs bsnams// dang po rdo rje dril bu dang// bar ma dril zhags b+han+d+ha dmar// tha ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhi
ldan// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// tshogs kyi gtso mor gshegs su gsol// hUM shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// sa bdag
bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng+ge'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dkar po shel ltar dkar// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs

bzhir bgrad/ dang po rdo rje b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma dgra s+t+wa gtun shing brdeg/ tha ma seng+ge'i mchog chen snyod// 'byung ba sa yi mnga' bdag mo// 'gro ba'i rus la mnga' mdzad ma// rus pa'i bdag mor gshegs

su gsol// hUM byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// byang gi mkha' 'gro khyung chen gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog

la// na bza' ljang gu shin tu 'bar// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po b+han+d+ha rgya gram bsnams// bar ma dbyug chen rgyu phreng 'dren// tha ma spyang mo'i zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba rlung
la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// dbugs kyi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// chu bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// nub kyi mkha'
'gro sud ka'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyan gsal ma// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dmar mo dbang gis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po pung ka b+han dmar

'bar// bar pa zhags pa tri shU la dril bu yang// tha ma zhing chung ce spyang snyod// 'byung ba chu la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// khrag gi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM lho phyogs 'khor

lo'i rtsibs steng na// gshin rje bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// lho yi mkha' 'gro ban glang gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sngon po baiDUr+ya// dbu

gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin chen b+han+d+ha dmar// bar ma me sbal dbyug to bsnams// tha ma stag mo'i zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i drod la mnga' mdzad
ma// drod kyi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lte ba la// brgya byin bsgyel ba'i gdan steng du// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyen// sna

tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ser po btso ma gsol// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+d+ha dmar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri bsnams// tha ma 'ug pa'i zhing chung
snyod// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// bkrag gi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// kun kyang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// mche ba can la gtsigs shing
bzhad// 'jigs tshul can la snying rjer ldan// ye shes drug dang ldan pa ste// pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs// sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir// 'gro la phan phyir gshegs su gsol// da ni ma mo
dbang du bsdu ba dang bkol ba'i thabs 'chad de/ nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// gtso mo la sogs drug po ni// bdag nyid chen por bsgom par bya// bcu bzhi man chad gdan du gding// bdag nyid che

bar bsgom par bya'o// ma ni dgyes chen rtag pa'i mkha'// mo ni bde chen longs spyod rdzogs// ma ni rtag chen g.yung drung mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong// ma ni sku gsung thugs kyi mkha'// mo ni
lus ngag yid gsum klong// ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi mkha'// mo ni snang srid kun gyi klong// ma ni skye ba med pa'i mkha'// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma ni thabs mchog 'dod pa'i mkha'// mo
ni shes rab chags med klong// ma ni nam mkha'i dbyings nyid mkha'// mo ni sems kyi sems nyid klong// ma ni chos kyi dbyings nyid mkha'// mo ni b+ha ga'i dbyings nyid klong// ma ni kun gzhi bde chen

dbyings// mo ni rnam shes hUM chen 'bar// mkha' klong dbyings su bdag bsgom zhing// thig le chen por klong brtan nas// lus la ma mo dbang du bsdu zhes 'byung ste/ de la ma mo dbang du ji ltar bsdu na tshig

dang don 'di skad do// ye shes thig le chen po yi// gsang chen bde ba'i lam mchog dang// man ngag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// yang gsang ma mo drug po de// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// 'od chen

kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa bde 'gro chen mo dang// nyi zla thod phreng gdan du bting// thig le chen po'i rgyan bzhi yis// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po dag/ chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa'i
dwangs ma brgyad po las// sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi po dang// thugs kyi dgyes sde bzhi rnams dag/ mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// bde chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srid pa chags byed spun gnyis
ni// mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa rang lugs gnyug ma yis// e ka tsa ti spun drug mnan// chags pa'i dbang chen dmar po yis// 'dod khams gtso mo spun gnyis mnan// srid pa spyi yi mdo
sdud kyis// nam mkha' rgyal mo spun gnyis mnan// dbang mo spyi yi mdo gsal gyis// srin mo chen mo bdun rnams mnan// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab kyis// dmag gi rgyal mo spun bzhi mnan// srid

pa 'jug byed phra mo yis// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gan rkyal mnan// de ltar gdan du gding bya ba// snying 'dren phyag rgya bcas nas su// drag po sngags kyis gnan par bya// hUM muM kha la ha ha ha ha b+ha da nan kro tI shwa rI

nan// sur+ya pad+ma kha rag sring 'gro nan nan/ mu ting shan ting dun tri/ dan tri nan/ ta kem ta kem ni la tan tra nan/ ma ma ka b+h+yo hUM nan/ ma ma duSh+tan nan/ ma ma duSh+tan pad+ma rak+ta/ pra bi sha nan phaT/ zhes brjod pa

yis/ stan gyi rgyu rnams bsgyel nas ni// bdud rtsi dmar chen khar blug go/ A+oM badzra a mr-i ta u Ta/ tsit+ta nan/ tra ta phaT/ de ni srog 'phrog pa'i thabs yin te/ gdan gyi snying khrag zhal du rngub// lce yi steng du

gsal bar bzhag/ de nas gdan nas bkye nas su// sgrub pa'i las rnams byed par bsgom// che ba'i nga rgyal 'di skad bskyed// hUM nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni ma mo kun gyi yab// nga ni srid gsum snying

rje'i mchog/ nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// thams cad kun gyi snying khrag bdag/ khyod kyi snying khrag nga la yod// nga yi las bcol khyod kyis sgrubs// dzaHhUM ti maM b+h+yo raM ma mo b+h+yo ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo/ ye

shes rtsal 'phang thig le yi// bsgom bya'i ma mo bcu gsum la// drug cu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes byung ste/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byas la/ sems las bskyed pa'i ma mo

bcu gsum dang/ ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi srog gi snying po bsdus la 'khor du bzhag go/ de nas rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa gzhung bzhin bshams la/ sna la ye shes las bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams

mchod/ hUM thig le dbyings las bskyed pa'i khro rgyal yum// ye shes thugs las sprul te khro mo'i skur ston pa// gnyis med ha ha bzhad cing rngam pa'i hUM sgra 'byin// mche ba dmar po gtsigs nas snying 'dren rkan

sgra can// skye shi rtsa ba bcad nas bde klong dbyings la sdud// sku dang sku mdog khro mor bzhugs shing dbang chen dkyil 'khor rdzogs// phyag nas sprul pa gtong zhing dug gsum dbyings la sbyor// ma tshogs

'khor du bsdus nas b+ha ga'i mnga' mdzad ma// drug cu rtsa brgyad tshogs la yab kyi rngam pa'i sgra phyung zhing// hUM srid gsum 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i thig le la// dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra rol pa'i tshul bzhin

mdzad// rgyu las bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga po 'di// rnam rtog gzhom phyir sku la thim par mdzod// hUM ha he ma ma b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo a la la A+oM ha ho// sku las bskyed nas bstod nas su// 'khor gyi drug
po spyan drang ngo// hUM ma mo chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor mnga' bdag mo// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad zhal lnga 'bar// mkha' bzhi bde klong dbyings la gsal// mkha' la srog gi mnga'
mdzad ma// dkyil 'khor gtso mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM ma mo chen mo rgyu bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo dbugs kyi bdag/ sna tshogs
'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum byang gi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo rlan bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum nub kyi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo drod bdag mo// sna
tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum lho yi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo bkrag gi bdag/ sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma// yang sbas drug gi dkyil
'khor nas// thugs dam chen po rjes dgongs te// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// de nas bcu bzhi man chad dang// rang lugs rgyud bzhin bskul bar bya// ma mo dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/
dbang bskur ba dang yang gsang thugs kyi tshogs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas ma mo phyag rgya rnams// 'bru lnga'i don du ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// a la la

ho// sa ma ya hUM ha he s+t+waM/ lag gi 'du byed bsgom pa ni// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje gar du bsgom pa las// shes rab mchog gi snying gar bstan// sbos mo dbang mo rtse sprad de// thabs

kyi phyogs mtshams bskor ba las// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo'i rgya// rdo rje sder mo dam bsnol te// A+oM bsgreng spyi bor rgya bcings pa// ma mo rdo rje rus pa'i rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// hUM dang ha gnyis rtse

bsdus nas// 'bru gsum brgyad nas gshog pa'i tshul// na ra ha sar bzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje dbugs kyi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa la// A+oM dang ha gnyis rgyab bsnol 'khyud// 'bru gsum rtse sprod sku

gsung thugs// bzhad pa'i thad kar bzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje khrag gi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// ha gnyis rtse sprad gyen du bsgreng// A+oM gnyis rtse sprad thad kar brkyang// swa gnyis rtse sprad thur du

brkyang// 'bru gnyis so sor dam bsnol nas// 'gu ya'i thad kar bzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje me yi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// oM gnyis rgyab bsnol lu gu rgyud// 'bru gsum so sor rtse mnan te// hUM

gnyis drag tu g.yob pa ni// ma mo rdo rje bkrag gi rgya// rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba yi// thabs kyi oM dang ha gnyis las// shes rab hUM gis bsten par bya// shes rab A+oM dang ha gnyis las// thabs kyi hUM gis

bsten par bya// shes rab A+oM dang hUM brkyang ba// thabs kyi A+oM dang swa bkan nas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor mnan bkan pa// ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro yi// rdo rje tshogs chen rdzogs pa yi// phyag rgya yin zhes
dpa' bos bshad// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sems nyid 'jig rten zla ba yi// phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags// dbang phyug gtso la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' stsal

pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// thig le chen po'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur kha sprad de// shes rab mchog gi phyogs gnas su// A+oM aM ha rtse sprad nas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rgya// thabs

mchog spyod pa'i phyogs nas su// A+oM aM ha gsum rtse sprad pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rgya// thabs kyi hUM gi sgo gsum ni// rang rig ye shes phyag rgya yin// shes rab swa yi sku gsung thugs// thig le byang chub

sems kyi rgya// shes rab hUM gi rtse mo ru// thabs gyi swa yi sbyor mnan nas// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya zhes// yang dag rdzogs kyis nges par bshad// thig le chen po'i rgya bcings nas// ma hA su khar
bsdams nas su// bla na med par gsal gyur na// dus gsum nyes dmigs sel bar nges// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// dus gsum mgon pos de skad bshad// dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
dang/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa dang/ phyag rgya sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten 'di na dbang bgyid pa'i// rim pa gang dang gang lags

pa// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag bsgrub pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi gtso// 'di ltar 'jig rten gang byed pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// 'byung ba lnga las bskyed

pa ni kun tu bzang mo// dbang bsgyur ba ni bu mo spun lnga// cha snyom ma ni srid pa bde 'gro ma/ 'byung ba lnga yi nyul len ma ni chags 'dzin spun gnyis so// dus bzhi rdzogs par byed pa ni kun tu bzang mo/ dus

bzhi la dbang byed pa ni bu mo spun lnga dang nyi zla thod phreng can no// cha snyoms ma ni khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo bzhi dang thugs kyi dgyes sde bzhi'o// dus bzhi nyul len ma ni/ phyag ya bdud kyi chung ma'o// ma mo
rang rang bkol thabs ni/ yum chen mo mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ yi dam bsgom legs ma dang bdun 'khol lo des srid pa bde 'gro ma 'khol lo// des rdo

rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des srid pa chags byed ma 'khol lo// des e ka tsa ti la sogs pa dang ma mo bdun 'khol lo// des 'dod khams lha yi gtso mo dang/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma

gnyis 'khol lo// des ni nam mkha'i rgyal mo dang gling bzhi spyi phud gnyis 'khol lo// bu mo spun lnga ni srid pa thams cad la dbang byed de/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam gyis ni// nyi ma thod phreng can

'khol lo// des ni srid pa cha snyoms ma 'khol lo// des ni sa bdag pad+ma thod phreng ma 'khol lo// des ni e ka tsa ra 'dul lo// 'di rnams ni dbus kyi nyul le ma ste// nam gyi gung la rgyu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo
rnam snang gsal gyis ni/ khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che 'dul lo// des ni dkar mo mig gcig ma 'khol lo// des ni rgyan gyi rgyal mo 'khol lo// des ni gru 'degs ma ha ra ting dkar mo 'khol

lo// des ni dmag gi rgyal mo mche ba can 'khol lo// des ni sring mo bzhi ste gling bzhi spyi 'gro ma 'khol lo// de rnams ni shar gyi nyul byed ma ste srod la rgyug go/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal mas ni/ srid pa
bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des ni thugs kyi dgyes sde nag mor ral pa gcig ma 'khol lo// des ni dbang phyug ma 'khol lo// des ni gru 'degs ma dun ting nag mo 'khol lo// des dmag
gi rgyal mo nag mo kha yal ma 'khol lo// des sring mo nag mo mkha' la khyung lding ma 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni lho'i nyul byed ma ste/ nam gyi dbyings la rgyug go/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal
mas ni/ rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde ma mo dbang bsgyur ma 'khol lo// des bdag nyid ma 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma shan ting dmar mo 'khol lo// des dmag

gi rgyal mo dkar mo mchu 'jib ma 'khol lo// des sring mo dkar mo g.yag thod 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni nub kyi nyul byed ma ste/ nam gung la rgyug go/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos kyis ni/ pad+ma khrag
'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde ser mo las mkhan ma 'khol lo// des gcig pu ma 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma grub ting ser mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo ser mo

rkang ldag ma 'khol lo// des sring mo nag mo sder chen ma 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni byang gi rgyug byed ma ste/ nam gyi tho rangs rgyug ga/ yum chen mo ni nyin mtshan med par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams

brgyad kun la mnga' mdzad do// spyi dpal ni yum chen mo rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga la sogs pa'o// ma mor grags pa kun la mnga' mdzad do// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lngas ma mo chen mo bdun 'dul lo// des srid pa bde
'gro ma dang nyi ma thod phreng can gnyis 'dul lo// des khros pa'i dbang mo che 'dul lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi 'dul lo// des sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi 'dul lo// des srid pa chags byed ma dang
cha snyoms gnyis 'dul/ des srin mo bdun 'dul/ des e ka tsa ti spun drug 'dul// des 'dod khams lha mo'i gtso mo ne mtshan spun bdun 'dul/ des rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug spun bdun 'dul/ des

dmag gi rgyal mo spun bzhi 'dul// des sring mo bzhi 'dul/ de ltar nang 'khrug na yang// tha ma nas ni rim bzhin te// gtso mo bcos na kun kyang bde// dman mo lnga bcu rtsa lnga so so'i dbang tshad do// sems
las bskyed pa'i ma mo bcu gsum mnan pa dang/ drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs zhes bya'o// ma mo so so'i dbang gi rim pa ste le'u drug pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bcu bzhi zhes bgyi rje
dang khol// rabs rgyud rtsa ba ji ltar lags// 'gugs dang 'dren pa'i sngags rnams gang// rnal 'byor mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rnal 'byor mchog gis bka' stsal
pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// bcu bzhi la sogs rje khol gyi// rabs rgyud 'gugs 'dren sngags rnams kun// gtan tshigs rtsa ba sbas pa rnams// gtan tshigs rtsa ba gtan la dbab// de la ri
rab gling bzhi ni gong du chags pa rang lugs su yod/ nyi ma dgu brgya rtsa gcig dang// zla ba dgu brgya rtsa gcig gi/ nyi zla stong dang rtsa gnyis kyis/ ri rab kyi phyi rol gang na gnas pa'i snang

srid thams cad ril tshigs nas ci yang mi snang ba las/ ri rab kyi nang ring thung du dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol zhes bya ba yod pa las// shing gi rtse mo ri rab kyi bum pa'i nang na/ yum chen mo

srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum yum mchog ma zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing gar bzhugs shing/ dbu dang phyag dang spyan cir yang ston pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa can/ sbas pa'i spyan gnyis nas/

g.yas nas ni khrag gi mchi ma/ g.yon nas bdud rtsi'i mchi ma/ sbas pa'i zhal nas 'bras bu rnam pa lnga'i bcud 'dzag pa/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis la g.yas pas srid pa thams cad kyi rtse nas 'dzin pa/ g.yon

pas 'og gi rdo rje'i gdan 'dzin pa/ sbas pa'i zhabs gnyis kyis/ g.yas pas 'jig rten gyi dbang po che thams cad kyi snying brdzis pa/ g.yon pas 'jig rten gyi dbang mo che thams cad kyi snying rtsa mnan pa/
gsang ba'i mkha' ge sar gyi dkyil nas/ snang srid thams cad kyi 'phel 'grib mdzad pa/ ye shes kyi gnas rang las shar ba las ma gtogs pa kun nam mkha'i gting khung du sdud pa/ spyi bo'i gtsug na khrag

gi ral pa gcig gis/ srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud pa/ ri rab kyi rtse bum pa'i nang na bzhugs so// de'i khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang/ srid pa cha snyoms ma gnyis shing gi sked par gnas

so// yum chen mo 'khol po srid pa zhig 'dzin dang/ srid pa byan byed gnyis/ shing gi rtsa ba na gnas te/ ri rab kyi phyi rol na snang zhing srid pa ril tshigs nas mi snang ba la/ srid pa bde 'gro mas nyi zla dbang

du sdud pa'i phyir 'byung ba lnga'i drod las sprul pa'i bu mo mdor dkar la g.yu'i ral pa can dpral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum pa gcig yod pa/ lcags dang zangs kyi gri zhags la snying brgyus pa'i zhags pa

'phen pa zhig skyes pas/ des nyi zla stong thod dang phreng bar bcings nas/ nyi zla zung gcig btang ba las/ gzod srid pa cha snyoms so// de nas yum bde 'gro mas phyi rol gyi snang srid thams cad phyung ngo// de

nas dkar mo nyi zla'i thod phreng can de nga nyid ni gsang bar bzung/ rab tu gsang zhing sbas pa las/ mu stegs kA la chen po zhes bya ba ri rab kyi 'og rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pas mthong ste/ byi ba'i lo la yid

kyi sbyor ba gcig byas pa las/ glang gi lo la bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa dang/ khol mo srid pa cha snyoms mas lte ba bcad de/ bu mo spun bzhi'i ming yang mas btags te/ dbyings phyug ma dang/ rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang/
bdag nyid ma dang/ gcig pu ma dang gzhir btags so// ming yang ches te de bzhis srid pa phung ba dang 'dra ba lan cig byas so// de nas nga nyid ye shes sprul pa dang// srid pa bde 'gro rnam

gnyis kyis// yid kyi sprul pa bkye nas su// 'jig rten phung byed de bzhi yi// mngal la sogs pa dbang du bsdus// hUM las sprul pa'i ma mo bzhi// de bzhi las kyis bskyed byas so// de bzhi'i ma srid pa chags

byed mas byas so// phyi mo dang mas ming btags te/ rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje pad+ma phrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje khrag gsum

tshogs byed khros pa'i dbang mo che dang bzhir btags so// ming legs nas bu mo de bzhi las ma bzhi dbang du bsdus so// de nas srid pa bde ba la bkod do// sprul pa'i bu mo de bzhi dang/ rigs kyi 'byung ba

bzhi po ru// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// 'brug gi lo la rtsed 'jo ba// mu stegs kA las tshor nas su// sdig chen dmod pa'i mtshon cha yis// mdza' nas rgyug pa khyed cag rnams// nal bu lto ru chud nas

su// ngo tsha'i bu yang sbed par shog/ ces dmos pa dang/ dmod pa sdigs te/ sbrul gyi lo la bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa dang/ yang khol mo srid pa chags byed mas lte ba bcad do// de nas ma bzhi ngo tsha nas/ ri rab

kyi ngos bzhir bskungs te bzhag pa las/ rta'i lo la blta bas mi bra ba'i bud med rdzu 'phrul che zhing mtshan dngaldan pa bzhi dpal chen pos gzigs nas/ thugs kyi dgyes sde gsang ba'i yang phyi mor bzung
ngo// dkar mo mig gcig dgyes 'debs ma dang nag mo ral chen rmongs byed ma dang/ dmar mo dbang sgyur za byed ma dang/ ser mo las mkhan tshe 'phel ma/ zhes thugs las mtshan yang btags so// ma mo

bcu bzhi'i rabs rgyud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de rnams kyi khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang/ khol po srid pa zhig 'dzin gnyis/ khyi'i lo la dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la khyo shug tu 'dus pa dang/

phag gi lo'i dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la bu khye'u gcig skyes te/ jo mo nyi ma thod phreng gis bskos rje drangs dkar du ming btags te/ blon por bskos so// de nas drang dkar dang srid pa cha snyoms ma sru mtshan gnyis

khyo shug tu 'dus te/ srid pa cha snyoms so// de gnyis las bu mo spun drug skyes te/ bzhi ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i blon po rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chung mar blangs te/ rje mos ri rab kyi gru bzhi nas 'degs

su bcug ste/ gru 'degs chen mo bzhir ming btags so// bu mo chung spun gnyis la gcig ni srid pa bya mkhan gyi chung mar blangs so// jo mo nyi ma thod phreng gis he ru ka ming btags nas/ srid pa'i bya mkhan
mo byan mo yang byed du bcug go/ de'i bu mo tha chung e ka tsa ra ni/ dbyings phyug ma spun bzhi yi 'khor na gnas so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi las bu mo spun bzhi skyes te/ dkar mo mche ba can/

nag mo kha yal ma/ dmar mo chu 'jib ma/ ser mo rkang ldag ma bzhi skyes te/ de bzh-i thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i khol mor thob ste/ dmag gi rgyal mor bskos so// de nas khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i khol mo
e ka tsa ti shugs ni blon po/ lha chen mo bdun gyi ma/ sring mochen mo bdun gyis 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa las/ yum chen mo thugs las sprul pa/ dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ mkha' la rgyu
ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i ma mo gcig ste thugs kyi sprul pa'i ma mo bdun gyis/ srin mo bdun btul lo// de nas gtso mo bcu bzhi las/ rgyan gyi rgyal mo 'od can spun bzhi bya ba mngags

nas/ bu mos ma'i dbang phrogs te/ dbang yang med mthu yang chung ste/ zhe ngan sha stag byed do// de nas rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang/ khol po bya ya bdud gnyis/ byi ba'i lo la byi byas pa'i bu/ glang gi lo la yar la shod

kyi skyes to re dang/ 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo gnyis mtshe mar skyes so// de nas yar la shod kyi skyes to re dang/ jo mo na yang jo mo/ sru mo na yang sru mo/ bdag nyid ma zhes bya ba gnyis/ shing na byi sa le'i rtse

mor/ rta'i lo la tshes bco lnga la mdza' na rgyug ste/ nang par so sor gyes nas phyin pas sru mo'i rting pa la khrag thig gcig 'dug pa mthong ste/ mi gtsang ba'i sems skyes nas/ mchil ma gcig bskyur ba dang/

khrag gi steng du song ste/ khrag dang mchil ma 'dres pas bu tsha ming sring gnyis mtshe mar skyes te/ lug gi lo'i tshes bcu bzhi la gnam gying khyi yangadakar po skyes/ tshes bco lnga la sa bdag pad+ma phreng skyes/ de nas

yang dbyings phyug ma dang/ yar la shod kyi skyes to re dang gnyis spre'u lo la byi ba gyis pa'i bu/ bya'i lo la ming sring gnyis mtshe mar skyes te/ ming po ni shar phyogs kyi shel seng ge sring mo ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang

phyug ma yin no// de nas ya bdud dang/ e ka tsa ti khyo shug gnyis las/ bu mo spun gnyis skyes te/ che ba ni 'jig rten srid 'degs zhes bya ba nam mkha'i rgyal mo'o// chung ngu ni gling bzhi spyi phud ma zhes bya ste/

'jig rten dbang sdud ma'o// srid pa cha snyoms ma ni he ru ka sni ra zhes bya/ srid pa chags byed ma ni lha mo tshogs kyi rje mo zhes bya/ e ka tsa ti ni mi yongs kyi bdag mo che zhes bya/ gru 'degs ma chen mo bzhi ni/

har ting dkar mo dang/ dun ting nag mo dang/ shan ting dmar mo dang/ grub ting ser mo dang bzhi'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor chen mo brgyad la/ yum srid pa bde 'gro ma ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa grub ldan mchog
gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkar mo mig gcig ma ni nyi zla stong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni/ snying rje byams ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkar mo mig gcig ma la

sogs pa bzhi ni/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbyings phyug ma bzhi ni/ phung byed sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang rnam pa gcig tu yum chen mo bzhi dang/ nyi zla thod phreng can ni yongs su rdzogs pa

ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor to/ dpal chen po dang gnyis su med do// khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni/ skye 'gro yongs su skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ bdud rtsi bum pa gang dang 'dra'o// thugs kyi dgyes sde chen
mo bzhi ni/ ge sar yongs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/ gsang ba'i chags 'dzin kun gyi bdag mo yin no// de rnams kyi khol mo ma tshogs brgyad de// srid pa chags byed ma ni/ chags 'dzin ma'i tshogs

so// srid pa cha snyoms ma ni/ snyoms byed chen mo'i tshogs so// srid pa gru 'degs ma ni gling bzhi spyi 'gro ma'i tshogs so// e ka tsa ti ni pho nya kun gyi tshogs so// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi ni dri za la sogs pa

rigs so so yongs kyi tshogs so// e ka tsa ti dang/ 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo ni/ bud med nag mo'i tshogs so// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis ni/ nyul byed chen mo'i

tshogs so// rin chen srid 'degs ma dang/ gling bzhi spyi phud ma gnyis ni/ sman phran kun gyi tshogs so// de la e ka tsa ti'i nu mo e ka tsa ras bsam pas/ jo mo'i nang na yang bdag gi jo mo gud sang dbang

chung ste bdag kyang khol mo'i nang na gud pa dbang chung bas/ ngan thabs shig bya'o snyam pa las/ jo mo gcig pu mas byi sna byas te/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas chu srin gyi rgyal po/ kum+b+hi ra ma ka ra zhes bya ba bkug nas/

dug shing gdug pa can cig gi phag tu/ stag gi lo la nyal po byed du bcug pa'i bu/ yos bu'i lo la ming sring gnyis skyes te/ ming po dkar po mig gcig pa skyes/ sring mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma skyes nas/ nad

gtong bar 'gyur to// de nas ming pos ma'i gzi mdangs phrogs/ 'jig rten yongs kyi mthu yang rku bar byed pa las/ sru mo e ka tsa tis tshor te/ jo mo khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi la zhus nas/ rje 'bangs lngas

bsgral ba las/ lus gcig gi nang nas tsit+ta bcu phyung ba las/ gcig ni snying gi bdag mo la phul dgu las gsum rgyal the'u khra bo dang tri sha kha dang/ rkan thob to gsum ste rgyal po'i srid la gnod/ gsum pas

bar the'u smug po dang/ legs the'u khra bo dang/ sa the'u nag po dang/ gsum gyi mi yongs la gnod do// gsum phyogs phyogs su gyur te/ brag srin dang/ shing srin dang/ chu srin dang gsum du gyur/ dgu ka'i
rkang pa ya re bcag nas/ gnam khyi dkar po khol du bcug go/ de nas 'brug gi lo la/ e ka tsa ra ma mngal mi bde bas mnyer btsir ba las/ gdong sog po la/ mig long ba/ lus spyang ki la
khog pa la snying gsum yod pa gcig skyes pa las/ 'di ni su la yang cha med pas dgra'i snying 'byin pa/ byams pa'i lan ldon par 'ongs te/ las su rung ngo snyam nas/ dga' zhing 'dug pa las gtso mo nyi
ma thod phreng can gyis tshor te/ snying gnyis khar bcug ste/ shel ge la khol por byin te btang ngo// pho rgyud mo rgyud kyi gtan tshigs te le'u brgyad pa'o//// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i sngags rnams

ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// A+oM kro tI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+ma r+ya hUM hUM phaT/ badzra shAn+tiM pad+ma ka ru ti b+h+yo/ A+oM mu tri ni/ a shan tri ni/ ba ga dun tri ni/ khu mud dun tri ni/ A+oM

sUr+ya bi to a to ye/ badzra pad+ma bit+ya a to ye/ badzra kha rag bi ta a to ye/ badzra sriM 'gro bi ta a to ye/ A+oM badzra keM keM badzra ta keM/ badzra ta keM/ badzra ni la/ badzra lan ta/ badzra lan ta/ badzra za 'gram mu ri sh+tsa/ A+oM badzra

kha rag snying kha rag snying/ trag rag+sha kha mun ma trag rag+sha/ trag rag+sha mu tra ban// kha mun pa tra ban/ kha mun pa tra pa tra rag+sha/ pra ban pra ka ra tiSh+Tha b+h+yo// pra ban ka ra ti b+h+yo/ pra gi waM gi sha b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM ka ri ka/ ba rod da

rod/ ni la chu ni ta kha T+waM ka da la tsa pa la/ pad ma tsan da/ ma gur rag to/ diM saM daM saM/ e a rA l+li/ nu pi ru lu nu pi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha trag rak+sha/ A+oM i tiM b+h+yo/ bi tiM b+h+yo/ mun ting b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra har tiM b+h+yo/

dun ting b+h+yo/ shan ting b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ te baM te wang b+h+yo/ a pa ra gan d+ha b+h+yo b+h+yo/ da la du na b+h+yo/ de ni ma ma yas b+h+yo/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhan dang sbyar// des ni ma mo 'gugs 'dren 'gyur/ de skad dpa'
bos yang dag bshad// ma mo gsang sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa'i dbang chen 'di rnams kun// bsnyen bsgrub brjod na ji ltar bgyi// mngon sangs rgyas la
bdag nyan 'tshal/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// bsnyen bsgrub bskul ba'i tshig rnams kun// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag

pa// hUM srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste// phra men rgya mtsho sku bskyod cig/ rnal 'byor chen mo'i sku sprul pa// spyan gnyis khros pa'i tshul mnga' zhing// zhi ba'i sku la snang srid gsal// sprul
pa'i sku la zhabs brgyad 'bar// drug ni rgyu drug sgo yang gcod// gcig ni klu yi khams su 'char// gcig ni bdud dang mu stegs gnon// rnam par shes pa'i yul drug las// spyan drug mngon par shar ba
ni// spyan gsum gyen du gzigs pas ni// rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'byed cing// sems can skye shi'i lam yang ston// spyan gsum thur du gzigs pa las// srid pa gsum char thal bar rlog/ de

nas slar yang skyed par byed// g.yas kyi zhal bzhad thugs rje che// g.yon gyi zhal bzhad dbang du bsdud// dbus kyi zhal bgrad drag shul che// rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa yis// srid pa'i 'gran zla chem chem
gsol// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i b+ha ga las// srid pa gsum char 'char bar byed// lha la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ bdud dang gnod sbyin la sogs te// gshin rje pho mo kun rnams 'dir// rnal 'byor sku

yi g.yas phyogs na// las kyi ma mo bcu gsum 'char// pho nya phyag brnyan thabs kyis 'gyed// g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'char ba ni// rnal 'byor sku yi sum cha las// nges pa'i ma mo dgu sbas shing// thams cad
kun la chad par brtson// yum gyi zhabs kyi g.yas phyogs nas// 'dod pa'i ma mo brgyad mnan te// 'jig rten kun la sman par mdzad// yum gyi zhabs kyi g.yon phyogs nas// bka' sdod nyi shu rtsa brgyad

mnan// rnal 'byor kun gyi las rnams sgrub// srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kun// rnal 'byor sku yi khyon du rdzogs// ma mo'i thugs kyi thig le las// rdo rje kha T+wAM gzhu bdungs shing// shes rab ye shes mde'u rtse

las// spros pa'i thig le dgu 'phen ma// nges pa'i bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// he ru hUM sras 'khor du bzhag/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad 'grol zhing dbang du sdud// zhi ba'i sku la thugs
rje che// ye shes sprul pa'i phyag drug las// g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lo bskor// gsang sngags bka' rna?ms sgrogs pa'i don// g.yon pa rin chen srid dbang sdud bskur// srid pa'i 'jig rten gnas
la 'phen// g.yas kyi bar pas g.yang gzhi rdeb// bdud dang mu stegs rdul du rlog/ g.yon pas b+han d+ha dmar bskyil cing// bud med mang po dbang du sdud// g.yas kyi tha ma tshe 'dzin cing// rnal 'byor
kun la dngos grub 'bebs// g.yon pas lcags kyu dgu bsnams shing// dam nyams kun dang dgra bgegs dang// bka' las 'da' ba'i snying rtsa 'dren// spyi gtsug sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// stong gsum
'jig rten b+h+yo bzlog mdzad// bdag cag ye shes rtsal 'chang gis// nges pa'i dam 'chang rtogs pa'i mthus// man ngag thugs kyi rgyud bskul bas// skad cig yud tsam dbyings nas bzhengs// srid pa gsum

dang gling bzhi yang// thang gcig yud la 'jig par mdzad// khyad par ye shes nyi zla'i spyan// g.yas kyi spyan gyis srid pa gsal// g.yon gyi spyan gyis sbyor ba mdzad// rdo rje'i smin ma g.yengs pa yi// mu stegs
yag sha'i snying yang 'dren// ma mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// byang chub sems ma zhes su grags// yang dag gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo la// bde klong kun gyis gtso
zhes grags// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba thabs kyi 'phro 'du yis// yum gyi thugs dam der bskangs la// sku ni mi bskyod 'dir bzhugs la// 'khor gyi blon mo sku bskyod la// bcol

pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// ces tshogs la spyan drang pa ni// ma mo phra men rgya mtsho ma'o// gsang ba'i mchod pa dang ldan par byas te/ bskul ba ni/ hUM lha mo chen mo rnal 'byor ma// kun gzhi yongs kyi
dbang phyug ma// snang srid kun la dbang sgyur zhing// skye 'gro yongs kyi dbugs 'phrog ma// dung chen phyag na bsnams shing 'o dod chen pos 'debs// gshin rje bran du 'khol zhing 'jig rten me yis

'gengs// 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'phrog cing bo d+hi tsi t+ta'i bdag/ sgrol ba don du gnyer zhing dbang phyug kun dang sbyor// srid gsum sprul pas 'gengs shing bdud dpung rdul du rlog/ g.yang gzhi gos su gon nas

kha T+wAM g.yab mos 'debs// sku mdog khro mor bzhugs shing khrag dang zhag gis brgyan// spu gri phyag na bsnams shing kun gyi snying 'byin ma// zhing chen gdan la bzhugs shing rnal 'byor grogs mdzad ma// mAng

sa zas su za zhing tsit+ta'i zhags pa 'phen// nyi zla thod du bcings nas stong gsum bde la bkod// bdud kyi bu smad 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che// dung chen snod du snying dang khrag tu sbyar ba 'di// khyod kyi sku la

bstims pas bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// ces bya ba ni nyi zla thod phreng can no// rgyu bsgral ba kun gyi tsit+ta'i bdag mo yang yin/ thams cad kun gyi sting la yang dbang ngo// hUM rnal 'byor khros

pa'i dbang mo che// nyi ma stong gi gzi mdangs can// stong gsum 'jig rten gzi 'phrog ma// srid pa sgrol ma gshegs su gsol// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// pad+ma stong gis dbu brgyan cing// ge

sar 'bum gyi khrag 'thung ma// dbang phyug rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum 'tsho byed 'dud rtsi sbyor// 'jig rten smra mchog kun gyi gsos// bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo

gshegs su gsol// hUM rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// b+ha ga yongs la mnga' mdzad ma// gnas lam thams cad stongs mdzad ma// thar pa'i lam mchog gshegs su gsol// zhes brjod de rnal 'byor tshogs la
mchod pa 'bul ba ni khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi'o// b+ha ga 'bum la mnga' mdzad ma// dbyings phyug rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten yongs kyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo gshegs su
gsol// bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo gshegs su gsol// stong gsum 'jig rten rgyug 'gro ma// gcig bu yum mchog gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul ba ni

sbas pa'i ma bzhi'o// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i shar phyogs nas// shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' bya rgod thul pa la// g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// dung gi lan tshar mche ba la// rin chen shel
gyi thod gdengs can// dkar mo sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum shar la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs nas// lhoyi nag mo mche ba can// na
bza' g.yang gzhi go zu la// gser gyi dril bu 'bum gyis bskor// lcags kyi lan tshar mche ba la// gser g.yu spel ba'i thod gdengs can// nag mo sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum lho la mnga'
mdzad ma// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs nas// nub kyi dmar mo dbang sdud ma// na bza' chu srin g.yang gzhi la// sbrul nag 'bum gyi gdengs ka can// g.yu yi

lan tshar mche ba la// bye ru dmar po'i thod gdengs can// dmar mo sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum nub la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs
nas// byang gi ser mo las mkhan ma// na bza' rma bya'i thul pa la// mthing gi go cog ya bas bskor// gser gyi lan tshar mche ba la// thod skam 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// ljang nag sgeg ma 'bum gyis
bskor// srid gsum byang la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod// gling bzhi rgyal mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thu ba g.yas pa dmag gis bkang// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra 'dul ma// thu ba

g.yon pa rin po che// sgrub pa po la rtags 'byin ma// phyag ma g.yas na g.yang bzhi rdeb// khams gsum rdul du brlabs nas su// bdud dang mu stegs snying 'byin ma// phyag ma g.yon na b+han+d+ha bskor// ma
mo thams cad dang dbang du sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor skyong ma// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod// ces spyan drangs shing 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul zhing/ las bsgo zhing brnag pa bcol ba

ni thugs kyi dgyes sde gsang ba'i yang phyi mo bzhi'o// 'di bzhi ni ci bcol ba'i las yid bzhin du 'grub la/ lhur yang tshe dang sri'u la mkhas shing dgra la 'jebs shing gsang ba'i 'phral la rno'o// de yan chad
ni ma mo bcu bzhi bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// da ni srid pa'i dman mo rnams bskul bar bya ste/ hUM srin mo chen mo sham sham mo// a phyi chen mo mi bzad ma// gos su zhing chen lpags rlon
gon// mtha' ma b+han+d+ha stong gis bskor// g.yas na zhing chen sor phreng bgrang// g.yon pas mi mgo'i phor pa ru// snying khrag snying tshil gtub nas su// rang gis rang la thim par stob// g.yang
gzhi ru tshon phyar nas su// bdud dang mu stegs thal bar rlag/ 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar byed// srid pa gsum gyi phud nyul zhing// de nas gtso mo dbyings su mchod// las su bcol na kun kyang

'grub// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod// ces bskul ba ni a phyi chen mo ste srid pa chags byed ma'o// hUM khyim bdag chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor chen mo khang bdag mo// khyim bdag chen mo thig
le dgu// ye shes ngang gis rol pa las// phyag na rtse gsum 'bar ba bsnams// khrag 'thung yab yum kun la dbang sgyur zhing// mthu chen rnal 'byor kun la grogs mdzad ma// dung chen khrag gis

sku la thim par mdzod/ khyod kyi 'khor ni rab tu mi bsgrungs te// sgra snyan yid 'phrog byed pa'i ma mo khyod// 'dod pa lnga la dad cing mthu chen rab tu bskul// khrag gis rlan par 'dod cing thams cad dbang du

sdud// drag shul gtum mo rab tu sdang byed ma// kun gyi yid la gnas shing rab tu mthu chen bskul// me yi bskal pa stong zhing snying rje'i lam la sbyor// gsod pa don du gnyer zhing khro bo kun dang sbyor// bdud
kyi bu smad 'khor zhing nga rgyal drag shul can// 'o dod chen pos 'debs shing zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dgra snying tshal par 'gems pa ma mo khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dus la bab kyi gshegs su
gsol// zhes las gnyen po bcol pa ni sbas pa'i ma mo ste srid pa cha snyoms ma'o// hUM rnal 'byor chen mo srid pa'i bdag/ e ka tsa ti ral gcig ma// mig gcig ma la kar sham mdog/ rang chas sprin dkar

go zu la// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i mtha' chags can// lag na kha T+wAM ga yi mtshon thogs shing// za 'og zhabs ma'i dbu rgyan can// bstan pa tsam gyis khams gsum rmongs byed ma// brdab pa tsam gyis the'u rang

'gong po'i bla gcog ma// 'dir byon dam skong phrin las gnyen po mdzod// ces bya ba ni e ka tsa ti ma'o// da ni ma mo bdun bskul bar bya ste/ hUM rgyal chen bdun gyi chung ma ste// rgya mtsho chen pos dkyil 'khor
nas// dpal ldan shugs sgrol gtso mo ste// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// ri rab snyil ba'i rngams stabs can// kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skem// rdo rje kun grags gshegs su gsol// hUM khro mo rngams pa'i
dkyil 'khor nas// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis 'od 'phro ma// 'jig rten 'chi bdag gzi 'phrog ma// kun tu bzang mo gshegs su gsol// hUM phyag rgya 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur
zhing// bdud dpung dregs snyems kun 'dul ma// rdo rje grags snyems gshegs su gsol// hUM dam tshig chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// pho nya mo ste drug cu'i gtso// sha chen khrag la longs spyod

cing// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ba// rdo rje chen mo ye shes mchog/ dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// hUM khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro mo gtum byed za byed ma// rdo rje dra ba'i phreng thogs

shing// byang phyogs rang gi 'khor 'dul ma// rdo rje 'od tshogs gshegs su gsol// hUM 'od phung 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhags pa stong gi gdengs ldan zhing// 'byung po ma lus 'ching mdzad ma// rdo
rje gsal 'phro gshegs su gsol// hUM dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du can// dam tshig nyams rnams sgrol byed cing// bka' las 'das pa'i snying 'byin ma// rdo rje
g.yu sgron gshegs su gsol// zhes bya ba ni ma mo chen mo bdun no// hUM lha mo chen mo rnal 'byor ma// rin chen srid 'degs mdzes pa'i za ma tog/ mdog bzang sngon mo ral pa can// rang chas mu tig go zu

la// gser dang g.yu yi phra bkye ste// mtha' ma rin chen 'bar bas bskor// g.yas na g.yu yi za ma tog/ g.yon na dung gi zor ba bsnams// khyod ni srid pa'i ma mo ste// tshe g.yang sdus shig rin chen srid
'degs ma// hUM sgrub pa'i ma mo chen mo ste// bdud kyi lcam mo gshin rje ma// mdog bzang nag mo ral pa can// ral pa'i zar bu mun nag gtibs// lcags kyi lus la zangs kyi zhabs ma can// rdzu 'phrul

rkang pa mchog dang ldan// g.yas pa gshin rje'i khram bam bsnams// g.yon pas bdud kyi sho rde'u dkar nag 'grems// mchan na nad kyi rkyal pa sbed// khyod kyi 'jig rten byol bzlog mkhan// khram kha phyis la

sho rde'u spos// nad kha chings la dal kha sgyur// hUM rnal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug ma// mdog bzang dkar mo ral pa can// khyod ni gling bzhi spyi 'gro ste// rang chas dar dkar go zu la// g.yu bran 'bar ba'i
mtha' chags can// gser gyi gong leb 'bar ba la// g.yu yi cod pan 'od 'phro ma// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas phyogs bcur phyin// g.yas kyi lag na thogs pa ni// gser gyi lcag g.yu 'bar ba la// g.yu yi lcag
'bras 'gyur ba btags// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung 'joms// sra la rdab pas dgra bgegs sgrol// gzhan gyis rbad par ma nyan par// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces nang gi dam

rdzas dang ldan par byas la las bcol lo// hUM rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// dbu brgya ma la spyan stong ma// 'jigs tshul rngams pa'i cha byad can// phrin las 'byung po kun 'dul ma// rdo rje sgeg chen gshegs su
gsol// hUM pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sa bdag chen mo pad+ma phreng// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// grong rnams kun la 'thor byed ma// sa bdag chen mo gshegs su gsol// zhes las

bcol pa ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// da ni rgyal po chen po bzhi yi chung ma dang bu mo yang bskul bar bya ste// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// har ting dkar mo chen mo

ste// byang shar mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// dun ting nag mo chen mo ste// shar lho mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// shan ting dmar po chen mo ste// lho nub mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// grub ting ser mo chen mo

ste// nub byang mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// mtshan ni gru 'degs chen mo ste// rgyal mtshan gzungs mas las mdzod cig/ hUM dmag gi rgyal chen mo ste// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// lho yi nag mo kha yal
ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// rigs bzhi'i dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// dmag gi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// hUM gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring// shar gyi
mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// lho yi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// dkar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring// nub kyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// nag mo sder chen
gnod sbyin sring// byang gi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// zhes bya ba ni las kyi sring mo bzhi'o// 'di yin chad grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi las byang dang/ bskul tshig gi le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten dbang chen ji snyed kun// srid pa'i mi la sman slad du// tshul bzhin sgrub pa ji ltar bgyi// rdzas dang mthun pa ci la brten// rtags dang dus

tshigs ji ltar 'byung// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dben pa gnyan zhing nyams dga' bar// ci 'byor yo byad gzhung

sogs la// pad+ma'i mtshan dang ldan pa yi// rigs su gyur pa'i yum gsum yang// sgrub pa'i don du gzhag par bya// rdzas su gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ tsit+ta bcu gcig yang dag ldan// b+han+d+ha lcang lo ldan pa

ru// pad+ma'i rigs su gyur pa yi// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rak+tas bkang// tshil chen mar me khag lngar btang// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// gsar rnying zhing gi gshog pa bkram// ci 'byor yo byad phun

tshogs la// bdun gsum tshul bzhin bsgrim par bya// rgyan dang chas gos la sogs pa// shun chen ral ka gtso bo la// srid pa spyi blug zhwa bgos te// rtse lnga 'bar ba'i phyag cha bsnams// phreng ba chen po de
bzhin bgrang// yum yang g.yang gzhi'i slag pa la// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i g.yab mo thogs// phreng ba chen po gtso dang mthun// dngos grub zhal bu rin chen rigs// dar dkar kha bcad de

bzhin bzhag/ rdo rje rigs ldan rtags su gsol// bdag nyid man ngag he ru ka/ yum yang srid pa bde 'gro ma// gnyis su med par bsgoms byas te// rak+ta la ni srog snying drangs// badzra shAn+tiM pad+ma ga ru ti b+h+yo/
snying gi dkyil nas drangs nas su// mngon sum 'ong bar bsam pa ni// sku mdog dkar mo la nyi ma zla ba 'bum gyis thod dang phreng bar byas pa/ dpral ba'i dbyes nas mig zur gsum pa gcig yod pa/ gsang

ba'i phyag gnyis kyis srid pa'i pad+ma thams cad kyi ge sar bzung ba/ lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la snying brgyus pa'i phreng ba thogs pa/ mig g.yas nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag pas/ thams cad dbang
du sdud pa/ mig g.yon pa nas bdud rtsi'i chu mig 'dzag pas sems can thams cad kyi gsos byed pa/ mig dbus ma nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdzi ma 'thor ba/ g.yu yi ral pa can no// bzod pa

gsol zhing brten dbyangs snyan pos bskul ba ni/ hUM che zhes chen mo gsang ba'i gzung// thig le sbyor ba'i yum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i mig gcig ma// g.yu yi ral

pas srid pa sgrol// chags pa'i phyag gis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mchi ma skye 'gro'i gsos// tsit+tA'i zhags pas mu stegs sgrol// thig le gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// sngon chad sbyor mdzad ji bzhin du// bdag

dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bya zhing gsang ba'i gzungs mar bya'o zhes dam bcas na zhag bdun na zla ba gcig lhung ngo// bcu bzhi na nyi ma gcig lhung ngo// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la dngos grub kyi b+han+d+har

snying gtubs pa dang/ rak+ta bsres pas gang 'ong ngo// de min pa gzhan dag kyang 'ong ngo// ci ltar byung yang mtshan ma spangs/ nyi shu rtsa gcig la sku mngon du 'ong ngo// der bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin gsal bar

byas la/ ge sar gyi rak+ta dbang du bsdus te/ sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang/ zla gam 'bul zhing sbyor ba'i tshul ston to// bdag chags pa ma skyes pa dang// mo rkang dkris bor nas/ mdzes pa dang chas te

sbyor ba 'bul lo// der mngon du sbyar te/ gsang ba'i sems dang dngos grub lngar 'byung ba rnams bsres la/ sna la bdag nyid mchod par bya// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mo la sbyin/ de nas ma mo gzhan la'ang

sbyin/ de nas tha tshig dam bsres te gsang ba'i gzungs mar dam lung stsal lo// de nas phrag dog spang ba'i phyir// sgrub zla gsum char sbyar nas su/ sgrub zla so so'i dam bsre'o// de nas slan chad ci bya yang mi
'gal te/ bsam dgu 'ong ngo// grub pa'i yon tan ni ma mo gzhan lta ci smos te/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi dang/ thugs gsang ba'i phyi mo yang sring gi tshul du las byed bskul na bran bzhin du

bsgo ba nyan no// he ru ka smis sku man chad bskyed pa tsam gyis 'dar lcug lcug rgyug te 'ong ngo// 'jig rten 'di'i bsam pa ni che phra la mi 'grub pa med do// 'di sgrub pa'i dus su/ dang po gtor ma rnam gsum

gtang// bshags sbyang bya/ tshe rabs kyi lan chags la gtor ma gtang/ dam bskang bar bgyi/ 'di ni nyi zla thod phreng can gyi sgrub thabs so// srid pa bde 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs ni mya ngan las 'das te/ 'gro
ba'i don thugs rje'i 'od kyis mdzad pas/ bsgam pa'i ma mo yin no// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// rigs bzhi'i yum dang ldan byas te// yo byad bzhi yang de bzhin bsham// gsar pa zhing gi mchog ma

bsham// rigs bzhi'i b+han+d+ha yang dag ldan// zhing gi dud pa rgyun mi gcad// mchog gi phur bu bzhi yang dril// dung chen phreng ba yang dag bgrang// stag lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// shun chen g.yang gzhi de

bzhin gsol// rgyu ma dril pa'i zhags pa sdog/ chu dang ma 'dres dwangs ma'i khrag/ dam rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// rtse gsum g.yab mo thogs nas su// bsgrub cing brten pa'i lha mo'o// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i

dbang mo che ni/ rdo rje'i rigs la dbang byed ma// sku mdog dkar mo la g.yu'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' la rdo rje'i ga 'ur 'khyil ba/ ma chas pa'i sbyor bas srid pa

'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na zhing gi g.yab mo bsnams shing/ bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud pa/ ma rgyan gyi rgyal mo la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can
