no// rdo rje khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ rin chen rigs kyi dbang mo che ste/ sku mdog sngon mo la/ nor bu rin po che'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rin po che'i mche bas gtsigs pas/ 'od zer sngon po

phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ gsang ba'i mkha' rin po che'i ga'ur bskyil ba/ rgyu ma bsgril ba'i zhags pa 'phen pas/ bdud dang mu stegs 'ching ba/ ma dbyings phyug ma la 'khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs

can de/ rin po che rigs kyi bdag mo yin no// rdo rje pad+ma khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ pad+ma rigs kyi dbang mo ste/ sku mdog dmar mo bse'i lan phran can/ spyan gsum bye ru'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i

mkha' byi ru'i ga 'ur bskyil ba/ 'od zer dmar po nub phyogs dbang du sdud pa/ khrag gi dngas ma 'thor zhing bdud dang mu stegs kyi snying 'byin pa gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas srid pa la 'khyud pa/ ma bdag
nyid la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje srid pa'i bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ las kyi rigs kyi dbang mo che ste/ sku mdog ljang gu la rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa
can// spyan gsum rdo rje rgya gram gyi mche ba can/ 'od zer ljang gus byang phyogs dbang du sdud pa/ lag pa na g.yang gzhi rdeb pas// bdud dang mu stegs kyi mgo gcod pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' bse'i ga 'ur

bskyil ba/ grub pa'i sbyor bas khams gsum dbang du sdud pa/ ma gcig ma la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// bzod pa gsol zhing dbyangs snyan pos bskul ba ni/ hUM che zhes khros pa'i
dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo g.yu yi ral pa can// spyan gsum rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs// zhing gi g.yab mos mu stegs sgrol// shel gyi ga 'ur gnas rigs 'cha'// gnyis med sbyor bas khams gsum

'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing srid pa'i gsos// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ser mo rin chen ral pa can// spyan gsum
rin chen mche ba gtsigs// rgyu ma mkhal ba'i zhags dril gyis// bdud dang mu stegs thams cad 'ching// rin chen ga 'ur gnas rigs 'cha'// mi len sbyor bas srid pa 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun

la khyab// yum la khro zhing kun la khyab// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo bse yi ral pa can// spyan gsum byi ru'i mche gtsigs ma// khrag gi dngas
mas bdud dpung 'joms// byi ru'i ga 'ur gnas rigs 'cha'// gnyis med sbyor bas khams gsum 'khyud// yum la khro zhing rnal 'byor skyong// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM che zhes khros pa'i

dbang mo che// sku mdog ljang gu sgeg ma la// rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can// spyan gsum mche ba rgya gram gtams// kha T+wAM g.yang gzhis mu stegs sgrol// rdo rje ga 'ur gnas rigs bca'// grub pa'i sbyor bas

'jig rten 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing sems can skyong// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bskul lo// sgrub pa la zhugs pa dang rgyu gcig bsgral/ zhag gsum nas
gcig bsgral/ zhag bdun na gcig bsgral/ zhag bcu gcig gi nub mo gsang ba'i yum du dam bca'/ gsum gyi nub mo sgra chen po 'byung zhing/ me chen po 'bar ro// bdun gyi nub mo nam mkha' la sna tshogs

pa'i ral pa thibs se 'byung ngo// de lta bu dag byung ba dang/ bdag nyid dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad ste// zhabs brgyad lha la de bzhin brdzis// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs
bsnams// zhing gi na bza' rlon pa la// sbrul dang thod pas yang dag brgyan// dbang gi ngang las bsnyen pa bya// dgu la mngon du byung ba dang// bdag nyid dpa' bo sgeg pa yi// ting nge 'dzin du
gsal ba dang// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma bsdu// de nas lha mos chags sems kyis// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba 'bul// gus pa'i tshig gi snyan sgrogs pa// dpa' bo sgeg pa ye shes sku// rdo rje gsang

ba'i dkyil 'khor du// pad+ma gsang ba'i mchod 'bul gyi// dgyes pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// chags pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs// de skad bstod nas sbyor ba 'bul// der ni bdag dang mngon sbyor te// drod

kyis byang chub sems nyid dang// rak+ta'i dngas ma bsres nas su// sna la bdag nyid gtso mo mchod// de nas sgrub zla bzhi char sbyin// de nas sgrub pa'i ma mor sbyin// de nas dam bsre mna' bsgag nas// rtog
pa'i phrag dog spang ba'i phyir// sgrub zla bzhi dang bdag sbyar te// kun dang dam bsre mna' bsgag go/ gtor ma gzhan ni gong ma bzhin// 'di 'grub na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du

'grub la// lhur yang tshe dang sri'u la mkhas so// ma mo 'og nas 'byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos ma mo bzhi yang bran mor 'khol lo// de ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i sgrub thabs so// de bzhi'i ma bzhi sgrub tu

skyon ci ste// spyir bu mo bzhi bsgrub na bu mos ma 'khol pas/ sgrub lhag par mi dgos so// da ni thugs kyi dgyes ma bzhi'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/ de ni rta'i lo la tshes bdun la bsham// brgyad la 'jug ste// nya'i

bar du bsgrub par bya'o// de'i yo byad btsal ba// dkar mo mig gcig b+han+d+ha ni// zlum po pad+ma chags pa dang// 'jam la ri mo nyung ba ste// gtsug tu bu ga byung ba de// dkar mo chen mo'i phyag na bsnams// ljon

shing lcang los rab tu brgyan// ljon shing lta bu'i rtsa yod pa// ma mo chen mo'i phyag na bsnams// pad+ma 'dab brgyad rtsar bris pa// a dkar gtsug na yod pa ni// ma mo dbang sgyur phyag na bsnams// dum bu
gnyis su 'dug pa la// rdo rje rgya gram rtsar bris pa// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsnams// gtsug srubs nang du rub pa las// rtsa rnams gtsug tu bcings pa la// hUM chen dgur ni 'bar ba ste// dpal chen

nyid kyis phyag na bsnams// zhes 'byung ste// b+han+d+ha de lnga ldan pa dang// shel gyi rgya bzhi yang dag bsogs// gnyan po chas su zhugs pa dang// gzhan yang dam rdzas sna tshogs pa'o// slag pa chen po gtso bo
ste// zhwa dkar pos yang dbu brgyan no// 'jig rten gzungs bzhi'i rigs bstan pa// sha mdog dkar la mdog bzang ba// so tshags dam la smin dkyus ring// dkar mo mig gcig tshul du snang// brtson
'grus can la drag shul che// ral pa can la ha ri'i mig/ nag mo ral pa can ltar snang// sha mdog dmar la mdangs sdug pa// smra ba snyan la 'gro ba sdug/ dmar mo dbang sdud tshul du

snang// sug bzhi ring la mche ba rno// sha mdog sngo la brtul zhugs che// ser mo las mkhan tshul du snang// yum bzhi'i gzungs dang ldan byas te// yum bzhi'i bsnyen pa so sor bgrang// bdag nyid man ngag

sems ldan pas// bzhi char bsnyen pa gcig tu drangs// brtan dbyangs snyan pos bskul ba ni// hUM shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' tshil chen dud pa la// b+han+d+ha rlon pa'i dril bus brgyan// lan phran
zhag gis 'dril ba la// dung gi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// dung chen 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// zhag gi lan phran bsags pa yis// steng du ya bdud btul

zhing 'ching// bar du brgya byin phung bar byed// 'og tu dmyal khams stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na// nag mo chen po mche ba can// na bza' zhing
lpags go zu la// b+han+d+ha skam pa'i dril bus brgyan// rdo rje'i lan phran rin chen brgyan// lcags kyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// lho phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// shes rab thabs kyi thod gdengs

can// dri chen lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du ma hA de ba 'ching// bar du gshin rje phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i nub

phyogs nas// dmar mo chen mo dbang sgyur ma// na bza' rak+ta'i go zu la// sbrul nag 'khrigs pa'i chun 'phyangs can// pad+ma rak+ta'i lan phran can// mche ba dkar po gtsigs pa yi// nub kyi srid gsum phur
pas 'debs// mi khrag 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// rak+ta'i len phran bsags pa yi// steng du tshangs pa chen po 'chings// bar du klu yi nad rigs 'joms// 'og tu yi dwags stongs par byed// ma

g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs na// ser mo chen mo las mkhan mo// mdzes pa'i na bza' chen mo ni// mAM sa rlon pa'i thul pa la// dri chu khol ma'i ya bas bskor// len
phran dra chu 'bar bar 'gyur// gser gyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// byang phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// mAng sa spungs pa'i thod gdengs can// dri chu'i lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du tshogs kyi
bdag po bcings// bar du gnod sbyin phung bar byed// 'og tu bgegs rigs stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// gling bzhi gsang ba'i gzungs gcig ma// bdud rtsi rnam lnga dbu la
rdzogs// g.yas na g.yang gzhi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnam lcags chen pos 'debs// mu stegs nag po'i snying 'byin ma// g.yon na b+han+d+ha khrag 'dzag pas// bud med thams cad dbang du

sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor skyong ma// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i 'khor mnga' zhing// sgrub pa po la brtser dgongs ma// 'dir byon sgrub pa'i rtags phyung shig/ ces bskul ba dang// zhag bzhi'i nub mo dngos grub

kyi rtags dang po// rak+ta dang/ tshil chen dang/ mchog gtub pa b+han+d+ha dang bzhi'o// dgu'i nub mo b+han+d+ha pad+ma rak+ta dang/ snang srid sbyor ba'i byang chub sems la sogs pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang ldan nas yar 'ong

ngo// dga' ba ma skyes par myur du longs spyad do// de'i nub mo rgyu bzhi yang der bsgral lo// bdun gyi nub mo bzhi char sku mngon du ston pa ni rgyan dang cha lugs su ldan pa/ shin tu yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa'i

lha mo bzhi 'ong ngo// bdag man ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// stegs pa'i mdangs phyung ste/ ge sar gyi rak+ta dbang du sdud la// pad+ma'i nang du rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcas la// rim pa bzhin du zla

gam 'byed cing sbyor ba 'bul lo// de ltar sbyar te gong ma bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas phyi de nub mo// mchog phran chas su stsal ba bsgral ba dang/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i dngos grub kyang der ster ro// 'di
bzhin ni 'go la phrag dog chung// dbang che la gsang ba dam la rub ste// bsam dgu yid bzhin du 'grub pa yin pas// gsang ba'i dgyes sde mor lung stsal te bzhag go/ de man chad ci bya yang mi dgos

te// sbyor ba yang dus su 'bul lo// las kyang tshul bzhin du byed do// sgrub pa la 'jug pa'i tshul ni gong ma dang 'dra'o// 'di ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo gsang ba'i yang phyi mo bzhi'i sgrub thabs so// 'di yan

chad kyi ma mo grub na/ tshe 'di'i yon tan gyis lta ci smos/ phung po 'jig pa'i dus su yang/ glu dbyangs dang rol mo la sogs pa 'od dang rtags mang pos bsu nas/ bde ba can gyi gnas su sgrub mi dgos par

skyel lo// 'di yan chad kyi ma mo grub na/ 'di man chad kyi ma mo thams cad rang bzhin grub pas 'og ma lhag par sgrub mi dgos so// 'di ni ma mo'i gtso mo rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// de nas ma bdun sgrub par 'dod na/ gnas dur khrod du song la/ yum rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan dang ldan pa gsum/ dbang rdzogs pa'i slob dpon gnyis dang ging gcig gis bsgrub ste/

b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa skam po bdun gyi gsum du bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ma bsgrub pa'i skam po stsal/ gsum du 'jig rten gyi sman sna tshogs pa stsal/ gcig tu byang chub kyi sems dang rak+ta nyid tshe stsal/ b+han+d+ha rin
po che mtshan dang ldan pa gcig tu bdud rtsi a mr-i ta stsal/ shel lding dkar nag gsum tsa ra nag po gsum/ shel dkar po gcig/ ku ku ra dkar po gcig nam mkha' lding gcig/ mchog chen

gyi sman pa ma sbram po gcig/ chas gos thams cad nag por bsgyur te/ gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad pa phyung la/ 'dzab drang ba dang/ zhag bdun na sgra chen po 'byung/ der rgyu zung gcig bsgral la mchod pa

bya/ ma'i tshul du bsnyen/ zhag dgu na mi sdug pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'ong/ der zung gcig bsgral/ zhag bcu gnyis na nyin mtshan 'byung ste/ der zung gcig bsgral/ sring mo'i tshul du brten/ bco lnga la ma mo
bdun char mngon du phyung bdag dam ma nyams na mdzes pa dang ldan par 'ong/ nyams na nag mo ral pa can mes tshig tshig byed pa/ mche ba dmar tsar re 'dug par 'ong ste/ bdag man ngag gi ting nge 'dzin

gsal na dbang du bsdu/ mi gsal na bzod par gsol te/ bskang bar bya/ man ngag dang ldan na dang po mi sdug pa las kyang sdug pa'o// dang po nas sdug na pad+ma dbang du bsdus la/ nga rgyal bskyed de/ sru

mo'i tshul du bsten no// der phyag 'tshal zhing 'o na dpon zer zhing 'o byed do// de nas pad+ma'i rak+ta hUM gis rngubs pa dang/ rgyan bor te gzungs ma gsum dang bcur byas te/ mel tshe thun re la gnyis gnyis kyis

sbyor ba 'bul/ sna la gtso mo dang sbyor/ de nas 'khor dang sbyar ro// de nas yo byad sna tshogs dang/ sbyor ba'i byang chub sems gnyis gnyis kyis 'dod pa bzhin du dam bsres te/ nga yi brnag pa'i las rnams

kun// bka' yang sgrub ces pho brang slas// bran mo yin pas mna' ma za// zhes lung stsal lo// de phyin chad bran mo bzhin du las byed do// da ni sbas pa'i ma bzhi bsgrub par bya ste/ yo byad gong ma kun gyi steng

du/ zhing gi g.yang gzhi/ zhing gi rgyu zhags srid pa spyi blugs kyi zhwa ral pa can/ dung chen dang/ bye ru dang/ gser g.yus brgyan pa/ zhing chen gyi rdza rnga thogs te bsgrubs pa dang/ rtags gong ma dang mthun/ sgrub

pa'i thabs gong ma dang tshul gcig/ yon tan ni ma bdun man chad kun 'khol lo// des bsam pa 'grub/ lhur yang dgra la rbad pa bzang ngo// da ni e ka tsa ti bsgrub par bya ste/ stegs bu gru bzhi pa gcig gi

steng du/ gra phying gtsang ma gcig bting la/ dam rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dmar gtor gcig gi nang du// sman g+hi haM stsal/ dar dmar po kha gcig gis bcad la kha nub phyogs su bltas te/ zhag bdun du
bsnyen pa bgyis la/ yum mtshan dang ldan pa la dbab po// bskul ba ni/ hUM srid pa'i byan mo g.yar dam can// skye 'gro ral gcig 'jig rten sgrol// mi gnas khrag 'thor stong khams bsreg/ kha nas me 'bar
rgya mtsho skems// ma byung pa yi dus mtha' nas// 'jig rten las kyi dbang bsgyur te// sems can don la rab tu brtson// snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brtse ba'i shugs kyis gshegs su

gsol// zhes bskul ba dang/ yum mtshan dang ldan pa la phab ste dris na/ snang srid kyi gtam smra'o// da ni ma mo spun gnyis sgrub pa bstan te/ hUM ma mo chen mo yal gam can// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dpal mo
btsan// gnam phyed gos su gon pa mo// sa phyed gdan du bting ba'i bdag/ 'khor ni gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// chibs su gser gyi sha ba chibs// mgo la g.yu yi rwa bcu 'bar// phyag na gser gyi dril

zhags bsnams// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// che zhes sring gcig ma g.yel zhig/ da ni nu mo chung ngu bskul lo// hUM ma mo chen mo yal gam can// dun ting g.yu yi go lcog la// gser dang g.yu yi cod
paN can// g.yu yi dril zhags 'bum gyis brgyan// chibs su dung sha dkar po bcibs// khas blangs dam bca' bsnyel lam ci// bskul lo ma bzhengs da tshul byon// gser skyems gar bu de yi rten// byes
yul gar 'gro yang bsam pa 'grub po// hUM he dun te hUM/ 'di gsum nang du mi bsten bcos dka'// ma mo phyi ma rnams ni zhal nas gsungs pa'i sgrub thab yod na phrag dog che la bcos dka' ste/ blo chung
rnams kyi don du mi rung ste 'dir ma gsungs so// sgrub thabs tha ma'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// da ni ma mo dbang du sdud pa'i le'u 'chad de/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ye shes rang
bzhin sman mo rnams// rtogs pas ji ltar dbang du bsdu// man ngag nges bstan ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka'

stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// yul dang dngas ma rtsa rnams las// rigs kyi ma mo la sogs te// gu h+ya gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang// rkyen gyi ma sring bsgom par bya// des ni ma mo dbang du
sdud// dbang du sdud pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten dbang chen 'di rnams kun// srog chags kun la gnod bgyid pas// bskang ba'i cho ga ji ltar
lags// 'jig rten mgon la bdag mnyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul yang dag pa// sarba rU pas thams cad bskang// bskang

bzlog chen po'i las zhes bya// ma hA shan ti mi g.yo rdzogs// zhi rgyas chen po'i las zhes bya// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// de la sarba rU pa'i thabs gnyis te// sna tshogs pa yi 'bru sna la// ngar phye bre gang
btag nas su// snang srid gzugs su byas nas ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i byin rlabs kyis// rnam shes tshang bar bsgom byas te// sna tshogs spyan gzigs dkor chas brgyan// khams gsum sems

can thams cad la// lus ngag glud du bsngos byin te// tshe dpal pho nyas bkug byed pa// de ni phyi yi cho ga yin// g+hu ma sarba rU pa ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bru sna la// ngar phye bre gsum bcal nas ni// rin chen sna
tshogs phye bdar te// sum cha gcig la ri rab gzugs// rigs su mthun pa'i kha dog bya// de nas ngar phye gsum cha la// gcan gzan rgyal po drug gi gzugs// dkar la mdzes dang ldan par bya// rtsal gyi

rgyal po drug po la// mdzes ldan g.yeng gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// srog chags gtso bo drug po zhon// shugs kyi rgyal po drug po la// kha dog ldan zhing rgyan chas brgyan// 'dod chags gtso bo drug po zhon// 'dod
chags gtso bo drug po la// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// sems can rgyal po de dag kun// spyan gzigs dkor chas yang dag ldan// ri rab bar rim dang po la'o// gtso mo drug la dbul bar bya'o// de
nas ngar phye sum cha la// glang chen gzugs ni bcu bzhi dang// stag gzigs la sogs bcu bzhi dang// mdangs ldan bya yi gzugs can dang// 'dab chags rgyal po bcu bzhi dang// dkar mo ku ku ra tsa'i
gzugs// srog chags gzugs ni de dag kun// ri rab bang rim bar ma la'o// ma mo bcu bzhi'i rdzas yin no// de nas ngar phye sum cha la// snang srid sems can gzugs su byas// sna tshogs kha dog yang dag

ldan// ri rab bang rim tha mar bzhag/ sna tshogs zas dang gos su ldan// srid pa chags byed la sogs te// sman mor grags pa kun gyi rdzas// ri rab bum pa'i rtse mo la// sna tshogs dar gyi rgyal mtshan lnga// gru

bzhi dbus dang lnga la'o// dkyil du dmar po dar gyi gdugs// gser skyems phra man skyogs lnga ste// dbus su bswe yi bya'o gang// stegs bu gru bzhi dri zhim ldan// rak+ta dza gad maN+Da la// sna tshogs me tog

gcal bkram ste// de yi steng du gtor ma bzhag/ de las pags pa'i maN+Dal la// rdzas dang ldan pa'i dmar gtor bsham// dbus su dpal gyi mtshan pa la// mda' dang dar sna rgyu zhags ldan// phud dang rak+ta

sman sbyar ba'o// sngags mkhan chas su bya ba ni// dmar po nag po sngon po gzung// zhag gsum bsnyen pa byas nas ni// bla med ting 'dzin gsal bar bya// yang na che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing nag ral
pa can// dbu gsum pa la phyag kyang drug/ dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar te// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje la// bar ma zhing gi dbyug pa la// tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pa yis// khams gsum ma mo dbang du
sdud// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+d+ha la// bar ma zhing gi g.yab mo las// ma mo thams cad 'gugs 'dren pa'o// tha ma dung chen ga'u la// gnam lcags gzer gyis gdams pa yis// mi phyugs gnyis

ka'i tshe dang g.yang// yi ge hUM du sdud pa ste// yum yang dug gsum dbang sdud ma// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang 'dra// gnyis su med par mchod pa 'bul// dpal che mchog he ru ka dang dbang mchog he ru ka

yab yum 'dud pa'i mchod pa 'bul bar bsam la/ phra men yan chad 'khor du bzhag pa'i bsnyen pa ni/ hUM shrI he ru ka kro tI shwa rI s+t+waM/ ha he phaT/ ma ma yo gI ni ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ zhag gsum bar du 'bum bzlas
shing// de nas bskang bzlog gtor ma gtang// gong du lpags pa'i dmar gtor la// che mchog he ru la sogs pa// dpal gyi 'khor tshogs mchog tu mchod// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag
'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// dkar nag dmar pa'i zhal mnga' ba// phyag drug phyag chas skye shi sgrol// sbrul chen zhags pas ma tshogs bkug/ g.yang gzhi g.yang mos thams cad 'dul// dug gsum dbang du
sdud pa'o// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// khro bo'i tshogs kyis mchod pa ste// thugs rjes dbyings nas rol par mdzod// ces bstod pa la sogs pa dang dpal gyi tshogs gzhung bzhin mchod// bshags

sbyangs bgyis nas phrin las bcol lo// de nas ma mo rnams kyi srog gi snying po bsdus te// a mr-i ta la bden pa bdar/ bdag nyid che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed// hUM nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// khams gsum snying

khrag kun gyi bdag/ nga ni rus 'cha' chen po ste// khams gsum keng rus dur khrod bdag/ nga ni sha za chen mo ste/ khams gsum mAM sa kun gyi bdag/ nga ni skye 'gro dbugs kyi bdag/ nga ni skye 'gro'i bkrag gi
bdag/ ma mo kun gyi re gnas yin// ma tshogs bskang bzlog gtor ma long// tshe dang dbang thang mngon par spel// spos rgod dud pa btang nas kyang// gtor ma bsngo ba 'di skad do// hUM ma tshogs ni gnyan

mchod phyir// 'bru sna ni mang po dang// rin chen ni sna tshogs las// gling bzhi yi gtor ma la// srog chags ni mang pos bskor// kun kyang ni rin po che'i// rgyan dang ni cha lugs ldan// 'jig rten ni zas kyis
bskor// dgon pa yi rdzas kyi brgyan// mu men gyi stegs bu la// rin chen ni gcal bkram ste// by-i ru yi skas btsugs nas// spos kyi ni sa gzhi la// dbang gi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// dar dkar gyi yol bres
nas// gsal ba yi me bus nas// rgyal mtshan ni sna tshogs btsugs// le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkab// dud pa ni gnyan phyung zhing// gser gyi ni skyems bltams te// tshe srog gi skyin du 'bul// chus srid
kyi glud du 'bul// longs spyod kyi skyin du 'bul// 'dir byon ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo'i tshogs kyi rgyal mo

ste// srid gsum yongs la mnga' mdzad mo// skye 'gro yongs kyi za byed ma// na bza' stong gsum g.yang gzhi la// thod rlon mang po'i phreng ba can// lag na snying gi longs spyod mo// 'dir byon tshe srog glud
bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// shar phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo sprin chen go zu la// lag na gser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa gsum gyi
rus 'cha' ma// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hUM rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// lho phyogs sa khams mnga' bdag mo// nag mo g.yu yi go zu can// bskal pa

me yi 'od 'bar zhing// phyag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// srid pa gsum gyi drod 'bebs te// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe 'phrog ma// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hUM

pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar po khrag gi go zu la// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// skye 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos
bdag chen mo mdos zhes shig/ hUM las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// lag na ne'u le'i rkyal pa thogs// ser po rlung gi go zu can// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs 'phrog
ma// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hUM nam mkha'i rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// mthing nag nam mkha'i go zu can// gser gyi

dril zhags bsdog cing 'phen// skye 'gro kun gyi bkrag 'phrog ma// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i zom rtse nas// snang srid srog gi phung
sogs bdag/ sku mdog mthing ga chen mo la// dbu dang spyan ni cir yang ston// rin chen ral pa sna tshogs kyis// snang srid kha dog gsal mdzad ma// spyan gnyis mdzes pa'i mchi ma yis// g.yas pas snang
srid dbang du sdud// g.yon pas skye 'gro'i gsos mdzad ma// lnga bcu rtsa bdun rje mo ste// skye 'gro kun gyi mnga' mdzad ma// ma mo chen mo gshegs nas kyang// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud

bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM che zhes chen mo dkar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa bsngog cing 'phen// sprul pa chen mo'i ming nas
phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM che zhes dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs// srid pa gsum char sgrol mdzad ma// lag na shel gyi spu
gri thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM che zhes nag mo khrag 'thung ma// srid pa gsum char dbang du sdud// lag
na thod pa khrag gis bkang// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM che zhes dmar mo bdud rtsi'i bdag/ srid pa gsum gyi gsos
mdzad ma// lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes zhig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM che zhes ljang nag gnas nyul ma// srid

pa gsum char gsang bar sbyor// lag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes zhig/ hUM mtshan ni srid pa

rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// phung byed nag mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag mo chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo ste// lag
na mi yi dbyug pa thogs// phung byed nag mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo ste// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi
rdebs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM gling bzhi mgyogs ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa shar gyi mnga' bdag

mo// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig mo// lag na b+han+d+ha zlum po thogs// skye bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM srid pa lho yi mnga'

bdag mo// nag mo chen po mche ba can// lag na b+han+d+ha sul mang thogs// srid par byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM srid pa nub kyi

mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo la// lag na b+han+d+ha lcang lo can// 'ching bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM srid pa byang
gi mnga' bdag mo// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na b+han+d+ha rgya gram thogs// len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ da de'i
khol mo la bsngo bar bya ste// hUM srid pa yongs kyi za ba mo// shan shan ne'u le tshogs kyi rje// gos su mi lpags rlon pa gyon// mtha' ma mi mgo steng gis bskor// srid pa kun gyi bdag nyid

ma// zangs skongs na tsha'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ huM ha la ha la'i gdong brgya mo// srid pa kun gyi khyim bdag mo// stag lpags g.yang
gzhi gos su gyon// he ru ka sni'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM 'jig rten kun gyi byan mkhan mo// sprin dkar mdzes pa'i go zu can// lag

na mi yi pags pa thogs// e ka tsa ti ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM cha phyed sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig khu 'phang go zu la// tshe dang g.yang la

sku 'phrog byed// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM cha byed chen mo dkar mo la// lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// gling
bzhi nyul byed ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// cha byed dkar mo sgegs la// lag na rdo rje kha
T+wAM thogs// har ting dkar mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM cha byad nag mo sgeg ma la// lag na me yi 'khor lo thogs// dun ting nag
mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM cha byad dmar mo sgeg ma la// lag na chu yi 'khor lo thogs// shan ting dmar mo'i ming nas
phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM cha byed ser mo sgeg ma la// lag na rlung gi 'khor lo thogs// grub ting ser mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo
mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo ste// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// kha rje za kha'i bdag mo ste// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes

shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM dngos po cha byed nag mo la// 'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can// sku stod stag lpags g.yang gzhi la// sku smad zangs kyi zhabs ma can// mi phyugs gsod pa'i khram

bam thogs// khyod ni 'dod khams gtso mo ste// gshin rje ma chen ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM lha chen brgyad kyi ma chen mo// srin po chen mo
rkam mo dang// srin mo rab tu bskul ma dang// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// srin mo chen mo dri 'dod dang// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma// srin mo chen mo sha

za mo// 'jig rten khams gsum 'khrug byed cing// srog chags kun la gnod byed la// mkhal ma snying dang nang khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang nas su// rang gi rang la thim par ston// za zhing rnam pa kun
tu rgyug/ ma bdud chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM shar phyogs khams nas kun tu rgyug/ mi mgo'i phor pa khrag gis bkang// grang
sgor 'thor zhing nad 'bebs ma// ma bdud chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM gling bzhi kun tu rgyug 'gro ste// sa 'og kun nas snom
byed ma// 'jig rten mi bzad za ba mo// sa bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM nag mo chen mo hal hal mo// thab dang gzhob kyi

bsdong zla mo// ma yams chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM gling bzhi kun gyi rgyug 'gro ma// phyogs bzhi dag na sring mor grags// sring

mo chen mo pho nya'i tshul// pho nya chen mo ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM gzhan yang dbang phyug ma dang brtan ma yang brjod// gtor ma yang

gtong// 'khar rnga rdung ste/ glu snyan po'i dbyangs kyang blangs nas su/ dur khrod dang ni ri rtser bskyal// man ngag ldan pas tshe dpal drangs// des ni bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub// de skad ces ni bka' stsal
nas// lha rnams 'chi bas 'jigs 'gyur te// rab tu dngas nas skrag gyur nas// gnod 'dul lha yis 'di skad gsol// lha la srog ni mchis gyur na// 'di bsten cho ga'i phan yon dang// 'jig rten mi la
ji ltar bsgrags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di bsten phan yon bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten mi la sgrogs pa ni// lha mo yongs 'khyud bde ba'i skal// lha rnams khyed kyis bsgrags mi
dgos// gling bzhi spyi mdos chen mo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// cho ga 'di bsten phan yon gang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// yang dag rdzogs kyis
bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// lha rnams srog ni 'jig gyur na// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// srid gsum dbang chen 'di bskangs na// dus min 'chi ba bzlog
para'agyur// dus la bab pa'ang bsnur bar nges// 'jig rten longs spyod brtan par 'gyur// rabs rgyud chad pa'i lha dang mi// cho ga 'di la rten byed na// spun bzhi bu mis 'du bar nges// cho ga

di la rten byed na// 'chi bdag zhags pas zin nges na// zhags pa nag po chad nas su// smyo 'bog nyid kyang rnam par 'jig/ tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// 'jig rten 'di na bde skyid de// rig 'dzin sa
la de bzhin gnas// cho ga 'di la rten byed na// bran g.yog 'gab rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan ma rnams kyis bkur sti zhing// rgyal po lta bur che bar 'gyur// cho ga 'di la rten byed pa// dbul po nor
phyugs 'phel ba dang// skyid pa rtag cing bsam pa 'grub// dbyig la sogs pa rtag tu rnyed// dmangs pos phyogs bzhir yul yang zin// des na mya ngan sdug bsngal med// pha rol dmag dpung rnam par
'jigs// lo phyugs rtag tu legs par 'gyur// cho ga 'di la rten byed na// 'jig rten dbang chen thams cad kyis// byang chub sems ltar bkur sti zhing// tshe dang chus srid 'phel ba dang// bsgo ba'i tshig
rnams bran bzhin nyan// 'di yi yon tan bsod nams kyis// phyi ma'i dngos grub mchog yin te// bsod nams nyid du gong na med// 'di la yon tan brjod mi lang// de skad gsungs pas lha rnams
dga'o// mdos kyi phan yon gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang chen mo rnams bskang ba yis// dbang byed pho la mi 'tshal lam// rdzogs sangs rgyas

kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags nga rgyal che ba yi// zhe sdang byed la dbang mo che// srid pa'i mo yis 'jig rten bskyed// 'di bskang bskang bzlog cho ga rdzogs// de nas pho rigs bcos 'dod na// stegs bu

gong 'phang mtho dman byed// cho ga'i rdzas ni 'di ltar ro// 'bru sna bcu gsum dang phye la// rin chen sna brgyad bdar nas kyang// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bya// dbang po yan lag rin po che// gsal byed

brgyad kyang de bzhin bzhag/ sna lnga dar gyi tshom bu lnga// lus dang yan lag yang dag brgyan// bdud dang drang dkar chen po dang// de ba nor gyi bdag po ste// gshin rje ru dra'i rdzas yin te// skyes to re la'ang de

bzhin no// bre cha gsang phye bre bzhi la// mkhar thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan// sle'u dar dkar dgu yi rkyen// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang// dkar glud rkyen dang chas pa 'di// dkar po de la de bzhin

no// bre cha gsang phye zla gam la// za 'og mda' yis rnam par brgyan// le brgan leb bzang mda' yis brgyan// de bzhin rin chen sha dang chang// bse glud rgyan dang chas pa 'di// byang shar mtshams su de
bzhin no// nas dang yungs kar don gyi rgyan// srid pa kun la de bzhin te// 'byung po phal la rme gtor byed// de tshe 'di skad brjod par bya// kye dpag bsam shing gi sked pa na// gser mkhar de
ni ser po la// gser sgo de ni thibs se thib// g.yu bad ni sngon pos bskor// de yi ni bdag po ste// skos rje ni drang dkar la// skos mkhan ni ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud

bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ gser mkhar ni dbu rtse nas// rin chen ni stegs bu la// lcags kyi ni mu khyud can// de yi steng na ni// srid pa ni drang dkar ba// zhig 'dzin ni ming nas phyung// mdos bdag
chen mo mdos bzhes zhig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ rim pa ni bcu gsum la// gnam gyi ni steng shed na// lcags mkhar ni sngon po la// gser gyi ni mtha' bskor zhing// zangs kyi ni sgo gsal
ba// de yi ni bdag po ste// dbang phyug ni chen po ste// ma hA ni shwa ri'i dag/ nag po ni chen po ste// ya bdud ni ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes

shig/ de yi ni gling phran la// yar gyi ni yar la shod// bdud pas ni thabs mkhas te// bdud pas ni shugs drag ste// 'gro ba ni kun gyi bdud// 'gro ba yi tshe dpal 'phrog/ skyes bu ni skyes to re// ya bdud
rgyal the'u ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ kye lho phyogs gling na gnas pa ste// rus mkhar gling dgu'i bdag po ste// 'chi bdag kun gyi khram
'debs ma// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ gnam gyi mthongs na gnas pa ste// 'dzam bu'i gling gi nor gyi bdag/ ma hA
de ba lha chen po// btsun mo u ma de bI bcas// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ byang phyogs gnam gyi mthongs na gnas pa

ste// dung mkhar de ni dkar po la// g.yu yi ni mtha' bskor te// bse yi sgo bstsal ba// de yi ni bdag po ste// khyab 'jug dung gi thor tshugs can// gnam lha dkar po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo
mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ byang shar gyi mtshams shed nas// bse mkhar ni gling dgu na// dngul gyis ni mtha' bskor zhing// lcags kyi ni sgo bstsal ba// de yi ni bdag po
ste// shar phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ tshangs thur lus la thor tshugs can// btsan 'gong rgyal po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ sa
btsan rol pa skya rol po// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ btsan la sogs pa de bzhin no// da ni ma hA shan ting gi cho ga bshad par bya ste// gtsang phye khal

phyed la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te// dkor cha spyan gzigs yang dag ldan// de ni phyi rgyud shan+tiM ngo// de la 'jig rten shas bskangs te// dmar gtor dam rdzas ldan pa ni// shan+tiM gsang ba'i

cho ga'o// bsnyen pa'i gnas ni dben sa ru// gru bzhi spos chu'i maN+Dal la// zas kyis steng du gang ba ste// bsngos nas de bzhin gzhag par bya// ming rgyud mthun te dkar po'i gos// gsang ba mthun te gnyis
kar 'dra// 'di brtsam bsam pa ma grub na// 'jig rten dbang chen phung bar 'gyur// las rnams kun kyi brnag pa ste// cho ga rdzogs lung chen po ste// gang gis rtogs pa dngos grub ste// ngas gsungs pa
la the tshom med// de skad ces ni bka' stsal pas// 'jig rten dbang chen mngon par dga'// lha rnams thams cad mthu skyes nas// sems can kun la phan par bsgrubs// dam tshig mtha' la gnas par
'gyur// pho mdos kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'gugs dang 'dren pa'i las rnams de// pho nya'i las rnams bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka'

stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid gsum btul ba'i pho nya ni// bdag nyid man ngag ldan byas te// sems kyi dkyil nas bskul ba ni// hUM dpal gyi pho nya bka' sdod ma// khyung gi khra chen lding ba

la// lcags kyi mi mo khyung mo zhon// mgo bo gsum la lag drug ma// g.yas na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bar ma spu gris srid gsum sgrol// tha ma dril zhags mu stegs 'ching// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha rak+ta 'bar// bar ma 'khor
lo bskal pa'i me// tha ma lcags kyu'i 'du 'phro can// gnas ni dur khrod dkyil na bcas// bskungs ni thugs kyi dbus na bskungs// bton ni ljags kyi rtse nas bton// 'gyed ni dam nyams dgra la
'gyed// dbang ni srid pa gsum la dbang// za ni skye 'gro yongs la za// nyul ni gling bzhi kun la nyul// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// rbad ni dngos po gcig la rbad// rgyal po chen pos bdud dpung

'joms// tsham rngams chen pos dgra bgegs sgrol// nga rgyal chen pos mu stegs 'dul// rdzu 'phrul chen pos ri rab bsnyil// khyod ni srid gsum sgrol byed ma// lan 'ga' drag tu bskul ba'i tshe// gang la bya

ba sgrol bar byos// de yi pho nya bka' sdod ma// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can// phyag drug gru gsum spyan mig la// mgo la tshil gyi yib zhu gyon// mtshan ni sprin dkar go lcog can// phyag gnyis pad+ma stong
bzung zhing// mtshan ni 'jig rten dbang sdud ma// g.yas na mi yi rgyu zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs bcings mdzad ma// mtshan ni sbrul chen zhags pa can// g.yon gyi dang po bsnams pa
ni// mi mgo rlon pa'i thod pa ru// mi khrag dron mos bkang nas su// rnam lnga'i bcud dang bsres nas 'thor// sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// mtshan ni bdud rtsi longs spyod ma// g.yas kyi bar mas
bsnams pa ni// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu 'dril// dgra bgegs gnon pa'i las la brtson// mtshan ni gsang ba'i mchog phur can// g.yon gyi tha mar bsnams pa ni// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// mi
snying brgyus pa'i zhags pa yis// srid pa gsum car 'ching mdzad ma// mtshan ni gser gyi dril zhags can// sprul pa'i phyag brnyan rdeb pa yis// mi lcags rlon pa'i g.yab mo yis// khams gsum rdul du
brlag mdzad ma// mtshan ni g.yang gzhi ru mtshon can// sku la mi lpags rlon pa gsol// stong khams thams cad myos mdzad ma// mtshan ni zhing ni na bza' can// kha nas mi khrag rlon pa 'thor// stong

khams thams cad sreg mdzad de// mtshan ni kha nas me 'bar ma// sku la mi mgo se ral kha// skye 'gro thams cad bskangs mdzad ma// mtshan ni me tog chun 'phyang can// 'bar ba gtum chen khro bo 'dul// khro

rgyal chen mo gshin rje'i gshed// bka' yi pho nya mgyogs ma ste// nga rgyal can rnams dbang du bsdud// gang la bya ba rdul du rlog/ 'di ni pho nya'i gtso mo ste// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ngas
gsungs pa la the tshom med// pho nya chen mo'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskang na ji ltar skong// nyag gcig
yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskang ba 'di skad

do// hUM gtso mo yum gyi mngon spyod ma// spyi gtsug g.yu yi rdo rje rtse dgu 'bar// g.yu yi ral bas stong gsum khyab// g.yas kyi phyag na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag na bdud rtsi lnga yi
longs spyod 'byed// ye shes rol pa'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs// khams gsum srid pa gsum la mnga' mdzad ma// rtag tu dbang phyug chen mo grogs mdzod cig/ bltas pa mi mthong gcig kyang med// bskang

ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// shar gyi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i rus la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yis rus pas thugs dam bskang// mthun pa'i rdzas chen 'di
'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par dzod// lho yi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba chu la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi khrag gis bskang byas
na// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// nub kyi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i drod la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi drod
kyis bskang byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi/ bcol pa'i las rnam 'grub par mdzod// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba rlung la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga'
mdzad ma// 'di yi dbugs kyis bskang byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// nam mkha'i rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur
zhing// 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi bkrag gis bskang byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// rgyu bsgral ba'i phung po yis ye shes kyi
mkha' 'gro ma lnga dang gtso bo yab yum bskang ngo// da ni mdos bdag gi ma mo rnams bskang ba ni/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste// sku mdog mthing ga chen mo la// dbu dang zhal
gyis stong khams khengs// rin chen ral pas snang srid gsal// khyod ni 'dod khams gtso mo ste// phud kyi bdag mo'i thugs dam bskang// ye shes tshogs kyi rjai mo ste// gnyis su med par phud kyi
bdag/ bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// dkar mo g.yag thod ral gcig ma// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong nas// khrag gi dri
snoms dmar gyi ro myong ma// ral pa'i zar bu g.yon nas gcig tu 'khyil// srid pa'i sa gzhi g.yo zhing khengs mdzad ma// g.yas na lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa bsngog cing

'phen// g.yon na b+han+d+ha mgo bcad khrag 'dzag ma// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad ma// nyi zla stong gi dbu la brgyan cing klubs// snang srid snying gi bdag mo ste// 'di yi snying gi bskang byas
la// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis las bcol 'grub par mdzod// che zhe dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs// dkar mo ral gcig thugs dam bskang// che zhe nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams
gsum thams cad gsal mdzad ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// che zhe khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum gsang bar thams cad sbyor// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
bskang// srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa thams cad bde la sbyor/ che zhe khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// che zhe bde sbyor khros pa'i

dbang mo che// srid pa thams cad bde la sbyor// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// snang srid kun gyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// mtshan ni dbyings phyug rgyal mo ste// dbyings
phyug rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang// bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo'i thugs dam bskang// mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo ste// lag na zhing gi g.yang zhi thogs// bskang ngo bskal
pa'i thugs dam bskang// da ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo/ 'grub pa'i rtags phyung/ rtag tu dbang phyug chen mo'i grogs// sring gcig shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo mig gcig ral pa can// 'khor ni dkar
mo 'bum sdes bskor// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa lho yi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum sder bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
bskang// srid pa nub kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ste// 'khor ni dmar mo 'bum sder bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo
las kyi gtso// 'khor ni ser mo 'bum sder bcas// thugs dam gnyen po bdag bskang gi/ bskangs la 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de yan chad ni ma mo bcu bzhi'i skong thabs so//// skabs

'dir a phyi chen mo yang mchod par 'byung ba'i don gyis sbyar ro// da ni de'i khol mo rnams sha khrag dmar dang a mr-i tas bskang bar byas te/ srid pa kun gyi khyim bdag mo// he ru kas sni'i thugs dam
bskang// har ting dkar mo'i thugs dam bskang// dun ting nag mo'i thugs dam bskang// shan ting dmar mo'i thugs dam bskang// grub ting ser mo'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa'i gru 'degs chen mo
bzhi// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// lho yi nag mo kha rlan ma// nub kyi dkar mo
bchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// thugs dam gnyen po bdag skongs shig/ bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// e ka dza Ti dpal gyi
yum// lcags kyi so la zangs kyi skra// sna tshogs zhal la zhing sgrol ma// thugs dam gnyen po bdag gis bskang// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// e ka dza ti'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa'i ma mo
bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// sring mo chen mo yum gyi thugs dam bskang// ma mor grags pa kun gyi thugs dam bskang// de ltar nang gi dam rdzas dang ldan par byas te/ shel smug po'am nam

mkha' lding la sogs pa rgyu gang bsgral yang rung ste/ 'byung ba chen po lnga yis ye shes kyi khro mo lnga dang gtso mo bskang ngo// sha khrag dmar dang ting nge 'dzin gyis/ 'khor gyi ma mo'i thugs dam bskang ngo// sgrub pa
po yi bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par nges so// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med ces he ru kas bshad do// le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po
'jig byed cing// lu gu rgyud la 'gal byed cing// sems can kun la gnod bgyid pa'i// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur la// nan tur las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan
'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur te// sems can kun la gnod pa la// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung
drung yang dag pa// ji ltar yid 'thad gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor mtshan dang ldan pa dang// dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha sprod la// dbus su kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// mdzub gsum pa la drag por bris// ze ba
sor bzhi cha snyoms la// 'gugs dang spar 'phang sngags kyis brgyan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha ran la// gnan dang 'phang ba'i sngags kyis bskor// de nas kha ran gru bzhi ni// sor brgyad pa yi tshad du

bya// rdo rje pad+ma spel mar bri// de nas maN+Dal brgyad po la// 'od phung thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// sgo bzhi mkha' bzhis brgyan par bsam// de nas rdzas kyi ngo bo ni// rgyu yi gtso bo dgu bsogs te// grub pa'i
rnal 'byor dgu rbad pa// gnyis la chags 'dzin spun gnyis bri// bdun la ma bdun sngags bris la// drag po'i kha ran bskor ba bzhag/ dbang dang drag por ldan pa yi// lcags zangs shing bu gang yang
rung// dbang drag phur pa dgu po la// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga lnga bzhag/ ngos la rnal 'byor bcu bzhi bsgaum// sked par chags 'dzin la sogs bsam// rtse mor ma bdun bsam nas su// dmigs pa'i dngos
po gang yang rung// dkar nag dkyil du brgyab nas su// dge sdig las kyi mtshams phye nas// dngas ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// gtub nas ma mos zos par bsam// de ltar brgyab na lha yang 'chi// dang
po bdag nyid bsgom bya ba// phra men rgya mtsho nyid kyi sku// dbang drag sku mdog nag mo la// dbu gcig zhal lnga 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu la mkha' 'gro lnga bsgoms shing// mche ba can la gtsigs shing
bzhad// ma mo thams cad dbyings nas 'gyed// phyag na dbang drag phur pa 'dril// 'dren dang mnan dang spar 'phang ba'i// sngags rnams drag tu bzlas nas su// rnal 'byor ma rnams rbad nas
su// gang la bya ba'i dngos po de// dbang drag dkyil du bzung nas ni// rnam shes dbyings su brgyab pa dang// dge sdig las rnams sbyangs nas su// lhu gzugs phral te zos bsam na// rdo rje'i brag kyang
'jigs par 'gyur// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ces bka' stsal pa dang// de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams dang// 'khor de na gnas pa rnams kyi gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te
gar gyi brda phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skadaces gsol to// dbang drag dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dang// dbang drag phur pa'i cho 'phrul dang// 'dren gnon 'phang ba sngags kyi mthu// mgon po chen pos bstan du

gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ci yang mi gsung bar dbang drag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin la zhugs bzhin// badzra bo d+hi dz+wa la maN+Da la ba ga rU tra b+ha ga tra ta/ kro ta

bam kI la ya dza hUM/ nan s+pha ra na yaM/ phaT tsit+ta su khaM/ zhes gsungs pas/ khams gsum thams cad mkha' gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor// gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas khang/ dbang drag gi dkyil
'khor gyur nas/ dbang drag gi phur bu ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro rnams kyis brgyab pas/ steng nas char du 'bebs pas// dbang drag bde ba'i gting khung du// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te/ rigs lnga'i sangs

rgyas dang// lha gnod 'dul kha spub tu brgyal/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor gyi gdengs dkar/ srid pa'i dbang chen mang po ni gan rkyal du brgyal te snying dkar nag gi mtshams su phur bu phog ste/ dge sdig
gi shan phyes nas/ sems kyi ye shes su byin gyis brlabs so// de ltar thams cad brgyal ba sangs pa dang// 'di skad ces ni glu blangs so// dbang drag dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha'// mkha' yi dkyil 'khor
bde gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas su// dbyings nas dbang drag phur bu yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// rang rgyud snying nas drangs nas su// dbang drag mkha' la bzhag nas

kyang// slan chad gsang ba'i dbyings su sbyor// gu h+ya b+ha ga sa ma ya s+t+waM laM maM ma hA tsit+ta ho// zhes gsungs pa dang/ brgyal ba thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor na/ 'dar yed yed
'dug pa rang rang gis tshor/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas gsol pa// dkyil 'khor chen po a la la// dbang drag dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po a la la// 'dre gnon spar
'phang cho 'phrul che// mtshon cha chen po a la la// dbang drag phur bus dge sdig sbyongs// khrag 'thung chen po a la la// bla med khrag 'thung che btsan mchog mkha' 'gro chen po a la la// ye shes
mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i mchog/ ces smras so// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi mchog/ mu stegs thams cad kyi gnyen po bdag nyid lags te/ bdag gi ming yang rdo rje sems dpa'
btags pa lags na bla med bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po ru chu 'phrul gyis/ bdag kyang brgyal bar gyur na/ mi mthun gzhan smos kyang ci 'tshal// dbang drag
dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur bar// bsten pa nyid du bdag nyid bgyid// gsang ba mchog kyang de bzhin 'dzin// zhes gsol to// de nas dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho
'phrul gyis/ mu stegs kA la chen po gdan du bting bar gyur to// sgrub pa'i bar du gcod cing rnal 'byor gyi dgra bgegs gnon pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// rdo

rje rgyal pos bka' stsal ba'i// rgyud lung chen po 'di dag la// skye bo gang zhig yid rang ste// mos pas dngos grub ci ltar 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la ma dad pa'i// skur pa 'debs pa'i skye bo la// rnam smin chad

pa ji lta bu// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// skye bo gang zhig

brtson 'grus pa// lus 'di nyid kyis srid pa brje// tshe 'di nyid la dgongs pa rdzogs// rgyal po bzhin du che bar nges// ngas gsungs pa yi don 'di la// rnal 'byor gang zhig dad mos pa// srid gsum dbang
chen thams cad la// shes rab mig gis bltas pa'i tshe// srid gsum dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong// de la rim gro mchod par byed// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams bran bzhin nyan// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di
la// gang zhig skur pa 'debs pa de// dam sri dmar por skye bar nges// dbang chen kun gyis sdig mthong nas// tshe 'di nyid la smyo 'bog cing// dus min ba ru srog zad nges// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di

la// don med phyal par sgrogs pa de// dmyal ba rdo rjer lhung nas kyang// thar pa'i dus med 'o dod 'bod// slan chad sdom zhes smra bar nges// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// mi dad spangs pa'i sems can
la// gshin rje'i zhags pas bzung nas su// nyes dmigs khram la btab nas su// tshogs kyi bdag la phul nas kyang// lhu gzugs thams cad 'brel par nges// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// skye bo gang
zhig dad mos pa// 'jig rten 'di yi yon tan yang// yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bzhin// 'jig rten phyi ma'i dngos grub dang// thar pa bde ba'i 'bras bu yis// rig 'dzin sa la gdon mi
za// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub kyis// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas

dang/ srid pa phra men rgya mtsho la sogs te/ ma mo stong gi tshogs dang/ lha chen po gnod 'dul la sogs te/ lha g.yung drung gi rigs mang po dang/ rdo rje gzhon nu mo la sogs te/ rig 'dzin gyi bud med rab tu

mang po dang/ he ru ka sni la sogs te/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo dbang mo che mang po dang/ 'jig rten dbang chen rab tu mang po rnams kyang/ gus pas yi rangs te/ thar pa bde ba chen po thob nas/ a la la'i sgra
byung ste/ rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig can du gyur to// 'jigs byed dpal gyi zhal snga nas/ dmod btsug pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// srid pa'i rdzong lung chen mo rdzogs so// cho ga lung bstan rdzogs pa

'di// gang gis rnyed pa dngos grub ste// ma nyams dag na bsam pa 'grub// dam tshig gtsang na rnyed par 'gyur// srid pa gsang ba'i rdzong lung 'di// 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang// theg pa chen por gtsor
len cing// rdo rje slob dpon mchod byed cing// lu gu rgyud la brtse sdom pa'i// skal ldan de dang 'phrad par shog/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol
pa// 'gro ba'i tshe mchog bsdu ba dang// rnal 'byor rnams la phan gdags phyir// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// rnal

'byor pa yi tshe mchog ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad do// de la tshe lung rnam pa mang mchis kyang// lung las man ngag tu bsgrub pas/ mi 'phrogs pa rdo rje nges pa'i tshe/ 'phel 'grib rten gyi tshe dang gnyis

so// de la mi 'phrogs pa rdo rje nges pa'i tshe la/ sgrub pa chen po'i dus la bab ma bab bstan pa dang/ dus la bab na rigs lnga gang du 'gro// yang sgrub pa'i thabs dang/ yon bdag la rgyas par bya ba dang/
bsgrub nas gtams pa'i sa dang/ sngags mkhan nyid la sgrub pa dang lnga'o// de la bsgrub pa chen po'i dus la bab ma bab brtag pa ni/ lus gar lan gnas gang du 'gro ba sgoms pas thag bcad/ dus la bab

na sgrub pa'i thabs ni/ bdag A yu dz+nyA na bin+du a yi thugs gsal ba dang/ tshe yi rigs A yur dz+nyA na dza ra gsal ba gnyis/ bin+du ya'i thugs gsang ba byang chub sems dkar la 'tsher ba dang/ bin du dza
ta'i thugs gsang byang chub kyi sems dmar la dngas pa bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phro 'du las/ gser dngul bsres pa zhun byas pa'i kha dog 'dra ba'i/ 'od zer gyis rigs lnga'i gnas su

khyab par byas te/ rigs lnga thams cad chags pa'i sems bskyed do// gsang ba dgyes pa bskyed nas bde ba'i mchod pa phul lo// rigs lnga zhes bya ba ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga ste/ dung can gyi mkha'

dang/ ban glang can gyi mkha' dang/ pad+ma can gyi mkha' dang/ ri mo can gyi mkha' dang bzhi'o// dbyings ni gsang ba bde ba'i yum grogs mo'i rgyal mo'i// dus chen mo la bab kyang 'di lnga'i mkhar 'gro ba las

ma gtogs pa gzhan med pas 'di lnga la gsang ba bde ba'i mchod pa phul te/ thugs dam bskang la/ ye shes kyi 'phro 'du bsnur ba ni// sgrub bsnur ba'i thabs so// de la bskul ba'i tshig 'di skad do// a ni

ma skyes sku nyid las// gsang ba bde ba'i don byung ba// rdo rje la gnas pad+mo bskyil// ma chags mi ldan 'phro 'du yis// yum gyi thugs dam des bskangs la// 'gro ba'i tshe dang brtan par mdzod// bde ba rgyas

'debs tshe ni rdo rje brtan// bde ba rmongs byed tshe 'di pad+mar bsten// bde ba za byed tshe 'di nges par spel// bde ba tshe 'phel 'gro ba'i re ba skong// bde klong yang pa srid pa kun gyi yum// gang 'dir dus la
bab kyang mkhas pas slar sgyur cig/ de la nyams bsnur la gdags pa'i sar ni slar mkha' dbyings dang lnga nyid gsang ba'i 'phro 'du dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed la gdams so// de la bskul tshig ni/ shar
phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang bskur zhing// sku mdog dkar mo sgeg ma la// spyan gsum dung gi lan tshar can// 'od zer dkar po phyogs bcur 'phro// ma chags thabs la mngon par

rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la shel gyi ga'u bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag ni ga'u nyid la brten// rdo rje rtse gsum shar phyogs dbang du sdud// shel gyi ga 'ur nges pa'i tshe

gdams so// lho phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang sgyur ma// sku mdog sngon mo sgeg ma la// nor bu rin chen lan phran can// spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs mdzad ma// 'od zer sngon po phyogs

bcur 'phro// gnyis su med pa'i thabs la rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la rin chen ga'u bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na nor bu rin chen ke ke ru// g.yon pa ga'u nyid la brten// nor bu rin chen ke ke ru// lho phyogs

'dzam gling dbang du sdud// rin chen ga'ur nges pa'i tshe gdams so// nub phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang sgyur ma// sku mdog dmar po bsgyings pa la// spyan gsum byi ru'i lan phran
can// 'od zer dmar po phyogs bcur 'phro// mi len thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la byi ru'i ga'ur bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na pad+ma'i ga'u brtsegs pa bsnams// g.yon gyi

phyag na ga'u nyid la brten// pad+ma gu brtsegs nub phyogs dbang du sdud// byu ru'i ga'ur nges pa'i tshe gdams so// byang phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang bsgyur zhing// sku mdog ljang gu sgeg

ma la// spyan gsum rdo rje'i lan phran can// 'od zer ljang gu phyogs bcur 'phro// grub pa'i thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la rdo rje'i ga'u bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje bsnams// g.yon pa

ga'u nyid la brten// rdo rje rgya gram byang phyogs dbang du sdud// rdo rje'i ga'ur nges pa'i tshe gdams so// steng 'og bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la mnga' mdzad ma// cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mdog
la// spyan gsum lan phran cir yang 'phro// ched 'ga' g.yu yi ral pa can// 'od zer sna tshogs gling bzhir 'phro// gnyis med brten pa'i thabs la nges par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la g.yu yi ga'u

bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na ru mtshon shing bsnams shing// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha rak+tas bkang nas ga'u nyid la brten// ru mdung zhing gi g.yang gzhis snang srid thams cad dbang du sdud// g.yu yi ga 'ur nges pa'i tshe

gdams so// de nas pad+ma dbang du bsdud la// snying po'i ga'u phyes te/ nges pa'i byang chub sems la gdams so// dngos grub ni gsang bar nod do// de ni tshe gdams pa'o// tshe yon bdag la rgyas par bya ba ni/
pho la a dkar po/ mo la aM dmar skyas byin gyis brlabs la/ thabs dang shes rab kyi 'phro 'du lce la dbab/ de nas tshe rtags mngon par bstim// der bstim nas rtags dang mtshan ma sna tshogs su

snang// der snang zhing gsal ba'i ngo bor 'byung/ de la 'khor kyang de bzhin te// yi ge brgyad kyang 'khor bar bzhag/ las kyi bum par stim par byed// des ni phung po yang dag rgyas// gzugs ni rdo rje ri rab

pas// che bar byin gyis brlabs nas su// cis kyang mi 'jigs brtan par bsgom// de ni rgyas par bya ba'o// tshe sngags mkhan la bsku ba ni// bdag nyid che ba'i lhar bsam ste// 'od kyi 'phro 'du yang bsam
la// rgyun mi 'chad par gyes pa yis// dbyings la sogs pa'i thugs dam bskang// nges pa nyid du gnyis su gsal ba las// a dang e gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par gyes pas/ mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga
yi thugs dam bskang// gcig nas gcig tu gnas gyur te// 'dren pa'i phyag rgyas gsal bar drangs// gsang ba nyid du 'du bar bsgoms// bdag nyid rin chen dkyil 'khor du// thugs ka'i ngo bo gsal
bsgom ste// shes rab dbang gi mchod pa 'bul// dngas ma'i lam du byung nas ni// ye shes sras su bzhag nas ni// ye shes sbas pa'i tshe zhes bya// tshig tu yang/ khro bo'i thugs las bskyed pa'i

'phro 'du ni// A yur+dz+nyA na bin du a ni thabs kyi sku// A yur+dz+nyA na bin du dza ni shes rab gsal// thabs kyi rang bzhin sku mdog dkar ba la// yum gyi tshom du 'od lam lam// g.yas na rdo rje thugs kar
gsor// g.yon pa mkha' la chags pa'i g.yab mo 'dor// yum gyi sku mdog le brgan la// dgyes pa'i rtags su gser gyi 'od zor 'phro// phyag g.yon rdo rje ga'u bsnams// g.yas na le brgyan g.yab mo
'dor/ srid pa dbang sdud yab kyi thugs kar stims shig bin du dza/ de ltar thugs la mchod pa phul nas/ dpal gyi 'khor tshogs kyis bskor te bzhag 'phel 'grib brtan pa'i tshe la don la rnam pa lnga ste/

brtan pa'i tshe nyams ma nyams pa brtag pa dang/ nyams na dgug pa'i thabs/ khugs nas bskur ba dang rgyas par bya ba dang brtan par bya ba'o// de la tshe nyams ma nyams brtag pa ni// pra dang mtshan ma ltas
dang mo phywa yan chad kyis brtag go/ nyams na 'gugs pa'i thabs ni bdag nyid dbang gi he ru kar bsgom la thugs kar ye shes kyi 'od zer spros la/ tshe yi ma mo rnams bskul te dgug go/ dgug pa'i dngos

po ni yi ge nr-i las hUM du dmigs te/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas drang ngo// hUM shar phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// 'byung ba'i lag tu tshe nyams pa// dri za'i lag tu dpal nyams pa// de yi pho nya skyod mdzad de// sku
mdog gser skya spyan gsum ral pa can// phyag ma g.yas na lcags kyu dgus gtams shing// g.yon pa gar stabs g.yab 'dor ma// 'byung po'i lag nas tshe drongs la// dri za'i lag nas dpal skyobs

shig/ lho phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// gshin rje'i lag tu tshe nyams pa// srin po'i lag tu dpal phrogs kyang// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog sngon mo spyan gsum ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na
lcags kyu dgus gtams shing// g.yon pa gar thabs g.yab 'dor ma// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe drongs la// srin po'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ nub phyogs b+ha ga klong yangs su// klu yi lag tu tshe nyams
pa// yi dwags lag tu dpal phrogs na// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog mtshal du spyan gsum ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na lcags kyu dgus gtams shing// g.yon pa gar stabs g.yab 'dor

ma// klu yi lag nas tshe drongs la// yi dwags lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ byang phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yongs su// gnod sbyin lag tu tshe nyams pa// bgegs kyi lag tu dpal phrogs na// de yi pho nya bskyod
mdzad ma// sku mdog ljang gu spyan gsum ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na dril bu dgus gtams shing// g.yon pa gar thasas g.yab 'dor ma// gnod sbyin lag nas tshe drongs la// bgegs kyi

lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ steng gi b+ha ga klong yongs su// ya bdud lag nas tshe nyams pa// rgyal 'gong lag tu dpal phrogs na// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog dmar po khrag gi ral pa can// nyi

zla spyan du mdzad pa'i mthu mo che// g.yas kyi phyag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi bsnams// g.yon na tshangs pa'i mgo bcad khrag 'dzag bsnams// ya bdud lag nas tshe drongs la// bgegs kyi lag nas dpal skyobs
shig/ 'og phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// sa bdag la ni tshe nyams pa// ma bdud lag tu dpal phrogs kyang// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad ma// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na tri shUl
ru mdung bsnams// g.yon pas b+han+d+ha rak+tas bkang ba bsnams// sa bdag lag nas tshe drongs la// ma bdud lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ mtshams bzhi b+ha ga zur bzhi la// btsan 'gong gnas nas tshe nyams

pa// 'brog srin lag tu dpal phrogs kyang// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad ma// rin chen srid 'degs mdzes pa'i za ma tog/ g.yon na dung gi zo ba thogs// g.yon na g.yu yi za ma tog/ btsan 'gong lag nas tshe

drongs la// 'brog srin lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ oM badzra yak+sha b+han+d+ha rak+ta badzra phaT/ hUM nr-i hUM nr-i hUM hUM nr-i dza phaT/ de nas nyams dang sbyar te khugs pa dang/ tshe brtan par bya ste/ 'phel 'grib gyi tshe rten la

bsdus te// tshe rten ci yang rung ba gcig la bstim/ de nas badzra shing gi gi ri gi ri zhes brjod do// tshe rdo rje'i gur du gyur pas bsgom mo// de yi nang du tshe hUM mthing skyar dmigs te/ khro bo ha ya grI was bsrung

bar bsgom/ gur gyi phyi rol du mgo brnyan ma brgyad bsgoms la/ rgyas gdab pa'i tshig bshad byas la rgyas gdab bo// tshig tu yang/ srid pa rgyas 'debs dbang phyug nga yi rgya// de nas gnyis med rol pa'i

bde mchog yum gyi rgya// de nas mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgya// rang byung rgyas gdeb las mkhan rgyas thob shig/ ces brjod la las mkhan mos rgyas gdab bo// rgyas par bya ba ni tshe dpa' bo 'bru lngar dmigs la

phung po lnga la bsdus te/ de nas rgya gram gyis go bgo// de nas rdo rje rkyang pas bka' nan bya/ de'i sngags ni/ sarba mai tri tri kA pA tsi na baM/ dung pur te ro ta rag hUM hUM/ bskul ba ni nges pa'i tshe dang mthun no// rdo
rje tshe'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen thabs kyi ni// dgra bgegs thun la dbab pa'i las// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal//
rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dgra bgegs thun zor dbab pa dang// de yi bskul tshig 'di skad do// hUM gser gyi nam mkha' ser po phyung dkyil
na// gser mtsho ye mo phyung de byang zhig nas// gser mkhar ser po phyung dkyil nas// mnga' dag rje mo su bzhugs na// gnam gyi gtso mo gser gyi rgyal mo bzhugs// phyag na gser phur ser po
bsnams// nan tur dgra la 'phen pa'i tshe// gser gyi phung bu bdun bdun 'phen// gcig ni dpral ba'i mtshams su brdeg/ tshe dang srog gi rten phral ma// gcig ni mig gi dkyil du brdeg/ lta ba kun gyi

bcud 'phrog ma// gcig ni lce yi dkyil du brdeg/ smra ba ngag gi dbang sdud ma// gcig ni dpung mgo gnyis la brdeg/ stobs chen kun gyi rtsal 'phrog ma// gcig ni snying gi dkyil du bsdeg/ tshe srog gnyis

kyi dbang sdud ma// gcig ni pho mtshan dkyil du brdeg/ skye shi gnyis kyi rabs gcod ma// gcig ni pus mo'i dkyil du brdeg/ 'gro ba kun gyi dbang sdud ma// g.yu yi nam mkha' sngon po phyang nge phyang// mnga'

bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// nam mkha' g.yu yi g.yu sku bzhugs// phyag na g.yu yi zor ba sngon po bsnams// dngul gyi nam mkha' dkar po phyang nge phyang// mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// dngul gyi btsun
mo ma bla bzhugs// phyag na dngul zor dkar mo bsnams// zangs kyi nam mkha' dmar po phyang nge phyang// mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// zangs kyi rdo rje dmar po bzhugs// phyag na zangs zor dmar po

bsnams// lcags kyi nam mkha' sngon po phyang dkyil na// dug mtsho nag po phyang dkyil na// mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// srog gi bdud mo chen mo bzhugs// sder mchu mang pos rtsa rgyus 'dren// snying gi
rtsa chen dkrug cing za// ma mo mkha' 'gro las kyi dus// stag gi mgo can ma mo ni// rus mgo sum brgya drug cu 'dral// 'thog cing 'gyed pa'i ma mo yin// las mkhan chen mo las mdzod cig/ rgyud bdag

chen mos rgyud bskul cig/ ma mo zor mkhan chen mo ni// tsin+da ma ni'i sngags zlo zhing// mu stegs phung po bshig byed ma// 'joms ma chen mo yid 'phrog yin// 'dod chags khrag gi dkyil 'khor nas// ma mo

zor mkhan stong gis bskor// nan tar g.yos pa'i dus byung na// ya bla bdud kyang mi che'o// ma bla bdud mo mi che'o// btsan la kha bzhi ga la che// mgyogs ma sde brgyad ga la che// gnam the'u dkar po ga la

che// gri bo gri mo ga la che// ma mo mkha' 'gro las kyi dus// rus pa'i phur bu bdun bdun 'phen// ya bla bdud kyang mi che'o// 'thab bral gnas nas zhags thogs ma// sum brgya sprul pas 'gyed pa yi// pho
nya sum brgya drug bcu la// mngag pa rdo rje las mdzod cig/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su 'phen// rnal 'byor dam sri dam bral gyi// ya bla bdud kyang mi che'o// ma bla bdud kyang mi
che'o// gnam zor chen mo bcu gsum gyis// bgegs kyi khong khrag dkyug cing za// sa zor chen ma bcu gsum gyis// dgra bo'i snying khrag dkrug cing 'thung// de ltar zor gyi bdag mo dang// mi nad rims kyi

bdag mo dang// rta yi khrag dang bong bu'i khrag/ ra yi khrag dang gser brdar pa'i// g.yu brdar 'chang dang phud kyi nas// nyung dkar blangs la sngags 'di bzlas// hUM snying b+h+yo// snying ngan pa ru taM/ khong khrag tu

bi ra rta sarba na swA hA// yang brgya bdun bzlas// yang na nyi shu rtsa bdun bzlas// yang na bcu bdun bzlas par bya// cho ga 'di bsten phan yon gang// srid pa gsum yang thal bar rlag/ lha rnams kun kyang
'dar zhing g.yo// bdud dang srin po thal rlag na// ma lus dgra bgegs smos ci dgos// ma mo gser zor gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sgrub la bar
chad byed pa dang// bstan pa gnyen po bshigs pa dang// dge ba'i bshes gnyen sku dgra la// ma mo'i khrag zor btang ba ni// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal

pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// bstan pa 'jig dang bar chod la// sku dgra gyur pa bsgral ba ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad do// de la dang po khrag zor ji ltar btang ba ni// dngul skyogs dkar por

sha rus sbyar ba bzhag/ g.yu skyogs sngon por dbugs dang dri chu bzhag/ zangs skyogs dmar por rak+ta sna lnga sbyar la bzhag/ lcags skyogs sngon por drod dang mAng sa dri dang bzhag/ gser skyogs ser por

bkrag dang mdangs dang sha chen bzhag/ skye tshe dang lan tshwa dang/ nyung nag la sogs pa gang bya ba smod cing stsal lo// de la bskul ba'i tshig 'di skad do// hUM dngul skyogs dkar po ru// bdud rtsi skyems sbyar

nas// dmar chen khrag blugs shing// zor mo shar du zor// 'phang ngo shar du 'phang// ma mo shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// shar bdud choms shig rnam snang gsal// btsan la sgyur cig rdo rje dbang mo che// dgra

bo choms shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// g.yu skyogs sngon po ru// bdud rtsi chu sbyar cing// dmar chen khrag blugs te// zor ro byang du zor// 'phang ngo byang du 'phang// byang gi ma mo b+h+yo// byang bdud choms shig
yang gsal g.yol// btsan kha sgyur cig las kyi dbang mo che// dgra bo choms shig sbas pa'i ma mo tshogs// zangs skyogs dmar po ru// bdud rtsi rak+ta sbyar// dmar chen khrag blugs shing// zor ro nub tu
zor// 'phang ngo nub tu 'phang// ma mo nub kyi ma mo b+h+yo// nub bdud choms shig gnyen gsal ma// btsan kha sgyur cig pad+ma dbang mo che// dgra bo choms shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// lcags

skyogs nag po ru// bdud rtsi mAM sa sbyar// dmar chen khrag blugs te// zor ro lho ru zor// 'phang ngo lho ru 'phang// ma mo lho yi ma mo b+h+yo// lho bdud choms shig 'od gsal 'bar// btsan kha sgyur cig rin chen

dbang mo che// dgra bo choms shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// gser skyogs ser po ru// bdud rtsi chen po sbyor// dmar chen khrag blugs te// zor ro 'og dang steng du zor// 'phang ngo steng dang 'og tu 'phang// ma

mo steng 'og ma mo b+h+yo// ya bdud choms shig bkrags gsal mnyam// ma bdud choms shig rgya mtsho ma// btsan kha sgyur cig nyi zla thod phreng can// dgra bgegs choms shig rtsa brgyad ma// shar du zor btang
rgyal rigs dgra bo bsad// byang du zor btang rje rigs dgra bo bsad// nub tu zor btang dmangs rigs dgra bo bsad// lho ru zor btang gdol pa'i dgra bo bsad// steng du zor btang mu stegs dgra bo
bsad// gzhan yang ma mor grags pa kun bskul lo// dug sna tshogs dang sbyar ba rims nad du 'gyur ro// dmar dang sbyar na dmar nad sna tshogs su 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang che ba mthu che ba yang sgrol

bar nges na/ ma lus dgra bgegs la smos kyang ci dgos/ ma mo khrag zor gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// da ni ma mo'i thun zor byung ste// dkyil 'khor le'u tshe dgu ru byas la/ de la 'khor lo rtsibs
brgyad bri'o// phur bu bcu gcig rdzas su 'god do// lcags phur bzhi yang 'god do// de la khrag chen dgu yi nang du zan zur gsum pa bcu gsum byas la/ zan gyi tshad ni sor gnyis par byas la/ de la rtse

mor nyung nag rtse mo ma nyams pa re re gzug go/ de nas bse khabs kyi nang du shing tsan+dan gyi rigs ni ngos su bzhag shug pa'i rigs kyi shun pa la// dgra bo'i rus sam gzugs bcas la/ bse khabs kyi nang

du stsal/ de'i nang du byi'i snying klad pa dang/ khra'i mchu bse khabs kyi nang du bstsal lo// de'i nang du ra dug ba dang sbyang tsher ba yang bstsal lo// dug sbrul dang g.yab mo mgo sba kun kyang blugs so// bdag nyid

che mchog he ru kar bsgom/ sku la thod pa skam rlon se ral khar brgyan pa/ zhabs stong bgrad pa stag lpags kyi sham thams can/ sbrul nag stong gis lhu tshigs brgyan pa/ phyag stong gdengs pa/ dbu skra kham nag

gyen du 'khyil ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa rkan sgra rdeb pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ gtum gtum rngam rngam 'dra ba gcig tu rang bsgom mo// de bskul tshig 'di skad do// hUM khro mchog yab kyi rgyal po ni// thod phreng 'bar
ba'i sre ral can// zhabs ni rgya mtsho'i gting du bgrad// brgya tshar cig gis tshangs pa pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig gis lha chen pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig gis gnod sbyin pho mo

gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni khyab 'jug pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni brgya byin pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni srin po pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni brtan ma pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni dbang

ldan pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni gri srid pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni tshar ba'i pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni lcags kyu thogs// brgya tshar gcig ni ral gri thogs// brgya tshar gcig ni tshon gyi

rgyal po 'khor lo thogs// brgya tshar gcig ni rdo rje phur pa 'dril// brgya tshar gcig ni lcags sna lnga'i phur pa 'dril// brgya tshar gcig ni b+han+d+ha bsnams// brgya tshar gcig ni rak+ta lcang lo bsnams// brgya tshar

gcig ni sha chen zhal du bstab// brgya tshar gcig ni rdo rje mgo phur dril// brgya tshar gcig ni tsan+dan bing chen gsor// de la dmar gyi ar+g+ha sbreng zhing stsal la/ snying po 'di skad brjod do/ ma ma ru ru trag shig

ma ma ru ru b+h+yo/ ru ru ma gur len b+h+yo/ ma mo'i snying po de skad brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/ zhal brgya nas sngags bzlas pa ni/ gnam rmugs na sa yang rmugs/ zhal brgya nas sngags bzlas pa ni/ kun tu 'ur 'ur
chem chem rab tu chem/ bse khab rang gi rdog pas mnan la/ zhabs stong du bsam la mnan no/ dkar dmar g.yab 'dor ras khab la bkal la/ brten cing bskul lo/ bud med kha ral ma'i skras drang zhing bsgul

lo/ pha?T pha?T pha?T pha?T/ pha?T pha?T pha?T pha?T/ pha?T pha?T pha?T pha?T/ A+oM A+oM A+oM A+oM/ A+oM A+oM A+oM A+oM/ A+oM A+oM A+oM A+oM/ A+oM b+h+yo ri oM b+h+yo ri/ a'u a'u a'u/ a'u a'u a'u/ A+oM bi ra sha hoM/ oM bi ra sha ho/ oM bi ra sha ho/

oM bi ra sha ho/ oM bi ra sha ho/ oM bi ra sha ho/ oM bi ra sha ho/ oM snar ni/ oM snar ni/ oM snar ni/ oM snar ni/ oM snar ni/ oM snar ni/ oM snar ni/ oM pra la ni/ oM pra la ni/ oM pra la ni/ oM pra la ni/ oM pra la ni/

oM pra lani/ oM pra la ni/ oM pra la ni/ oM pra la ni/ pra mo kha/ pra mo kha/ pra mo kha/ hab hab hab/ hab hab hab/ hab hab/ hub hub hub/ hub hub hub/ hub hub/ tshal tshal tshal/ tshal tshal tshal/ shi khram shi

khram shi khram shi khram shi khram/ kur sha kur sha phrom rgyal na/ phrom brgyal na/ phrom rgyal na/ phrom brgyal na/ gzer na/ gzer na/ gzer na/ a na yod/ a na yod/ a na yod/ a na yod/ du ban tsa du/ du

ban tsa du/ du ban tsa du/ a su pu ru/ a su pu ru/ a bun ta/ a bun ta/ a bun ta/ a bun ta/ a bun ta/ ga sa'i mchu/ ga sa'i mchu/ ga sa'i mchu/ phag mo'i mche ba can/ phag mo'i mche ba can/ skyung ka'i
mchu can ma/ skyung ka'i mchu can ma/ ma mo'i thun zor gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po bshigs pa dang// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
sku dgra la// bsgral ba'i las rnams ma bstan pa// sangs rgyas bka' 'di mi btsan zhing// mu stegs log pa mthu dar bas// rnal 'byor sgrub po dman par nges// 'di dag rnams la phan gdags phyir// dgra
bo bsgral ba'i las bya na// dang po lha dang ji ltar 'bral// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs pas bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka' s

tsal pa// sgrub la bar chod byed pa dang// rnal 'byor dgra dang dam 'dral la// dgra bo lha dbral ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// drag po'i las 'di ma bstan na// log pa'i lam la blo
'jug pas// don dam nyid du ngas bstan gyi// dang po dbang bskur bka' 'thob cing// lung 'di nyan zhing bsgom bsgrub ste// 'di yi rtags dang dngos grub dang// las la bya ba dbang thob nas// thugs rje'i

dpyang thag chad pa dang// ngan song gnas su skye nges la// cho ga'i las 'di bya thabs ni// bya rog dang ru g.yas pa dang// 'ug pa'i dang ru g.yon pa la// shog bu gru bzhi tshon gang gnyis// gcig la dgra bo'i

ming rus bri// gcig la dgra bo'i pho lha bri// dang ru gnyis la gro gas glan// bya rog sgro yi rtse la gdags// dgra bo nang 'thab tu gzhug pa ni// sngags ming rnams ni bri la bzhag/ dgra bo'i ming 'og 'ug pas

gnon// bya rog gis ni pho lha gnon// shog shog tshon gang gru bzhi la// 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags bris la// bya rog 'ug pa'i bar du gzhug/ tshon skud sna lngas bcing nas ni// shing ring rtse la btags nas

ni// rlung po che la 'thab tu gzhug/ bdag nyid che mchog skur bsgom la// khar ni sngags ni ci mang bzlas// ma ma trag ra ma ra khyed ma trag ra ma ra ya/ yungs kar skye tshe til nag la// sngags brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas nas ni// sgro gnyis kyi ni steng du gtor// de la bskul tshig 'di skad do// kha kha mu kha mthu mo che// mthing nag chen mo ral pa can// rtag par zas su sha za zhing// rol cig khug gcig phra men ma// nyin

gyi las mdzad bya rog ma// b+han+d+ha gri thod rol rngam ma// phrin las myur mgyogs drag shul che// gzhan gyis mi tshugs sku mdog gnag/ nyin gyi las mdzad rnal 'byor ma// nyin gyi tshe yi phung po choms// dam
nyams dgra bo 'di dag gi/ phrag pa g.yas kyi pho lha phrol// mtshan gyi las mdzad 'ug pa ma// snying 'byin gri thogs gsod la rngams// phrin las myur mdzad drag shul che// yon tan mtha' rgyas sku mdog
ser// phrin las bdud 'dul gnas rigs stong// mtshan gyi las mdzad rnal 'byor ma// mtshan gyi tshe yi phung po choms// dam nyams dgra bo 'di dag gi/ phrag pa g.yon pa'i pho lha phrol// rtsangs
pa 'thab pa'i gyod bar la// chu yi nya rnams gtor ba bzhin// thugs rje'i tsham rngams drag shul gyis// 'dzin rtog ngang las 'thab bar du// dgra bo'i lus kyi pho lha gtor// gcig la gcig gshed de gshed

gnyis/ gshed kyis gshed rgyob kha kha ma// gnyen por rtags phyung hu lu ma// gnyis med 'thab pa'i sprul pa las// ha ha'i nga rgyal bdud dpung bsgral// rgyob rgyob tsham rngams lha chen brgyal// srid pa mes
sregs dam tshig nyams pa 'di// ma 'da' las kyis sgrol cig bya rog ma// stong gsum chus bkrus bka' las 'da' byed 'di// ma btang pho lha phrol cig 'ug pa ma// rlung nag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis thugs
dam bskul// phra men mkha' 'gro 'thab pa'i 'gyod bar du// rab tu dgra bgegs gtan nas rlogs// phung po dur khrod brgyad kyi snum rtsi mdzod// nang grol mthar byed yum gyi nan bzhugs gyis// pho lha
gnam du 'phongs la thugs su 'pho// tshe dpal rtag ru sdus la dngos grub blangs// zhing lpags rtags su gsol la dpa' mtshan mdzod// ma tshogs 'bar ba kun kyang ches 'dar nas// dang po zhi bas 'dul
ba'i gtam smras pa// dam nyams dgra bo srung ba'i pho lha gang// ye shes lha zhig yin na 'di bsgral dgos// 'di la bsgral ba'i las rnams ma byas na// dam tshig nyams pas rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro// dam

nyams dgra bo bsrung ba'i pho lha gang// 'jig rten dregs pa yin na shin tu legs// 'di la chags shing bsrungs na gnyis ka bsgral/ ma ma trag tra/ kha kha kha khA hi la/ sa ma ya daMSh+ta/ sa ma ya daMSh+ta/ zhes brjod

cing rang bzhin gyi ma mo'i bskul tshigs brjod do/ rngams pa dang/ mchongs pa dang/ brang brdung ba dang/ yan lag brdab pa la sogs pa byas na dgra bo lha dang phral bar 'gyur ro// dgra bo nang 'thab gzhug

na yang de dag 'dra'o// de las yang mtha' phur du zhug na/ lha 'dre gang mi srun pa gcig gi ming shog shog tshon gang ba gcig la bris la bya rog dang ru la gdags/ dgra bo'i ming rus shog shog tshon gang ba

gcig la bris la/ 'ug pa'i dang ru la gdags/ dang ru de gnyis shing rings la btags la 'thabs su gzhugs pa'i sngags dang/ cho ga gong ma bzhin du byas na mtha' phung du mdzud do// sngags grwa zur chag tu

mi rung ngo// dgra bo lha dang 'bral ba'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// yang ma mo'i thun rnam pa mang po'i le'u las/ g.ya' ma sngon po chags gang la/ dgra bo'i ming dang gzugs bris la// pho
nya gtong zhing der bstims la// 'brug shing dag gam lcags la ni// ma mo rdo rje phung sgrol la// sku mdog nag mo chen mo la// chibs su se ru zhon pa gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar
bsgom// 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags bzlas shing// dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg nas ni// bsnyen pa bzhag bdun btsugs nas ni// bskul tshig gzhung bzhin bskul nas ni// rtags kyang zhag bdun nyid kyis

so// snying po rak+ta las ni drangs// trag rak+ta mu tra myur b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo zhes de bzlas te/ de ni srog gi snying po'o// srog shing mo yi dam rdzas yin// sngags zur ma chags par bzlas na// mtha' phung ste 'ong
ngo// de yi bskul tshig 'di skad do// mthing nag chen mo ral pa can// za byed chen mo lce 'bebs ma// rlung dang bu yug chibs su bcibs// sku gcig mi bzad ral pa can// zas su sems can gson za

ma// che zhe chen mo sku gcig ma// nang yang sems can 'bum za ma// srid pa za bar byed pa skye ba'i rgyun gcod ma// khams gsum sgrol mdzad stong khams rabs gcod ma// gang la dmigs pa'i dgra bo la// ma
mo las kyi thun cig dbab tu gsol// ma mo'i thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// yang ma mo'i thun le'u gsum pa las/ chu gtsang ma dang khrag bsres la// mon nam rabs chad kyi thod par

blugs la/ rang bud med nag po ral pa can du bsgom/ bag phye dang khrag bsres pas de'i kha bcad la/ tshon skud kyis kha bcings la/ snying po 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzla zhing/ zhag bdun du bsnyen pa btsugs te/

trag raka sha mu tra snying kha rag b+h+yo// ru lu zhes bya ste/ dgra bo'i mkhar gyi spe'u dang// khyim la gtor na zhag gsum gyis 'jig/ gang la dmigs pa'i yul phyogs su gtor na mthar phung ste 'gro'o// de'i bskul

tshig 'di skad do// lcags khang chen mo kha 'bar ma// lcags kyi ral pa bsig pa yis// mtshams kyi 'byung po kun 'dul ma// dbu ni phra men 'bar ba'i dbu// de yi sgra skad chen mo la// mi snyan sgra yi nga ro

'byin// dpral ba g.yas nas dbu byung ba// me shing bskal pa ri bo'i dbu// gung mo g.yas nas dbu byung ba// rdzu 'phrul stong gis gtams pa'i dbu// ltag pa'i bdud sgor dbu byung ba// chu bo klong chen 'dril
