ba'i dbu// gung mo g.yon nas dbu byung ba// ro stod rlung gi dbu la ro smad me yi dbu// nu ma g.yas nas dbu byung ba// lcags kyi spyang mo kha gdangs ma// nu ma g.yon nas dbu byung ba// rngam pa'i seng ge stabs

mchongs can// lcags kyi dred mo nga ro gdong// lcags kyi 'brug ni mche ba gtsigs// re 'ga' 'brug kyang tshal tshal byed// gang du mngags par rgyug ste 'gro// yid la brnag pa'i dgra bo la// las kyi thun
cig da bya yis// snying gi dkyil du thod mda' ya// nor gyi dbyig tu thod mda' ya// yul mkhar khyim la thod mda' ya// zhes brjod la sngags gong ma yang bzlas so// ma mo'i thod thun gyi le'u ste

nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// yang ma mo thun gyi le'u bzhi pa las// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka pad+ma he ru ka khro bo gang yang rung ba gcig tu bsgom la/ mi mgo skam po gcig gi nang du gtor ma blugs la/

dpyid bya nag mo'i mig dang khrag bsres la gtor ma bya/ dbyar me tog dang khrag bsres la gtor ma bya/ ston 'bru sna tshogs dang khrag bsres la gtor ma bya/ dgun shing zi ri'i mar me dang khrag bsres la gtor

ma bya/ de la bskul tshig 'di skad do// hUM dpyid kyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// ga sha de ba'i dur khrod gnas nyul ma// dbyar gyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// b+ha ga hri ti mkha' la char 'bebs ma// ston gyi
rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// e ka tsa ti ral gcig ma// phyag na gser gyi zor ba bsnams// 'bras bu lo thog bcud len ma// dgun gyi rgyal mor gshegs pa'i tshe// me za brag gyon rgya mtsho gting skems
ma// khams gsum ma lus dbang du bsdud// dgra bgegs lus dmyal thag gcod// gang la bya ba rtags phyung la// dkyil 'khor gnyen po 'di bstan gyis// 'gal byed dgra bgegs rdul du rlog/ ces byas

la dus su bskul zhing bsgrub ste// zhing lpags la dgra bo'i ming dang gzugs bris gtor ma'i nang du dkrug cing bcug la// sha rus za ba'i snying po 'di bzlas so// snying za'i tshe la ma sha ro la khrag 'thung ka shi

gi sha sha kri khring ro la khrag 'thung/ kang thing kang sha ya/ yaM tar bar haM sha la kye kyang/ khra he khra he/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ 'di sha rus za ba'i snying po'i sngags so// grwa zur ma chag par bzlas la/ rang gi srin lag

g.yon pa la khrag byung ste dpral ba'i dbyes su byugs la/ dgra bo'i gzugs kyang gtor mar bsres shing nyi ma nub khar btang na rgyud la 'chad do// ma mo'i thun le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// yang thun

le'u lnga pa las/ bdag khro bo chen po'i bdag nyid du bsgom la/ byi la bra ba'i mjug spu dang/ dgra bo'i ming byang ra rog po'i rwa ru blugs la/ khrag sna tshogs dang bsres bzhin re ma ti la gnyer du gtad do// de

la sngags ni/ re ma ti rak+ta b+h+yo ru lu ru lu zhes mang du bzlas la/ sngags 'di grwa zur ma chag par bzlas la/ bskul tshig 'di skad brjod do// hUM srid pa gsum gyi rtse mo nas/ 'khor lo chen po dred gdong
ma// chibs su sems can gang bcibs na// lcags kyi dre'u rta rkang gsum bcibs// spu ni lcags kyu bsgril mar gtib// lus po gcig la dred mgo dgu// swo ni ral gri brgya brgya 'bar// brang ni chu gri
gzhibs pas gtams// gang la mngags par rgyug cing 'gro// steng gi phyogs su mngags pa'i tshe// gnam gyi steng gi lha bran kyang// gcig kyang ma lus dmyal thag gcod// dre'u skad thang gcig

gnam du bton pas ni// srid pa'i mes po tshangs pa yang// thal ba bzhin du dpyad khong med// dre'u skad thang gcig sa la bton pa ni// rgya mtsho kun kyang gting nas skems// dre'u rngog thang gsum sa la brdab

pa ni// srid pa gsum yang rtse nas bsnyil// ri rab kun kyang rming nas 'jil// khyod ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// rdungs shig lhogs shig rdul du rlog/ ces brjod la nyid kyang che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed la/ zhe sdang

drag pos snying rje ma bskyed par zhag grangs mang du bsnyen pa btsugs na/ las myur bar 'grub bo// ma mo'i thun le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// yang ma mo'i thun la le'u drug pa las/ 'bru nag po la sbrul gyi

gzugs byas la dgra bo gang yin pa'i snying po dang/ klu nag po'i snying po gnyis bsres la/ sbrul gyi khog par bcug la/ de dgra bo'i pha myes kyi thod pa'i nang du bcug la/ klu nag po gnas pa'i chu mig tu bskyal

na/ dgra bo mtha' rlag ste 'gro'o// snying po ni/ nA ga be ni/ nA ga be ni/ nA ga rA dza tsha ha ha hUM phaT/ bdag nyid kyang sngags bzlas shing lus bsrung/ mon nam rabs chad kyi thod par dgra bo'i dur du zhug

dgra bo'i pha myes kyi ro rnyed na mgo bo chu mig klu nag po gnas pa'i sa ru bskyal/ rje ngar gnyis kyang smad kyi sha rus gcig sdebs la rlung chen po'i sar phyar na legs/ de min na der sbas na rabs chad par
nges so// de la bskul tshig 'di skad do// zhabs kyi 'khor lo las ni gser gyi rgyal mo ste// g.yu yi me tog nal nal 'phro// rta bro dang ni chem sgra dang// gnam gyi mthongs kun sgra yis gang// phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten kun kyang khyab// snying po dung dang ha yin te// 'di lta bu yi sku byung ste// las ma grub par kun kyang rgyug/ klu rgyal kun gyi gshed bzhi ma// sku la na bza' ci gsol na// klu rgyal 'brug gi slag

pa gsol// chu srin 'bum gyi sham thabs gsol// phyag na lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams// klu rgyal kun gyi snying nas 'dren// zas su klu yi sha la za// skom du klu yi khrag la 'thung// gos su klu yi lpags pa

gon// gal te las 'di ma byas na// klu rnams kun kyang thal bar rlogs// snying po// a tsa la b+h+yo ru lu hUM/ zhes brjod lag pa'i sor mo gdengs la/ bya bzhin 'dab ma can du byas nas/ lung pa kha byang drang

por bltas pa la chu mig kyang kha byang drang por bltas par chu mdog nag la gting ring bar rkang pa gnyis bcug ste/ kha bya'i mchu skyes pa bzhin du byas la/ gong nas 'byung ba bzhin du thod pa kha ru bzung la lag
pas ma reg par chu mig tu bor na las ldog mi srid do// nad ni 'dzin nad kyis 'dzin to// ma mo'i thun le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//// yang ma mo thun le'u bdun pa las/ gro ga'am shing

shun la dgra bo'i ming byang bris la// bdag nyid kyang khro bo chen po'i skur bsgoms la klu srin gnas pa'i sa ru bcug la/ rkang pas mnan la/ sngags ni// gong du ma b+h+yo rA tsa ta ru lu ru ru lu zhes brjod la/

grangs mang du bzlas la/ tshig tu yang dam nyams pa 'di'i mchan gyi bu phrogs shig yan lag skums shig ces brjod la bskul tshig 'di brjod do// g.yu yi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng nas/ mi bzad 'bar ba'i sku

byung ba// srid pa chen mo rgya mtsho bzhin// de la zhabs ni dgod par byed// de yi sku rgyan bshad pa ni// ba sbu nyag ma re re la// sku yi dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// spyan gyi rdzi ma re re las// ma mo'i sprul pa
'bum 'bum 'gyed// zhabs kyis lha srin kun mnan te// phyag dang zhabs kyi sprul pa las// ral gri dmar po re re byung// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad ni// rin chen gter gyis kun bkang ste// srid pa'i
sems can pa lus pa// thams cad kun gyi snying nas 'dren// de nas byang chub lam chen po// bcol pa'i las der 'gro bar nges// gang la bya ba grub par byas// ma mo'i thun le'u ste sum cu gnyis

pa'o//// yang ma mo'i thun le'u brgyad pa las/ cho ga 'di'i dpyad la 'bras chang gro chang chu chang dang/ sa la skyes pa'i dug sna tshogs/ glang po chen po'i mtshan ma dang// 'di rnams chang gi nang du

blug/ bse gzhong kha bcad kyi nang du blugs la/ yi ge brgya rtsa brgyad bris la blugs la/ de'i nang du rtsi sman sbyar ba sna tshogs blugs la// zhag gsum bsnyen pa btsugs la// dgra bo dngos yod na khang

pa la phog par bya/ thag ring na yul phyogs su gtor la btang/ snying po/ sha ra ma pe sha ru so paM sha hUM phaT/ ces rjod cing grangs mang du bzlas la/ bskul tshig 'di skad do// nag mo gsum mig rdo rje
gdong// g.yang gzhi gos su gon pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// mche gtsigs rkan sgras srid gsum za// nad kyi rkyal pa g.yas na thogs// tshon gyi gru gu g.yon na thogs// ma tshogs rngam pas srid gsum
'jig/ thams cad ma lus rlag par mdzod// ces brjod na las nus so// las 'di lan gcig ma bkrol na// rang rgyud med par 'ong ngo// ma mo'i thun le'u ste sum cu gsum mo//// yang ma mo thun

le'u dgu pa las/ dgra bo bsad pa'i cho ga rnam pa gcig la/ dong chag gang gru gsum pa gcig brkos la/ nang du rgya sol gyis dgang/ spyang tsher ba la dgra bo'i ming dang gzugs bris la// mi shi ba'i lag pa
g.yas pa'i nang du bcug la dong gi nang du gzhug/ sha rus za ba'i sngags tshig ni/ ma sha bya ba bzlas la nyung dkar la zhag gsum bsnyen pa btsugs/ bskul tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ srin

mo lcags kyi dre'u rta rkang gsum mam// rtsub cing gtum la gtum khro che// dbu gsum gtsug phud gcig tu bsdus// g.yu yi 'khor lo rtsibs stong 'byung// de yi sku rgyan yod pa ni// gser gyi go zu g.yu yi thigs
gdab pas// ba spu nyag ma re res zad mdzad de// lcags kyi mche ba thags bzangs can// gser gyi phur pa la sogs pas// zhabs ni rgya mtsho'i gting du bskyod// phyag kun spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'byung// zhabs
ni re re 'byung ba yang// lcags kyi dre'u rta rkang gsum po// rkang pa gsum pos srid gsum gnon// phyag char srin po'i thags bzangs thogs// rgyan du mi yi pags pas brgyan// zas su dam nyams sha la
za// skom du dam nyams khrag la 'thung// dam nyams dgra bo rgyan du byas// ban de bshes gnyen dge bsnyen dang/ bud med phreng thogs gang yang rung// bdag la dgra bya dmyal thag gcod// ces bskul na

las chud mi za'o// ma mo'i thun le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// da ni ma mo khrag skems kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yo byad la bya sha zan sna tshogs kyi mgo bo dang sder mo/ gcan gzan sna tshogs kyi
mgo bo dang sder mo/ skam la gnas pa dang/ gsher la gnas pa'i khrag sna tshogs tshang ba// mi grir shi ba'i bam tshogs tshags byas la// dang po gnas brtag par bya ste// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig

drung// brag nag rmog mgo mgul chad dang// chu bo'i 'gram mam rol mtsho'i ngogs// bya rgod 'ug pa pho rog dang// sha zan bya yi tshang yod par/ kang ka dur khrod bya gnas par// gnas khang bzang po yod na

legs// med na khang bzangs sbra phub la// gzhung nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor brtsig/ dur khrod 'bar ba'-i thig gdab la// kha dog sna lnga'i tshon rtsi bkye// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs la// dbus
kyi mthing nag gru gsum la// ma mo bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// che mchog yab yum brtsegs mar 'god// mtha' ma he ru ma bdun 'god// thod pa'i phreng bas mtha' ma bskor// rgyan dang chas gos nag por

bsgyur// dur khrod rgyan dang b+han+d+ha bkram// yum yang mthing ga mdangs mdog phyed// gnyer ma gyen 'greng yod pa btsal// snod kyang 'khar gzhong zangs gzhong dang// lcags la sogs pa gang yod par// 'bru
khal gcig la gtor ma bya// nang du dbang po rnam lnga dang// ba su ta yis mtha' ma bskor// khrag sna tshogs pa der blugs la// ngar phye gcig zan la sogs par// dam nyams dgra bo'i gzugs byas
la// ming rus snying gar bslan nas kyang// gtor ma'i dbus su gzhag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// phyogs su rang gzhan gnas byas nas// rdzas rgod sman brlabs gzhan
bzhin bya// sgrub pa nang la bzhugs nas kyang// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms te// las kyi gzhung bsrang 'dzab bzlas nas// mchod pa dus drug dbul bar bya// thugs dam shel dang bya yis
bskang// tsa ra rog pos smon btsugs te// ku ku ra la dbang thang bsgral// bskul cing pho nya btang nas ni// shes pa dgug cing gzugs la bstim// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma// ci bgyi bka' nyan la

sogs pas// de yi sha khrag zos par bsgom// g.yab nag brdab cing sle 'us brdab// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgyun med sbreng// bcol dang bshags pa nus tshad bya// 'dzab dang bsnyen pa tshang bar bzlas// nyes pa med
pa'i 'o dod 'bod// sha lag za ba'i sngags kyang bzlas// yang na dus gsum rub par bzlas// bcol cing bskul ba gong ma bzhin// pho nya btang ba gong bzhin bya// dgug cing 'gugs 'dren sngags kyis

bya// de bzhin lan grangs ci mang du// zla ba phyed du las byas na// 'bab 'gyur 'di la gdon mi za// gtor ma chu dang me la btang// zhi nas dam tshig gzhung du bsrung// 'dis ni sha khrag skaim par byed// ma

mo sha khrag skem par byed pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//// rims nad btang ba'i cho ga la/ dang po gnas brtag par bya ste/ ri'i rtse mo byung rgyal du yod pa/ ri'i kha nas bltas na kun mthong ba/ stod
ral pa brnyil pa 'dra ba/ bar stag ris btod pa 'dra ba/ zhol gyi brag mtshon cha thogs pa 'dra ba/ chu mtshams nas bab na yang legs so// zhabs na yi dwags kyi gnas yod pa// de lta bur song la yum
skra lcang lor yod pa/ yid tsam ser pa/ mdog dmar ba swo rno ba/ bltas pas byang chub kyi sems rig pa/ gzugs brjid bag tu 'gro ba zhig khrid la/ dkyil 'khor gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin du brtsegs la/
bdag nyid che mchog tu bsgoms la/ las dang cho ga tshang bar byas la/ ma mo dbang tshad rim par skul zhing rims nad thong cig par bsgos na nad sna tshogs pa 'byung ngo// yang na bdag che mchog gis

ye shes kyi ma mo bskul// ye shes kyi ma mos rang bzhin gyi ma mo bskul/ rang bzhin gyi ma mos srid pa'i ma mo bskul/ srid pa'i ma mos e ka tsa ti rbad de/ e ka tsa tis nag mo re ma ti bskul nas/ e kar sha

nag mo rag mo yak+sha b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ ma mo trag rak+sha mu tra ma tra ma b+h+yo// zhes grangs mang du bzlas pas gling bzhi'i yul gang yin par glang rims dang/ 'khru bag gi rims sna tshogs yod do// de nas yang

bdud kyi bu mo dmar skya skem byed mig gcig ma rbad de/ ral nag bsigs shig de ring lha mo u ma/ de ring sa ma ya b+h+yo/ snying za ba tsi la ma sha ro la khrag 'thung kang ka sha ya/ tar bar la ho/ sha

la ka la ka king grang de ru lu b+h+yo/ zhes rbad pas// mi yul gling bzhi gang yin par 'khru bag gi nad dang glang thabs kyi nad sna tshogs 'ong ngo// de nas phyugs nad sna tshogs btang ba ni/ ral gcig mar

bsgoms la/ lha mo nam gru ma rbad cing bskul tshig 'di skad do// nam gru khyod kyi cho dang 'brang// mtshan ni yang dag bshad bya ba// nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus/ rgyab ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser// khyod kyi

gdong pa dngul yin te// lto ba'i ngos ni rdo rje mkhregs// ming ni mdzod dang mdzod srung byed// khyod kyi ma ni kun tu 'gro// khyod kyi pha ni rlung zhes bya// b+ha ga hri tri nad kyis bdag/ lha yul dag tu 'khrungs pa

yin// na mo badzra pA Ne ni si// tsi li tsi li// b+hin d+hi b+hin d+hi/ mun tsa mun tsa// hi pa la te na swA hA/ zhes brjod cing bskul na phyugs nad sna tshogs 'ong ngo// de nas pha rol po'i gnod tshul la nad sna bcad par

byed na// badzra pA Ni rad na pa ya ti swA hA// de ba sa man+ta ba ya ti swA hA/ shi sha ya sa man ta ba ya ti swA hA/ zhes brjod cing nam gru'i mtshan dang cho 'brang nod cing/ gro ga la bris nas dgra bo la btab na/ yul

der zhi ba dang bkra shis par 'gyur ro// mi nad phyugs nad la sogs te/ nad thams cad mi 'ong ngo/ de nas kyang badzra he ru kar bsgoms la// e ka dza ti ral gcig ma rbad de// trag rag sha kha mun tra dza tig

sna sa ma ya b+h+yo/ bam ril shan shog dun b+h+yo// snying kha rag snying kha rag ram srog bam ril b+h+yo rbad pas dgra bo brgyal nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro// yang khro bo de bsgom la/ ri rab gling bzhir dbang

bsgyur ba/ badzra dur kha ti gling bzhi ma rbad de// gru ma gum bu'i baM ba ri bur pa go hri/ 'u shig dgra dgrud 'di ling pra shing glo snying phyung/ krum la kang ka rang phyod rnol thim/ pra ling tsa tshar bu shing rdum bu bcad

par bya'o// zhes gro ga'am shing la ri mo bris kyang rung ste/ dur khrod kyi sa la gzugs smug nag tu byas la rbad na/ dgra bo la rims nad kyi klad gzer dang yan lag bcings par 'gyur ro// de nas yang khro bo

bsgoms te// rdzong gi lha mo ral pa dgu ba rbad do// krong krong ba ti bar klong khu khu tha ta tha ta/ kha kha dur dur dur/ mo khaM khaM khaM ru khaM/ bdud kyis khaM la ru ru/ dam dam sha/ bdud kyi srog le ya raM ya raM zhes rbad

pas/ bdud nyid kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na dgra lta ci smos/ de nas yang khro bor bsgoms nas/ gangs ri'i bu mo spyan gcig ma rbad na/ a li du du na ki ru ka ling dbugs long/ phyung shig shig/ srog baM pa ti baM

zhes rbad pas/ dgra bo'i yul phyogs su nad btang ngo// yang khro bo bsgoms la/ rdo rje shugs sgrol ma rbad do// nA nA nA shun rtsi na 'du shed shed tis tu rbad dam b+h+rUM ril ril/ li li b+h+yo ru lu ru lu
hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dgra bo nad sna tshogs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// man ngag de dang ldan pa yang// ma yengs bsgoms pas sgrub brtson pa// dam tshig ma nyams yo byad ldan// dam rdzas mchog dang gzhung
bcug pas// rims dang nad rnams ci gar gtong// stong gsum nyams pa phung bar 'gyur// bskul tshig gzhung na yod pa btang// rims nad btang ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//// gnod
'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// las rnams drag po 'di brtsam pa// kun la bya ba 'byung lags sam// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa
gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// las rnams brtsams pa'i dmigs bstan pa// yang dag nyid du ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// bsgral ba'i las 'di brtsams pa

yang// kun la bya bar ma gsungs te// mtshan dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yang// gzhung dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dang// don dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun dang// lung dang ldan pa'i mkhan slob dang// chos dang ldan pa'i
rgyal po dang// khrims dang ldan pa'i bram ze dang// rtags dang ldan pa'i bud med la// las 'di brtsam par yongs ma gsungs// brtsams kyang mo grub bdag nyid phung// gzhan gyi don ni gnyer ba
dang// rogs 'brel don du brtsam pa dang// rang nor rang gis blang ba dang// rings par za bar bskos pa dang// nyam thag phongs par gyur pa dang// ma rtogs glen pa'i mtshan nyid la// las 'di brtsams
par ngas ma gsungs// brtsams kyang sdig sgrib che bar 'gyur// len pa rang gis che ba dang// mkhan 'khon phran tshegs yod pa dang// kha snyad chags pa phra mo dang// chad dbang gdon bslus bka' stsal
par// las 'di brtsam par ngas ma gsungs// brtsams kyang sdig sgrib che bar 'gyur// len pa rang gis che ba la// brtsams na ngan song gsum du lhung// 'di dag brtsams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mtshams med

lnga po byed pa dang// theg pa chen po smod pa dang// bstan pa gnyen po bshigs pa dang// snga rabs tshad ma'i sku dgra dang// bka' rkun 'gal bar byed pa dang// cha yod bzhin du 'joms che dang// rang chog
yod kyang gzhan la 'phrog/ ma nyes yongs kyi gnya' ba gnon// nyam thag kun la snying rje med// sdig pa'i phyogs bstod dge ba smod// yon tan can dang mkhas pa gsod// rnal 'byor bar chod rku 'phrog
byed// phud dang sgrub pa'i longs spyod za// snying nas za bar shoms pa dang// khrel 'dzem ngo tsha bral ba dang// rgyal khams nag por byed pa dang// bdag dang yongs la 'dzugs pa dang// zhi bar

smas kyang mi nyan pa// bden par bkrol kyang mi go ba// 'di dag bsgral ba'i rgyu yin pas// phrin las dus la bab pa yis// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa ste// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar te gcig/ phrag dog rlung

ltar 'tshubs te gnyis// 'dod chags chu ltar gtams te gsum// gti mug ri ltar spungs te bzhi// nga rgyal bse ltar khengs te lnga// ser sna rtsi ltar 'byar te drug/ gtum khro khro chu 'dra ste bdun// gsod

gcod srin po 'dra ste brgyad// 'phrog rlom srin po 'dra ste dgu/ chos log kha dpon byed dang bcu// 'di dag bsgral ba'i dmigs yin te// 'di dag bsgral bar ma brtsams na// snying rje'i dam tshig nyams par
'gyur// ngan song skye zhing dmyal bar 'gyur// bla med thar lam stongs par 'gyur// 'di dag bsgral ba'i las brtsams na// rnal 'byor mthu stobs mthu dpung btsan// sgrub la bar chad byed pa med// las

ngan 'phro bcad dmyal yun thung// bla med thar pa'i bde sgo phyed// ngan song 'khor ba gting nas sbyangs// bstan pa srungs shing gang zag btsun// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// bsgral ba'i dmigs
bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bsgral ba'i las rnams brtsams pa yang// rnal 'byor mtha' dag gang zag gi/ kun gyis brtsams na 'grub
mi 'gyur// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor gang zag mtha' dag

gis// bsgral ba'i las rnams 'grub mi 'gyur// nges pa nyid du ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rnal 'byor gang zag sna dgu dang// kun gyis brtsams par ma gsungs te// thos pa chung la
man ngag med// 'dzin rtog che dang blo sngar bas// las 'di brtsams kyang mi 'grub pas// rtog pa'i nad kyis rang la 'jug/ dam tshig nyams dang bka' gcog pas// sdig pa can dang bcas pa yis// 'grub

pa med pas mi bsgrub pas// des ni pha rol mi song ste// yi mug chos la dad mi skye// dam rdzas ma tshogs rdzas dang bral/ bsgoms la mi brtson ras chod byed// klong du ma gyur bsnyon thabs byed// las 'di

brtsams kyang mi 'grub ste// rang gi 'bras bu rlag par byed// chos nyid blo la ma zhugs shing// blta ba chung bas 'khu 'phrig zos// bka' rtags phyag rgya ma byin zhing// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob pas//
las 'di brtsams kyang mi 'grub pas// tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong// nyams dang sdig la mi 'dzem pas// snying rje'i lam dang bral ba yis// brtsams kyang 'bras bu thob mi gyur// dad pa chung

dang theg pa dman// slob dpon med dang bka' brton pa// des ni gdon rtol med pa tsam// 'khu 'phrig che dang tshor rkyen dang// skyo rkyen sun rkyen sur lud kyis// las 'di brtsams kyang mi 'grub ste// slar
yang log chos yin zhes 'dogs// gting nas thag bcad mi 'grub pas// 'phyor dang sgra 'od che 'dod pas// las 'di brtsams kyang mi 'grub ste// slar la skyon can yod zhes bskur// bsgom dang sgrub pa

yun thung zhing// zhag grangs lo zlar mi bsring pas// bsnyen dang 'dzab kyi grangs nyung bas// byas kyang las 'di mi 'grub ste// slar yang skyo sems skye bar 'gyur// phud dang mchod pa mi 'bul zhing// dam rdzas

gtso ru mi len pas// byas kyang las 'di mi 'grub ste// slar yang sman mo'i bka' chad 'ong// cho ga'i las 'di rtsams pa yang// thos pa che dang man ngag thob// 'dzin rtog chung dang blo stobs che// brtul
zhugs chen por ldan pa yis// las 'di brtsams na 'grub 'gyur te// rtog pa'i gang gis mi tshogs te// dam tshig ma nyams bka' brtan dang// sdig can ma yin grims 'byin dang// bcang tsam ma yin
shugs byung na// rtsol zhing brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// spyad cing bkol bas nyan par 'gyur// des ni bsgral ba'i las 'grub cing// yid rang chos la dad pa skyed// dam rdzas bdud rtsi sman tshogs

dang// rdzas dag lag cha ma bral zhing// bsgom la brtson pa ngang ring zhing// ras chod thug thub ma yin par// yid ches lag len don 'brengs la// chos nyid mnyam pa'i klong gyur te// las dang brtsams pa go
'byed pas// de ni brtsams kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi 'bras bu mi sgrib cing// bsgral ba des kyang mtho ris thob// chos nyid zab mor blo zhugs shing// lta ba mthon pos sa chod ste// sems kyi 'khu

'phrig ma tshor zhing// rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan la// chos la dad pas lung thob bo// bka' rtags phyag rgya byin pa dang// dbang bskur gnang ba thob pa yis// las 'di brtsams na 'grub 'gyur te// tshe srog

bar chad mi 'ong ste// pha rol dmigs te bsgral bar nges// nyams dang ma 'dres dam tshig gtsang// sdig chen rnams dang mi 'grogs shing/ snying rje'i lam dang ma bral bas// brtsams na 'bras bu thob pa yin/

dad pa che dang theg pa mtho/ slob dpon rim pas gnyan pa dang// de nas 'grub par the tshom med// sems kyi 'khu 'phrig chung ba dang// tshor rkyen skyo rkyen mi byed cing// sun skyen sur lud med pa yi// brag
la phur pa btab 'dra bas// las 'di brtson na 'grub 'gyur te// tshe srog bar chod mi 'ong ste// man ngag yin zhes 'di la bsngags// gting nas thag bcad sgrub pa dang// 'phyor dang sgra ru mi
gtong bas// che 'byin khengs pa spangs nas ni// gsang zhing sgrub la brtson pa dang// ma yengs mdzab bzlas brtson pa yis// las 'di brtsams na 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor kun kyang btsun par
byed// bsgom dang sgrub pa yun ring zhing// zhag grangs lo zla grangs mang bar// bsnyen dang 'dzab bzlas grangs mang ba// byas na las 'di 'grub 'gyur te// 'gyod sems med cing btsun par 'gyur// phud
dang gtsang ma'i chod phul nas// so so'i dam rdzas gtsor len pas// byas na las 'di 'grub par 'gyur// dman mo'i chad pa mi 'ong zhing// gang yin bka' bsgo bran bzhin nyan// skyon yon gnyis ka'i don
'di yin// kun la bstan par mi bya zhing// sna dgus bya bar ngas ma gsungs// rnal 'byor skyon yon gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gtso ru dam tshig
bstan pa dang// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon rnams dang// dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan dang// dam tshig bsrung ba'i rim pa rnams// de yi phan yon bstan pa rnams// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan
'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas su// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig mchog tu bstan pa dang// bsrung

nyams rims pa ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dam tshig 'di ni mchog tu bstan// dam tshig dam tshig 'di dag la// snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la brten nas

'grub// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la rten nas 'grub// slad kyis 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la brten nas 'grub// de phyir dam tshig theg chen 'di// phyi rabs

sngags 'chang nges par bsrungs// dam tshig 'di ni sa gzhi 'dra// sa la skye 'khrungs kun skye ltar// dam tshig sa gzhi dam pa la// sku dang ye shes skyed par byed// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum po dang// yan lag dam

tshig lnga rnams la// ma 'das bsrung na sangs rgyas yin// de las 'da' na sems can yin// dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung ba la// ma mo rnams kyang bsgo ba nyan// gal te bsgo ba mi nyan na// ma mo nyid kyang
rlag par nges// lha yang 'da' na rmongs 'gyur na// rnal 'byor 'das pa smos ci dgos// dam tshig 'di ni gtso yin zhes// kun bzang lha yis yang dag bshad// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig gi/ dam tshig
bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// 'di dag nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtags ni// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// slob dpon bka' bslu smod byed

dang// lu gu rgyud la dbyen btang ba// 'di dag nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun bcad nas// gzhan nas dngos grub thob 'dod pa// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// lung dang gsang
ba'i man ngag rnams// thos nas yid la ma 'grogs shing// blo la 'dug pa'i yul med pas// yod ma thag tu ston cing 'chad// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga stags yin// zang zing nor gyi mthong 'dod kyi// snod

med kun la spel byas na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// rdzas dang lag cha mngon thogs nas// pha rol gzhan la sdig byed na// de yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// sha khrag gtor ma mngon sum du// mi

nag mang po'i sar bskyod na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// dur khrod dben sar mi bsgrub par// grong khyer nang dang ri ngos su// rnga sgra b+h+yo yi sgra 'don na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// man

ngag gting nas ma thon zhing// rtags dang mtshan ma ma byin par// ag tshar kha yis ngoms skyen na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// dus su byung ba ma gtogs pa// sna la khrag phyung ngor byugs nas// mi

nag dkyil du brang brdung ba// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// rig pa'i thabs dang mi ldan par// kha nas lha srin gnyen po 'bod// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma
la// 'phrad nas sbyor ba ma brtsams na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// las ngan skyon can mtshangs phogs nas// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma bsgral na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// dam

tshig nyams pa'i skyon rnams yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum nyams na// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// de la sdug bsngal bzod glag med// mchod pa dus drug ma phul te// las kyi phyag rgya ma bsrungs

na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// de nas bskal pa 'dod mi srid// yan lag dam tshig lnga nyams na// 'dir yang nyes pa sna bcu 'ong// phyis kyang na rag dmyal bar skye// mgo nas tho ba thogs pas

brdung// logs nas s+t+wa re thogs pas gcod// zhabs nas mtshon dang ral gri thogs// spyod pa'i dam tshig nyams pa 'di// 'dir yang nad dang sdug bsngal che// mdze dang nad ngan sna tshogs 'ong// ma tshogs

stong gis snying khrag len// sha zan stong gis sha rus 'bral// rang bzhin ma mo bcu bzhi yang// dam tshig nyams pa'i bdud du babs// ma mo kun kyang gshed du 'ong// tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong// 'chi 'pho
dmyal ba'i gnas su skye// dam tshig 'di la ma gnas na// brtsam pa mi 'grub mya ngan snon// bsgrubs kyang dngos grub rtags mi 'ong// bka' gsang dam tshig gzhung bor nas/ phyi nang sde snod
mtha' dag dang// rgyud dang tan tra ci bshad kyang// de yis 'grub par ngas ma gsungs// lhar yang rang sems brlag ta re// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig
pa'o//// dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan ni// ci bsam las rnams 'grub gyur te// mkha' la 'gro na bya bzhin 'phur// chu la 'dzul na nya bzhin 'phyo// sngags kyi dngos grub ci 'dod ster// rig
'dzin rnam gsum gang bsgrub 'grub// rang bzhin ma mo rang bzhin byams// srid pa'i ma mo bran bzhin nyan// ci bgyis bka' nyan 'khor bzhin 'khol// mkha' 'gro ma chen 'khor bzhin 'du// dngos grub
rnam gsum rim bzhin thob// tshe dpal dbang thang bsod nams 'phel// 'byor pa kun tshogs longs spyod ldan// ma sring kun kyang rje bzhin khur// dgra bgegs kun kyang gzhob bzhin 'dul// bstan pa kun
kyang rang bzhin rgyas// dam tshig 'di dag gtsor len pas// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// kun tu bzang po yang dag bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso chen yin// rgyal ba kun gyi lam yin zhes// kun tu
bzang pos yang dag bshad// dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// dam tshig bsrung ba'i rim pa ni// rdo rje slob dpon bka' nyan zhing// man ngag ston pa khur

byed cing// rdo rje rgyal po pha ltar khur// yum gyi dbang mo ma ltar bkur// rgyal thebs karma bu ltar bkur// mched dang lcam dral bu ltar bkur// bstan pa don bzhin gzhung snyogs na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i

rim pa yin// nyin dang mtshan du dus med par// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun med par// ma yengs gsang ba'i don brtson na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gsang thub man ngag 'tsho mkhas dang// yun du

brten pa nges che ba// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// nyan bsam thos pa rgya bskyed nas// 'du 'dzi'i dbang du mi gtong bar// rtag tu sgrub la brtson byed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gab pa'i
gsang ba gting phyin cing// sbas pa'i gsang ba'i gzhung thub na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// slob dpon mnyes pa phul byas na// dbang rnams rim par nod byed pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa
yin// dam rdzas yo byad tshogs byas nas// gzhung bzhin ma nor sgrub byed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// pha rol dam nyams dgra bo la// kha chos smon 'jug mi zer bar// gsang zhing 'dug nas las
brtsam pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dkyil 'khor brtson 'grus shugs phyung nas// mi nag bca' mkhar mi gtong na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs

ma la// byin rlabs sbyor ba rtsom byed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa la// dpyang thag chad pa bsgral ba ni// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// mchod pa dus drug rnams

su 'bul// las kyi phyag rgya gzhung bsrang na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dur khrod dben sar sgrub byed cing// rtags dang mtshan ma mngon sum du// ma phyin bar du mi gtong na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i
rim pa yin// gzhan la phyar 'tshong mi byed cing// gcom bskyungs yon tan tshogs sbed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gzhan yang yon tan 'tha' dag pa// gzhung nas bstan pa kun spyod na// 'di
yang bsrung pa'i rim pa yin/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma mo'i sbyin sreg ji ltar 'bul// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan
'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dang po phun sum tshogs ldan nas// rdzas dang yo byad

tshogs byas te// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// phrin las rnam bzhi gang byed pa// rdzas dang kha dog de bzhin bsgyur// hom khung yum gyi gzhal yas su// hom shing yab kyi mkha' brdzangs te// gnyis su
med par me spar nas// ye shes rang bzhin dman mo rnams// cho ga gong nas 'byung ba bzhin// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// rdzas dang yo byad kun thogs

la// mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// hUM kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// kun tu bzang po yab kyi shing brdzangs nas// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me spar la// che mchog he ru spyan drangs gdan
la bzhengs// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul/ skye med byang chub sems kyi mchod pa bzhes// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i me spar la// yum gyi rgyal

mo spyan drangs gdan la bzhengs// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad 'bar bas phyogs mtshams gnon// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// dam rdzas bdud rtsi sman
gyi mchod pa 'bul// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsal// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa bzhes// skye med chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos grub
stsol// ye shes klong yangs khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa bzhes// dam nyams dam bskang mthu dang dngos grub
stsol// yab yum gnyis med sems kyi me spar te// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhengs// sha rus bdag mo rnam snang gsal// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi

dam rdzas mchod pa bzhes// 'byung ba sa yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa
bzhes// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum gnyis med sems kyi me spar te// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhengs// dbugs kyi bdag mo ma mo yang gsal

gsol// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang dam rdzas bdud rtsi mchod pa bzhes// 'byung ba rlung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag
chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa bzhes// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum gnyis med sems kyi me spar te// rtag pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren
gdan la bzhengs// khrag gi bdag mo ma mo gnyen gsal 'bar// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa 'bul// 'byung ba chu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye

shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum gnyis med
sems kyi me spar la// rtag pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// drod kyi bdag mo ma mo 'od gsal 'bar// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul
gyi// 'byung ba me yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams
dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum gnyis med sems kyi me spar la// srid pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// bkrag dang mdangs kyi bdag mo bkrag gsal mnyam// 'bar ba me yi

gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// 'byung ba nam mkha'i bkrag mdangs dongs grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus
kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum gnyis med mkha' dbyings 'bar ba'i hom// gnyis med byang chub

sems kyi me spar te// rang bzhin ma mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// yongs kyi ma mo phra men rgya mtsho ma// 'bar ba mi yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// srid

pa'i dbang sgyur dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye she klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu
dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel ba 'bar ba'i hom// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me spar te// rang bzhin ma mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// dbang bsgyur spyan 'dren gdan la

bzhengs// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// gling bzhi dbang sgyur dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga

bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel ba'i hom khung du// gnyis med byang chub

sems kyi me spar te// khros pa'i rgyal mau spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// ma bzhi

dbang sgyur dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yang 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang

dngos grub stsol// pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// rdo rje pad+ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// rdo rje khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam

rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// ma bzhi dbang sgyur dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yang 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul

gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel pa'i hom khung du// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me spar te// phung byed ma bzhi spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// phra

men sbas pa'i ma mo dbyings phyug ma// phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo gcig pu ma// phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo rgyan gyi rgyal// phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo bdag nyid ma// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman
dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum dbyings dang 'brel ba 'bar ba'i hom// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me spar
te// gsang ba'i dgyes sde spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// dkar mo mig gcig rgyas 'debs ma// nag mo ral gcig rmongs mdzad ma// nub kyi dmar mo phung byed ma// byang gi ser mo las mkhan ma// 'bar

ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// byang chub sems kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus

kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskang mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel ba'i hom khung du// srid pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren gdan la

bzhugs// a phyi chen mo srid pa chags byed ma// srid pa cha snyoms ma mo sham sham mo// srid pa chags byed e ka dza ti ma// nam mkha' dbyings kyi rdo rje dpal mo btsan// sring gcig chen mo ma mo 'phrul mo

che// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// khams gsum srid pa gsum gyi dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag
chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel ba'i hom khung du// gnyis med byang chub
sems kyi me spar te// dman mo ma bdun spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje kun grags spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// kun tu bzang mo spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rdo rje kun gsal spyan 'dren
gshegs su gsol// rdo rje ye shes mchog ma spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rdo rje 'od chags spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rdo rje gsal 'phro spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rdo rje g.yu sgron spyan 'dren
gshegs su gsol// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung

du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// srid pa dman mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// rin chen

srid 'degs ma mo mthu mo che// nag mo khrag 'dzag ma mo mthu mo che// gling bzhi spyi 'gro ma mo mthu mo che// rdo rje sgeg mo mthu mo che// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mthu chen ma// sa bdag chen mo pad+ma phreng// 'bar ba
me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag
chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum gnyis med 'brel ba 'bar ba'i hom// gnyis med byang
chub sems kyi me spar te// gru 'degs bzhi rnams spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// byang shar shan ting dkar mo gshegs su gsol// shar lho dun ting nag mo gshegs su gsol// lho nub har ting dmar mo
gshegs su gsol// nub byang grub ting ser ljang gshegs su gsol// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs su gsol// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu

dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub
stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel ba 'bar ba'i hom// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me spar te// dmag gi rgyal mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// lho yi nag mo kha
yal ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos

grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te/ sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// sring mo

bzhi rnams spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring mo dang// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring mo dang// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring mo dang// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring

mo dang// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskang mthu dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud

lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi mchod pa gzhan dang mthun no// sbyin sreg mchod
pa'i le'u ste bzhi cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma mo sgrub pa'i gzungs ma la// ga Na'i sbyor ba ji ltar bgy-i// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag
rdzogs kyis bka' stsal cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gzungs ma sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad kyi// nyon cig g.yung
drung yang dag pa// gang bsgrub gzungs ma'i mtshan nyid la// so so'i mtshan yod rnyed nas ni// dgon pa chen por brtsam par bya// cho ga'i las rnams rdzogs nas kyang// sbyor ba'i las rnams brtsam pa

ni// g.yon phyogs dag tu yum bzhag la// dang po spyan dang zhal gyi brda// mig btsum mchu smed brda byas la// gzhan yang brda' skad sna tshogs smas// de nas yum gyi spyan srings nas// yab la chags pa'i

snyom bag bya// de nas yab kyis gsol pa bskyed// nu ma mnye zhing mchan khung brdeg/ yum gyi chags pas yid g.yos nas// yab yum mkha' dbyings byin gyis rlab// yum gyi gnas lnga dag tu ni// tshom bu nyi

shu rtsa lnga dgod// dzaHzhes dpung nas gzung bar bya// hUM zhes gnya' nas 'khyud par bya// baM zhes stod smad bsdam par bya// hoHyis yab yum bsgul bskyod nas// badzra d+h+rig gis phul nas kyang// hUM gis byang
chub sems bskyed de// dgyes pa'i ro rnams btang nas ni// dkar dmar 'dres pa'i sems dag la// dkyil 'khor lha la gsal mchod cing// bdag nyid dngos grub dam par blang// 'di ni sbyor ba'i lung
zhes bstan// ga Na sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// thugs dam bskang pa'i rgyu rnams la// bsgral ba'i las rnams ci ltar bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la
bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo ma tshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// thugs dam bskang ba'i sems can la// ta na bsgral ba ngas bstan gyi// nyon
cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can 'di// ma skyes phyir na bsad mi rigs// sems can 'khor ba phung por 'khor// dmyal bar 'khyams pa rtog pas 'khyams// phung po chos kyi
dbyings su bsgral// chos kyi dbyings la ma zhes bya// rtog pa ye shes mchog bya bsgral// ye shes mchog la mo zhes bya// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// bsgral na skyon med bde chen thob// mtha'

yas sems can thams cad ni// skyes kyang yum lnga'i mkha' la skyes// gnas kyang 'byung lnga'i mkha' la gnas// 'chi yang 'byung lnga'i mkha' la 'chi// don la bsgral dang ma bsgral med// bsgral bar bstan pa
rol pa yin// rol par bstan pa phrin las yin// phrin las 'byung po tshar bcad nas// skye med chos sku'i dngos grub len// des na bsgral ba gtso zhes bsngags// dang por sems can gang bsgral ba// 'khor
bar zhe bcad rgyas gdab bya// rgyas gdab byas nas rnam rtog khral// rnam rtog bral na chos nyid rtogs// des na lus la dkyil 'khor dgod// dkyil 'khor bkod na bde chen thob// de nas ma
mo'i thugs dam bskangs// thugs dam bskangs na dgyes pa bskyed// dgyes pa bskyed na mnyam nyid thob// de nas yongs la bstab pa bya// bstabs pas bdud dang dgra bgegs bcom// bdud bgegs
bcom nas bsam pa 'grub// des na rgyu drug srog rtsa gcod// srog rtsa bcad nas 'khor ba stongs// de nas tsit+ta sems blangs nas// sangs rgyas sras su yaM gis 'phang// sngags kyis ngan song sgo bcad
nas// byin rlabs dbang bskur sras su bskyed// 'di ni bsgral ba'i lung zhes bshad// ta na bsgral ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o/// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ye shes rang bzhin
dman mo la// za byed bstab pa ci ltar bgyi// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ye shes

rang bzhin dman mo la// za byed bstab pa ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rnam rtog dgra bgegs bstab pa'i phyir// de yi bskul tshig 'di skad do// hUM ye shes ma mo zhal phyes shig/ rnal

'byor tshogs kyi rje mo la// yum gyi rgyal mo mu kha le// 'gro ba yongs kyi skye gnas yin// thams cad yongs kyi tshe srog bdag/ bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// dbu gcig zhal lnga gdengs pa
la// rnal 'byor dgra bgegs zhal du bstab// dug gsum ma lus stong par mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ sha rus bdag mo rnam snang gsal// dgra bgegs sha rus 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor
sha rus skyed par mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ dbugs kyi bdag mo zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs srog dbugs 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor srog dbugs brtan par mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal
mo zhal phyes shig/ khrag gi bdag mo gnyan gsal ma// dgra bgegs khrag rnams 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor khrag rnams 'phel bar mdzod// drod kyi bdag mo 'od gsal 'bar// dgra bgegs rnams kyi
drod bzhes la// bdag gi drod rnams 'phel bar mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ bkrag gsal bdag mo bkrag gsal 'bar// dgra bgegs bkrag mdangs 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bkrag

mdangs 'phel bar mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ phra men rgya mtsho zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs phung po zhal du bstab// bdag gi phung po nad med mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ nyi
zla thod phreng zhal phyes shig/ dbang phyug ma mo zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs rnam shes zhal du bstab// bdag gi rnam shes gsal bar mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ phung byed ma bzhi

zhal phyes shig/ dbyings phyug ma mo zhal phyes shig/ rgyan gyi rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ bdag nyid ma mo zhal phyes shig/ gcig pu ma mo zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs yan lag zhal du bstab// bdag gi yan

lag bde bar mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ khros pa'i ma mo zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje nyi ma zhal phyes shig/ pad+ma khrag 'thung zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje srid gsum zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje khams 'tshogs zhal
phyes shig/ khros pa'i rgyal mo bzhi yi zhal du bstab// dgra bgegs gzugs bzhi zhal du bstab// bdag gi gzugs bzhi bde bar mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ thugs kyi dgyes sde zhal phyes
shig/ dkar mo mig gzhal phyes shig/ nag mo ral gcig zhal phyes shig/ dmar mo dbang sdud zhal phyes shig/ ser mo las mkhan zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs yul gzhi zhal du bstab// bdag gi yul

gzhi bde bar mdzod// srid pa'i sman ma zhal phyes shig/ srid pa chags snyoms zhal phyes shig/ e ka dza ti zhal phyes shig/ ma mo spun gnyis zhal phyes shig/ ma mo bdun rnams zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje kun

grags zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje kun gsal zhal phyes shig/ kun tu bzang mo zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje kun gsal zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje ye shes zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje 'od chags zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje 'od 'phro zhal

phyes shig/ rdo rje g.yu sgrol zhal phyes shig/ rin chen srid 'degs zhal phyes shig/ nag mo khrag 'dzag zhal phyes shig gling bzhi spyi 'gro zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhal phyes shig/ pad+ma dbang phyug zhal phyes

shig/ sa bdag chen mo zhal phyes shig/ har ting dkar mo zhal phyes shig/ dun ting nag mo zhal phyes shig/ shan ting dmar mo zhal phyes shig/ gru bting ser mo zhal phyes shig/ gru 'degs rgyal mo zhal phyes

shig/ dkar mo mche gtsig zhal phyes shig/ nag mo kha hal zhal phyes shig/ dmar mo chu 'jib zhal phyes shig/ ser mo rkang ldag zhal phyes shig/ dmag gi rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ lha yi sring mo zhal phyes

shig/ gshin rje'i sring mo zhal phyes shig/ klu yi sring mo zhal phyes shig/ gnod sbyin sring mo zhal phyes shig/ sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams zhal phyes shig/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad zhal phyes shig/ 'di dag zhal phye gzhan

dang mthun// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad la// dgra bgegs nang rol sgal tshigs rnams// sman mo'i tshogs kyi zhal du bstab// bdag gi phyi nang bde bar mdzod// rol cig sprul cig ma mo'i tshogs// chings shig
sdoms shig ma mo'i tshogs// dz+wA dz+wA dz+wA yis dam du sdus// phaT phaT phaT kyis rol par mdzod/ kha kha khA yis zhal du bzhes// khams gsum dgra bgegs stongs par mdzod// sgrub la bar
chad byed pa rnams// thal ba bzhin du med par gyis// sa ma ya mA ra ya khA hi zhes brjod do// za byed bstab pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas yab mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ lta ba'i

man ngag gi le'u 'di bshad do// phung po khams dang skye mched kyang// ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// kun rdzob tsam gyi mtshan ma ru// chos sku mtshan mar brtags pa ste// ye shes rang gnas rol pa

yin// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kyang// kun tu bzang mo'i dbyings kyi rgyan// kun tu bzang po'i thugs kyi rgyan// kun bzang yab yum rol pa las// phyi nang ma lus thams cad sangs rgyas so// mtha' la thug
pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med// dbyings la g.yo ba med pas chos sku 'gyur ba med// don dam dbyings su bltas pas ltas dgu de dag gsal// thams cad sems su rtogs pas gang bsgrub lhun gyis
grub// rnam rtog ming yang med pas gang bsgral gcig mi ltas// thabs mkhas rol pa yin pas 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos// thugs rje byang chub yin pas thar pa bde chen thob// kun gyi bdag nyid yin pas ma
mo'i rang bzhin 'khor// bde chen rgyal po yin pas 'khor gyi jo bo yin// thams cad bdag la byung bas kun gyi bdag po yin// nga rgyal gdeng du che bas 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul// thugs mchog thugs

sgras khams gsum yongs su ldir// thugs rje'i byams ldan nyi ma'i 'od bzhin shar// mi rtogs gnyen po thabs kyi rgyal po 'byung// 'khor ba'i gnyan po rang byung sangs rgyas te// bdag dang sems can thams
cad chos kyi bya ba'i sku ru gcig/ mi rtog thabs kyis gnyen po 'di yi don rtogs na// ma mos gdul bar bya ba gzhan na med// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i don rtogs na// dgra bgegs bsgral zhing tshar

bcad bya mi dgos// ye 'byams mtshan med klong gi dbang rdzogs na// rgyal byed rtags kyi phyag rgya sgrub mi dgos// phrin las bya btsal klong yangs ye nas 'das// bsgom bsgrub dkyil 'khor bya ba ci yang
med// 'di ltar man ngag rtogs pa gdeng gyur na// bsgrubs kyang skyon med ma bsgrubs 'gal ba med// bsgom kyang skyon med ma 'gal ba med// bsgral kyang skyon med ma bsgral 'gal ba med// bsam du med
de chos sku nam mkha' 'dra// sgom du med de rang byung klong nas shar// bde 'byams dbyings phyug yum gyi rgyal mo yin// ma bkag ci bder yan bkye yab kyi mkha'// sems la gang yang me tog rang byung
sku// thabs las gang yang ma 'gags ma bcos sku// don la gang yang mi rtog chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku la skye shi g.yos pa med// 'pho 'gyur med pa'i klong la btsal zhing bsgrub du med// ye shes

byang chub sems su bdag rtogs na// 'du 'dzi byis pa'i rtse mos ci zhig bya// mi 'da' klong gi dam tshig srung byed na// nyon mongs bde sdug mya ngan ci la spyad// thabs mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin shar ba

las// phung po 'bad rtsol rtsol bsgrub ci la bya// phyi nang snod bcud thig ler sangs rgyas na// gzhan nas btsal zhing smin du gcig kyang med// lta ba man ngag gi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de
nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos/ bde chen byang chub sems kyi le'u 'di bshad do// 'di skad ces gsungs so// snod kyi 'jig rten ma bkag yum gyi dbyings// bcud kyi 'jig rten ma bkag yab kyi
mkha'// yab yum mkha' dbyings ye nas rol pa las// bde chen byang chub sems su ye nas sangs rgyas so// phung po khams dang skye mched ma lus pa// ma mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ye nas yin// yon pa'i
don la rig pa gsal dgod na// bde chen byang chub sems su ye nas sangs rgyas so// sems dang ye shes dus gcig sangs rgyas na// rtag pa'i ye shes sems kyi sangs rgyas kun rtogs na// bde chen byang

chub sems su sangs rgyas so// 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid thar pa'i lam gyi skas// sdug bsngal rgyu nyid chos nyid byang chub sems// ma spangs lhun gyis grub pa'i don rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas

so// chos nyid kun tu bzang po'i rig pa la// 'khor dang ni mya ngan 'das pa mnyam// sangs rgyas sems can sems nyid gcig tu mnyam// rtogs dang ma rtogs sgyu ma'i ngang du mnyam// rig dang ma rig chos kyi

sku dang mnyam// mnyam nyid rgyal po'i don la ma yengs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes lnga ru snang// 'byung ba lnga po chos kyi dbyings su mnyam// dbyings dang ye
shes 'brel ba'i don rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// ye shes ma mo bzhin ma mo dang// sman mo la sogs mang po'i tshogs brjod kyang// bdag gis byin rlabs ma mor snang ba
las// gzhan nas ma mer grub pa ci yang med// bdag snang gzhan 'khel kun tu bdag yin te// bdag nyid g.yos na phyi nang snod bcud g.yos// kun gyi che btsan 'gran gyis do med pas// yang la thogs

med bde 'byams rgyal po la// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// bde chen ngang la 'dzin rtog brjod du med// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas
yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos/ rgyud yongs su bzung ba 'di bshad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// gsang thub bka' brtan nges pa dang// bden par smra zhing yid mi 'gyur// des ni rgyud 'di

gzung bar bya// brtags shing rgyud 'chang brtson 'grus che// drang la sems byams g.yo sgyu chung// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// mdzangs la shes pa gsal ba dang// brtags shing bya ba ma nor ba// des ni

rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// gzung thub drags thub khongs yangs shing// le lo bar chad skyon spangs la// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// gzhung bla ma dang tshig 'jom pa'i don gyis// spyod pa thogs chags med pa
dang// dam tshig spangs len med pa yis// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// nyan cing bsgrub la brtson pa dang// 'du 'dzi'i dbang du mi gtong bas// brnag thub bzod che nges pa dang// yongs la mi gnod
tshul sun pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// lung med pas kyang mi gtong zhing// slob dpon rig pa steng 'du ba// des ni yongs su gzung bar bya// rang shes mu cor mi byed cing// brtags shing las

rnams brtson byed pa// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// rnal 'byor sman dang mi 'bral zhing// rdzas dang lag cha ma thegs pa// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// dad pa skyo ngal med pa dang// skyo med dub pa
med pa yis// rgyu 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// dbang bskur gnang ba lung thob cing// rtogs shing shes pa phyogs 'byams pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// brtags na bla ma'i lung yod
cing// bsnyen na nus pa'i mthu yod pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// rgyud yongs gzung ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas lha gnod 'dul gyis gsol pa// yab gcig lags// snod de

dang mi ldan pas// bzung du rung lags sam/ zhes gsol pas/ mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// snod de dang mi ldan pa// d+harmA snang 'tshong byed pa dang// chos dpe'i tshong pa byed pa dang// man ngag

zang thal du smra ba dang// lta ba'i gdeng med pa dang// spyod pas ma zin pa dang// sgrub pa gzhung ma tshugs pas// rgyud 'di bcangs kyang seng ge'i 'o ma dang 'dra ste// bdag phung gzhan rlag gnyis ka

'gal// mdze dang rims kyi bskal pa 'byung// bya ru mi rung sna dgu byed// 'bras bu mnar med par skye bas// des na ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung 'di// kun gyi thun mong ma yin te// snod med rnams kyi bcangs
gyur na// bdag dang 'gro ba gzhan kun brlag/ des na 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud/ ces bstan to// de nas lha gnod 'dul gyis gsol pa// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar bsdu/ zhes gsol pa dang/ yab mngon
rdzogs kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni// dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin// rim bzhin rim pas gtso la bsdu// zhes bka' stsal to// rgyud 'di snod med la

bstan pa'i skyon dang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos// lha gnod 'dul la bka' stsal pa// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// rgyud dang lung dang

man ngag dang// phyogs dang gal por bstan pa yi// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung chen po 'di// de ba gnod 'dul khyod kyis bsdus// 'jig rten gsum du grags par gyis// lta spyod sgrub pa tshang ba yi// ma mo srid
pa'i tan+t+ra 'di// de ba gnod 'dul khyod kyis zung// rtsa ba gsum du sbas par gyis// zhes bka' stsal pas/ gser gyis glegs bam du bris nas/ lha gnod 'dul la gtad do// lha gnod 'dul gyis rtsa ba chen

po gsum du sbas so// de skad ces ston pas bka' stsal pas/ ye shes kyi ma mo dang/ phra men rgya mtsho la sogs pa rang bzhin gyi ma mo dang/ a phyi chen mo la sogs pa srid pa'i sman mo rnams kyis/ skye ba med pa

chos kyi ro myong nas/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i mchod pa phul nas/ rang rang gi dam tshig nos nas/ zhabs spyi bo la blangs so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung chen po las/ lha gnod 'dul la rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga
bcu gnyis pa'o//// ma mo'i srid pa'i rdzogs lung chen mo 'bras bu nges par bstan pa'i mchog/ kun bzang thugs kyi lung chen 'di// skyes mchog 'ga' yi las yin te// kun la spel bar ma gsungs

so// ma mo'i chos 'di spyi gab sbas che zhes 'byung na yang/ bod yul du bsgyur ba la/ 'di las lhag ma ma lus par yid ches pa'i rgyud khungs dang/ dbu snyung bzhes so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung gi rgyud phyi ma'i
dpe rdzogs so//// ! dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po dang/ yum rig pa'i rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i byin

gyis brlabs pa las// sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'jig rten du 'byung bas na/ sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bdun dang/ brgyad pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la/ bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu ru 'byung ste/ de

yang stong gsum du gnas pa las/ stong chung ngu dang/ stong bar ma dang/ stong spyi phud do// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje'i snang ba las/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gcig gi don bshad na/ shes rab chen

po'i rgyu las rlung rdo rje rgya gram g.yas su 'khyil cing 'tshubs pa las/ dbus rdo rje rgya gram la/ mtha' ma gzhu 'od ma'i dbyibs ltar gnas pa/ steng 'og dang phyogs mtshams su dpag tshad sa ya drug 'bum yod
pa/ thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs las/ rin po che'i char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam nam mkha' la babs pas/ chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po 'bum phrag gcig tu chags te/ shes rab kyi rlung dang snying

rje'i chu gnyis bsrubs pa las// dbang chen gser gyi sa gzhi dpag tshad khri drug stong bar chags te/ de'i steng du ri rab dang gling bzhir gnas pa ni/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rgyu rin po che sna lnga las grub ste/ rgya

mtsho la mar dpag tshad brgyad khri nub pa/ yar dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa/ mchur dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod pa/ zheng du dpag tshad brgyad khri/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod pa/ de la

gser gyi ri bdun gyis bskor legs te/ gnya' shing 'dzin la dpag tshad bzhi khri yod pa// gshol mda' 'dzin la nyi khri/ seng ldeng can la khri/ lta na sdug la stong/ rta rna 'dzin la nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mu khyud 'dzin

la brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ rnam mdud 'dzin la drug cu rtsa phyed dang gsum yod/ gling chen po bzhi ni/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu pa// ba glang spyod ni stong phrag phyed dang brgyad/ sgra mi snyan ni stong

phrag drug/ 'dzam bu gling gi ngos gsum la stong phrag gnyis gnyis gnas pa ste/ de'i bar gyi gling brgyad ni// lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan// sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni// rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan// g.yo ldan

dang ni lam mchog 'gro// stong phrag phyed dang gnyis gnyis gnas// ri rab bum pa'i steng na ni// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyi// grong khyer lha na sdug ces bya// mchur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya la// zheng du de yi

tshad du gnas// mtha' skor dpag tshad nyi khri yod pa/ gser gyi ra bas bskor te/ ra ba'i dpang du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod pa/ grong khyer de la sgo stong du gcig gis ma longs pa yod do/ me tog man da ra

ba'i gcal bkram pa/ mnan na nem la bteg na 'phar ba la sogs spyod do// de'i steng dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi na/ khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ mchu zhing du dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu yod pa/

mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ de'i them skas dang/ ka lo dang/ ka rgyan dang/ gdung dang/ dral bu/ thams cad gsair dang/ dngul dang/ biDUr+ya dang/ shel las grub pa'o/ de la gser gyi ka ba sum

cu rtsa gnyis/ g.yu yi lcog dang sum cu rtsa gsum gnas te/ ba gam re re nang na ka ba sum cu rtsa gnyis/ g.yu'i lcog la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnas so// grong khyer de'i sgo na glang po che rab brtan zhes bya ba

yod de/ de la gser gyi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis/ g.yu'i mgo bo dang sum cu rtsa gsum yod pa/ de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bskyod cing bzhon pa'i glang yin te/ mtha' skor la dpag tshad stong yod// grong

khyer de'i shar phyogs na shing ke ke ru tsan+dan zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i rtsa na glang po che sa srung zhes bya ba/ kha rlangs kyis lha ma yin gyi rgyal po ri nag po thal ba rdul du rlag pa dang/ sna nas 'od ma'i

ral gri chu zheng rgyang grags yod pas// lha ma yin gyi g.yul thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi shar lho mtshams na/ chos bzang lha'i mdun sa zhes bya ba yod de/ mchu zhing du

dpag tshad sum brgya la/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod do// rgyan ni gong dang 'dra la/ de ni lha'i mdun sa yin no/ de na lha grags ldan mchog skyong zhes bya ba gnas te/ mig g.yas g.yon gnyis nyi ma

dang zla ba ru gnas te/ de'i 'od zer gyis lha thams cad kyi mdun ma sdud pa/ thugs ka nas bdud rtsi'i bum pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa gcig gi nang nas// lha rnams la bdud rtsi'i longs spyod 'gyed pa zhig

yod do// lho nub mtshams na shing sna tshogs kyi tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ mchu zhing dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu la/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod par bdud rtsi'i 'khrus kyi rdzing bu yang yod de/ shing rta chen

po'i steng na lha'i rgyal po mdog bzang zhes bya ba gnas te/ lha'i bu mo ut+pa la zhes bya bas/ lha'i rgyal po la khrus byed cing me tog man da ra ba zhes bya ba/ chu zheng du rgyang grags re yod pa'i mchod pa 'bul

lo// nub byang gi mtshams na sa gzhi bzang po zhes bya ba yod de// chu zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod pa// mtha' skor du stong yod pa// de na klu'i rgyal po brjid gnon zhes bya ba gnas te/ 'khor lha'i

grong khyer bdun gyis bskor ba/ sa gzhi de las yid bzhin gyi bdud rtsi'i longs spyod nang nub tu mi 'dra ba brgya brgya re sprul pa'o// byang shar mtshams na rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ chu zheng du dpag

tshad bzhi brgya lnga bcu yod pa/ dpangs su dpag tshad brgya brgya yod pa// de na gnod sbyin lcang lo can gyi bdag po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spyi bo nas mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i char lha ma yin la 'bebs

pa'o// nub phyogs na 'dren pa'i tshal zhes bya ba yod de de na chu bdag gi rgyal po ma ga ta zhes bya ba gnas pas/ shing a shwa ga zhes bya ba la lha'i bu pho dang/ bu mo thams cad brdzus nas skyes te/ longs spyod mi

'dra ba sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed do// byang phyogs na dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba yod de// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ lha'i bu mo mang po la mig bltas pa tsam gyis 'khrig pa'i dga'

bas tshim pa yod do/ byang phyogs na shing yongs 'du sa rtol zhes bya ba'i tshal yod de/ rtsa ba dpag tshad lnga thur du zugs pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod pa/ yal ga la dpag tshad lnga bcu yod pa/ mtha' skor

du dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod pa/ de na lha'i bu srin pa byan mkhan zhes bya ba gnas te/ bdud rtsi de la lha thams cad kyis longs spyod byed do// shing de'i rtsa ba na a mo li ga'i rdo leb ces bya

ba'i tshal gnas te/ mchu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du nyis brgya yod pa/ de nas lha'i mgar ba bi shwa kar ma bya ba yod de/ nyi ma me shel las nyi ma'i 'khor lo brdungs te/ lha ma yin gyi dbang

po thags zangs ris kyi sked pa gcod pa/ zla ba chu shel zhes bya bas lha'i smas ma thams cad gso bar byed pa'o// shar phyogs gser gyi ri gnya' shing 'dzin gyi kha na/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi pho brang/ shel

dkar po las grub pa/ chu du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod pa/ mtha' skor du nyis brgya yod pa'o// lho phyogs na 'phags skyes po'i pho brang/ baiDUr+ya las grub pa/ chu zheng dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod pa/ mtha'

skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ nub phyogs na spyan mig bzang gi pho brang/ pad+ma rA ga dmar po las grub pa/ chu zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu pa/ mtha' skor stong yod pa/ byang phyogs na rnam thos sras kyi

pho brang/ in dra nI la las grub pa/ chu zheng du dpang tshad sum brgya drug cu la mtha' skor du stong lnga brgya yod pa'o/ khang bu de rnams las/ shar phyogs kyi pho brang na bang mdzod gsum yod pa/ lho phyogs na

bzhi yod pa/ nub phyogs na drug yod pa/ byang phyogs na bdun yod pa/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal po dri za'i 'tsho skyong/ lho phyogs ni gshin rje'i 'tsho skyong/ nub phyogs klu'i 'tsho skyong/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin gyi 'tsho

skyong/ rgyal po sde bzhi po de dag gis rang bzhin gyis bstan pa skyong tshul du gnas so// srid pa chags lugs kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// nang bcud kyi 'jig rten gyi gleng gzhi 'di lta ste/
'dod khams gnas rigs nyi shu/ gzugs khams gnas rigs bcu bdun/ gzugs med pa ni bzhi'o// 'dod khams kyi bye brag 'di lta ste/ de la dang po dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal brgyad ni// yang sos dang
ni thig nag dang// bsdus 'joms dang ni ngu 'bod gnyis/ mnar med mnar med chen po dang// tsha ba dang ni rab tu tsha/ dmyal khams brgyad po 'di dag ni// thar bar dka' bar bstan pa'o// byol song la

yang 'di lta ste// gnas na gnas dang 'thor ba'o// yi dwags phyi sgrib nang sgrib can// ngan song gnas bcu'i don yin na// mtho ris gnas bcu'i don ni 'di lta ste// shes rab tshul khrims khyad par las// mi

dang lha yi 'bras bu smin// tshe dang khru tshad la sogs kun// dang po dpag tu med pa nas// lo bcu khru byed bar du ni// 'phel 'grib mtshon cha bzhin du 'gyur// re zhig bstan pa 'di nyid la// 'dzam bu gling du
khru bzhi ste// sha mdog sngo la byad dbyibs ni// sog kha lta bur gnas pa ste// shar gyi lus 'phags po dag ni// khru brgyad pa ru gnas pa ste// sha mdog dkar la zla gam dbyibs// ba glang spyod na

bcu drug la// dbyibs ni zlum la byad mdog dmar// sgra mi snyan na sum cu gnyis// gru bzhi'i dbyibs la sha mdog ser// lha yi rigs drug bye brag ni// rgyal chen rigs bzhi rgyang grags gnyis// sum cu rtsa
gsum rgyang grags bzhi// mtha' bral dpag tshad gcig yin te// dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dpag tshad gnyis// gzhan 'phrul dbang byaid phyed dang gnyis// gzugs khams bcu bdun 'di lta ste// tshangs ris

dpag tshad gnyis pa ste// mdun na 'don ni gsum pa ste// tshangs chen dpag tshad phyed dang gsum// 'od chung dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis// tshad med 'od ni phyed dang bzhi// 'od gsal dpag tshad brgyad pa

ste// dge chung bcu drug dag tu 'dod// tshad med dge ni sum cu gnyis// dge rgyas drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// sprin med brgya ni nyi shu lnga// bsod nams skyes ni nyis brgya lnga bcu pa'o// 'bras bu che ni sum brgya nyi

shu'o// mi che ba ni stong du 'dod// mi gdung pa ni nyis stong ste// gya nom snang ni bzhi stong ngo// shin tu mthong ba brgyad stong ba// 'og min khri ni drug stong ngo// gzugs med pa yi lha rnams ni// nam mkha' mtha'
yas skye med dang// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang// ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang// yod min med min skye mched do// bcud kyi 'jig rten bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// sprul pa'i gnas

lugs 'di lta ste// phyi snod lo ka ri rab kyi// steng na klu'i rgyal po rigs bzhi'i khri la// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang nas// gnyis 'gyur gyen du 'phags pa ni// yum mu kha le'i zhal gyi steng na/ bcom ldan

'das che mchog he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag bcwo brgyad/ zhabs brgyad du gtams pa/ khro tshul drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ de la dra bas brgyan pa'i 'khor lo ni 'di lta ste/ che mchog dbu yi 'khor lo la// spyi

dpal khro bo bcu ldan te/ khro bo chen po ga ra bi la'i grwa la'i rgyal po dang/ khro bo chen po rin po che 'jigs byed dang/ khro bo chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ khro rgyal gar mdzad rgyal po dang/ khro bo chen

po sreg pa'i 'od chen dang/ khro bo chen po sr-id po 'joms byed dang/ khro bo chen po skyod byed rgyal po dang/ khro chen 'jigs byed skyabs kyi rgyal po dang/ khro chen gsod byed rgyal po dang/ khro chen 'jigs byed

rgyal po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ che mchog he ru ka'i gsung gi 'khor lo la/ gdeng chen khro bo'i bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ khro chen 'jigs byed hUM sgra can dang/ khro chen gnod mdzes rgyal po dang/ khro rgyal me long

snang byed dang/ khro rgyal yon tan snying po dang/ khro chen gzi ldan 'bar ba can dang/ khro chen lhun grub snang byed dang/ khro chen me'i 'khor lo can dang/ khro chen za byed brtul zhugs can dang/ khro

chen skyong byed rlung gi bang ba can dang/ khro chen gzi ldan 'bar ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o// 'jigs byed chen po'i thugs kyi 'khor lo la bskor ba ni/ gsang chen khro bo bcu ste/ khro chen hUM kA ra dang/ khro chen
rnam par rgyal ba dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ gshin rje gshed po dang/ mi g.yo mgon po dang/ rta mchog dpal dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba

dang/ stobs po che rnams kyis bskor ba'o// 'jigs byed chen po yon tan gyi 'khor lo rdzogs chen gyi khro bo bcus bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ khro chen biSh+Nu 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang/ khro chen stobs bzang 'jigs

byed mgon dang/ khro chen gzi ldan 'od zer can dang/ khro chen 'jig rten 'od zer gyis 'gengs pa dang/ khro chen stong khri khyab byed dang/ khro chen hUM sgra can dang/ khro chen khams gsum shugs sgrol dang/ khro bo

chen po 'jigs byed skar mda' gdong dang/ khro bo chen po me khyer glog ma sprin dang/ khro bo chen po nam mkha'i mdangs phrog la sogs pas bskor ba'o// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i sgal tshigs kyi 'khor lo la

gnas pa ni 'di lta ste/ dkar po mig gcig zhe sdang can dang/ khyab 'jug 'khor lo zhe sdang can dang/ brgya byin ser skya zhe sdang can dang/ skos rjes drang dkar gti mug can dang/ kA la yak+sha gti mug can
dang/ 'byung rigs spun dgu gti mug can dang/ sa bdag phag mgo 'dod chags can/ klu bdag dregs pa 'dod chags can dang/ nor lha chen po 'dod chags can/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi nga rgyal can dang/

gshin rje 'joms byed nga rgyal can/ rU'u tra gdug rtsub nga rgyal can no// tshangs pa chen po phrag dog can dang/ b+h+riM gi ri ti phrag dog can dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug phrag dog can dang/ byang sprin dmar po g.yo

sgyu can te bcu drug gnas so// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo'i cha lugs ni 'di lta ste/ sku shin tu brjid pa ri rab lta bu la zhabs brgyad kyis klu brgyad brdzis pa'o// 'og gzhi ru sbal khog pa'i brag gtams pa/

phyag drug phyag chas 'gro ba rigs drug gi skye shi sgrol ba/ spyan gnyis khrag dang/ rin po che'i mchi ma 'thor ba/ spyi bo'i gtsug nas khrag gi ral pas stong gsum dbang du sdud pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' bzhi dbus

dang lnga la sa bzhi cha snyoms shing 'byung ba lnga dbang du sdud pa/ mthing nag nam mkha'i go zu la/ 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i cha ga btags pa/ de lta bu'i yum las sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ dbu la
yul gyi dkar mo bcu gsum gyis bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba lnga las shar ba'i bu mo lnga dang/ thog mtha' med pa'i yum mchog nyid dang/ mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ dbyings las

shar ba'i bu mo gsum dang/ yi dam bsgoms legs ma dang ma mo bdun te bcu gsum gyis bskor ba'o// thugs la nag mo bco brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab chen po las gyur pa phra men rgya mtsho

dang/ snying rje chen po las gyur pa nyi zla thod phreng dang/ ye shes bzhi'i zer las gyur pa'i khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi dang/ dngas ma bzhi las gyur pa'i sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang/ yul bzhi las shar ba'i thugs kyi

dgyes sde bzhi dang/ dus bzhi dbyings las shar ba'i rgyal mo bzhis bskor ba'o// yum gyi chags pa lte ba'i 'khor lo la bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ skyed byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ srid pa chags byed ma dang/

nyul byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo dang/ 'joms byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ gling bzhi spyi phud ma dang/ chags byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ 'dod khams ne mtshan dang/ 'dzin byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ e

ka tsa ti spun drug dang/ za byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ srin mo bdun dang/ gdug byed chen mo zhes bya ste/ las kyi sring bzhi dang/ pho nya chen mo zhes bya ste/ dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi dang/ las byed chen mo zhes bya ste/

dbang phyug ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// khyab pa spyi rgyug gi pho nya ni 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dung gi ma mo drug cu dang/ lho phyogs mthing gi ma mo drug cu dang/ nub phyogs zangs kyi ma mo drug cu dang/ byang phyogs
gser gyi ma mo drug cu dang/ steng lcags kyi ma mo drug cu dang// 'og byi ru'i ma mo drug cu ste rdo rje gur gyi phyi rol na gnas so// sprul pa gnas lugs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yab mngon

rdzogs rgyal po la spyan g.yon pa phab pa'i brda zhig mdzad nas// ljags g.yas nas g.yon du dril ba'i brda zhig mdzad de bskul ba las/ mngon rdzogs rgyal pos cang mi gsung bar yum gyi mkha' la yi ge phyed

dang drug tu zhu ba las/ 'bru bcu'i snying po'i sgra yis yum gyi snam zhal du thon te/ sprul pa'i bya khyung bcu'i rgyan du ston nas/ dur khrod g.yang gzhi ru mtshon phyar/ rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu gnon pa'i brjid ston/

'bru bcu'i snying pos sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i mdzad pa la btsud ste bzhugs pa la/ de nas ri rab chen po'i steng na tshal brgyad nyul bar byed pa'i// yum phra men rgya mtsho'i thugs ga nas// sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi sprul pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku bton te/ rdo rje rgya gram brag gi gdan steng nas mi zhum pa'i brjid bag gis gyad kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs te/ rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan la/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i
rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dbu la lan lnga ru bskor te/ dug lnga 'joms par byed pa'i ye shes lnga'i don dgongs pas zhus pa las/ mngon rdzogs rgyal pos yi ge ha lnga'i don gsungs te/ bi sa mu ran hUM

ha/ dz+wa la pa ra ma ha/ bi sha san te ha/ ma hA lang te ha/ bi yang yang te ha/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags zangs ris kyis nyon mongs pa'i bag chags lnga/ 'byung ba lnga'i bag chags kyis sbyang

bar mkhyen nas/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rU tra'i tsit+ta bcu gcig rin po che'i 'od 'bar bar sprul nas/ mngon rdzogs rgyal po la bstabs nas phul lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje lcang lo can gyi tshal na bzhugs pa la

lho'i 'dzam bu gling gi nub phyogs ri nag po ha sa zhes bya ba la/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sprul pa/ khye'u ma tri chung ngu zhes bya ba/ srid pa'i pho rgyud mo rgyud thams cad skye ba'i rigs so sor 'byed shes pa

zhig byung ste// des phyag na rdo rje la zhus te// lung bzhi man ngag mkhyen pa'i ston pa po// da lta dgongs spyod 'bras bu ji snyam byed/ ces zhus pa la/ phyag na rdo rjes lan gsungs pa// snang srid so sor 'byed

pa'i rig pa can// lung bzhi don gyi gtan tshigs 'di lta ste// man ngag nyid na tshig gi don ci yod/ khye'u mai tri chung ngus gsol pa/ lung bzhi don gyi gtan tshigs ji ltar lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsungs

pa/ lung bzhi don gyi gtan tshigs 'di lta ste/ gnas pa rtsa'i lung/ bkod pa thig le'i lung/ g.yo ba rlung gi lung/ rig pa sems kyi lung dang bzhi ru bshad do/ de nas khye'u mai tri chung ngus bshad pa/ man ngag

nyid na tshig gi don yod pa// tshig gi don gcig rgyal bas bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa la/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ rgyud kyi don 'di man ngag nyid du dgrol// man ngag don gyi ngo bo 'di lta
ste// pra khrid lag cha gab pa sde gsum dang// ma bzhi gcod pa'i 'khor lo nyid du bshad// mai tri chung ngus gsol pa/ gab pa sde gsum don ni ji lta bu// ma bzhi gcod pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar lags// zhes

bsnyad pa la/ phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ gab pa sde gsum don ni 'di lta ste/ gting dpag med pa'i 'khor lo la gab pa dang/ bsreg pa me'i 'khor lo la gab pa dang/ mkha' klong thun gyi 'khor lo la gab pa

dang/ gcod pa 'khrul 'khor las la gab pa dang bzhi ru bshad/ gtso 'khor gleng du bslang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// sprul pa rgyan gyi don ni 'di lta ste// rU tra bsgral ba'i sa gzhi la// khrag gi rgya mtsho gru

gsum ste// lha ma yin gyi gzugs snang ste// srog rtsa dmar po spyi nas drangs// rdo rje sprul pa bya khyung gis// bsgral ba'i tshul du gnas pa ste// de nas che mchog he ru kas// yum gyi dbu ru sku ston te// dbu yi

sprul pa'i pho brang la// lha srin la stsogs sprul byas nas// oM shrI he ru ka kro trI shA rI hUMM/ li khra kha dur dza dur phaT/ yab kyi thugs las 'od 'phros pas// 'og gi yum la bskul byas pas// yum gyi

sprul pas lha srin bskul// khri phrag 'bum gyi 'phro 'du byas// sprul pa'i pho nya las la mngags// thags zang ris kyi 'khor rnams bsdus// srog rtsa dmar po spyi nas drangs// oM shrI he ru ka kri tI rA dza dur dza dza/

drangs nas zhal du bstim par bya// khong du bsgral ba'i las bya ste// bcu drug 'khor los gtub par bya// tri ta kha ti ru tsa khad d+hA tu pi ni la chum tsakra rbad phaT/ bsgral thabs dgu yi sngags kyis gzhom/ kha thun

snying la yam/ dz+wa la raM kha thun rbad/ li kra hUM/ kha Ta phaT/ du ra ya phaT/ ru si phaT/ li kra dza dza hUM/ ta gra ta gra hUM phaT/ lhu dum phral la bstabs pas mnyes/ gting dpag med pa'i gnyen po sgrub pa'o// ma mo kro

tI shwa rI ru lu ru lu dza dza b+h+yo// ma mo li ta khrag la b+h+yo rni la dza hUM phaT/ kro ti'i tsa la ma thum/ rni la dza sha la b+h+yo/ rus la chom/ dug tri tsa la yaM yaM phaT/ 'bod pa rbad pa bsad pa gsum// khyams gsum dag la
gsal bar dgod// bzhi pa dregs pa'i khyams su gsal// dpa' bo'i ras la 'khor lo bca'// de nas 'khor lo bskyed bya ste// hUM bskyed ma bskyed nr-i ru bskyed// bdud rtsi'i gtor mas mchod byas te// rbad
pa'i sngags kyis nr-i la dgug/ bsad pa'i dregs pas bsgral byas te// srin po'i shun la 'khor lo bca'// dregs pa'i ral pas btags nas ni// mun pa'i stong la btags nas ni// khrag mtsho gsum gyi

dkyil du bzhag/ mtsho yi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'o// oM nA ga rA tsa dza dza/ in tra ye dza dza/ ag ne ye dza dza/ bag sha ye dza dza/ bri gzhi rus sbal pags pa la// thig le bzhi la rang sngags bskor// rtsa ba'i sngags

kyis bskyed byas te/ spyan drangs pa yi bsnyen pa ni// rgyal ba'i thugs las 'od spros te// rigs bzhi sprul pa'i srog snying drang// dam tshig klu la bstim byas te// dkar gsum rdzas kyis mnyes par bya// mna'

bsgag dam dbog las bcol bya// rigs bzhi klu yi sgrub pa'o// d+h+riSh+ta raSh+tA pa/ bi ru d+hA kA ya/ a d+hi pa ta ye/ bai shrA ma NA ya dza hUM dza hUM dza hUM dza hUM/ shar phyogs dkar po zla gam ste// lho ni ser po sog kha

la// nub ni dmar po zlum po'o// byang ni ljang gu gru bzhi yin// bum pa'i nang du bskyed bya ba// hUM swA/ aM hA/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi rim bzhin bskyed// dkar po rdor 'dzin rnam snang rgya// ser po ral gri rin

chen rgya// dmar po pad 'dzin mtha' yas rgya// ljang gu rgya gram grub pa'i rgya// spyan drangs bstim la mchod pa'i rgya// bsgo ba'i tshig gis las bcol bya// gnyen po rgyal chen bzhi yi sgrub pa'o// d+h+riSh+tA ru Sh+ta ma rA dza

tsakra phaT/ bi ru d+hA kA ya rA dza tsakra phaT/ a d+hi pa ta ye rA dza tsakra phaT/ bai shrA ma NA ya rA dza tsakra phaT// yum gyi spyan gsum gyen du gzigs// gtso bo'i thugs la bskul byas te// kro d+hI shwa rI hUM ho

sa ma ya phaT/ gtso bo'i spyan gsum gyen du gzigs/ shrI he ru ka tri to phaT/ 'khor lo dang po bskor byas te// gong ma'i sngags kyis bskul byas pas// rgyal chen bzhi yi srog rtsa bskul// grangs ni stong rtsa bzhi

yis so// D+h+r-iSh+ta raSh+ta/ nA ga ta yi rA tsa thu lu ma ra ya bI ruD+ha ka/ in+d+ra ya ye thu lu ma ra ya/ a ti ag ne pa ta ye ye thu lu ma ra ya// bai sha ma Na ye thu lu ma ra ya/ 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba'i don// rgyal chen

bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// klu rgyal bzhi la tsakra bskor// nA ga rA tsa tri ta rni zhu zhu thuM/ in tra ye rni la chuM chuM/ ag ne ye rni la nyag nyag rag sha ye rni la spur spur/ ya ta a tas dug gsum rni ru bsgral// gnyis pas

rten chen bskam par bya// gsum pas khrag gi le'u bsdu// tha mas rtsa chen bzhi po gcod// bskor ba gsum gyi sgrub pa'o// chu dang sa la pho brang brtag/ mig dang rna ba sna dang yid// nyams ni shin tu brtag par

bya// ci yang med na gzhan du spo// des ni mtshan nyid brtag par bya'o// oM/ badzra kro ta ha ya gr-I ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ stong pa'i ngang las rta mchog bskyed// hrI yis bdud rtsi sbyang byas te// sngags kyis mchod te
