bya'o// d+he b+ha tsa d+hi b+ha tsa tsa na spyan drangs/ b+he tsa la b+he tsa la dbu dzal dbu dzal/ ces phyag 'tshal lo// btsan khyod la dgra bo 'di gtad do// a b+hi shu dza a b+hi shu dza hUM sa ma ya hUM phaT/ 'di bzhes su gsol/ tshon

skud kyis bcings la btsan che sar mnan no// dang po grub rtags phebs pa dang thun rnams myur bar brdeg go// phur thun khrag thun nyung thun zan thun thod thun sbyin bsreg gi rim pa bya/ tha ma klu btsan dag la

gtad/ ma ma trag rak+sha ru lu ru lu/ re ma ti tri ti ru ti snying kha rag rag mo tsa tsa mo dza// btsan gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// dzA dzA dzA dzA/ nag mo ba ma ra li li/ nag mo khrag la ri li li/ nag mo

snying la ri li li/ nag mo srog la ri li li/ nag mo srog la chom chom/ bam ri li li b+h+yo// ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// nam nam ha ra he de ma b+h+yau ru lu ru lu/ rag mo tsa tsa mun da na/ rag mo rag mo bri la kha thun/ ting ting

tsem tsem/ kro la krol sa ma ya brengs/ ma las la b+h+yo/ tri mo shu shu yag+sha nag mo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ A+oM tad+ya thA pad+ma ra te ru ti/ ru lu ko ru ti/ ru lu ko ru/ us sti du ru du ru/ tsal pa la a shug me/ i dan d+hu pa

puSh+pa pa/ shrI bAn kha raM khA hi/ shrI de bI ma hA ka lI khA hi/ ma hA rag mo yag+sha nag mo khA h-i/ ma rag mo dun ting khA hi/ ma ma re ma ti rag ti sha ma la khA hi/ ma ri ma ti ma nu rag mo khA hi/ ma rag mo khrag la ma sham khA
hi/ ma ma mug sti gr-i h+Na khA hi/ ma ma nag mo re'u tri gr-i h+Na khA hi/ tri mo shu shu sha sha nag mo khA hi/ dza dza re ma ti pa sha tsa pa la dza dza nag mo dgra bo'i snying la thum ril rbad/

nag mo dgra bo'i srog la bam ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i rtsa la bam ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i dbugs la bam ril rbad/ re ma ti pa sha tsa pa la dgra bo mA ra ya thum ril rbad/ nag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo b+h+yo/ yag mo b+h+yo/ 'drig mo b+h+yo/ mA'o mA'o mA'o mA'o/

rag mo te kum b+h+yo b+h+yo/ yab mo sod cig nr-i dza dza b+h+yo/ ma ma rag mo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nag mo re ma ti b+h+yo/ nag mo re ma ti b+h+yo/ nag mo re ma dza b+h+yo/ nag mo re ma 'dzu b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i sha la b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i snying la b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i

rtsa la b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i khrag la b+h+yo/ byas la thod pa'i khrag thun 'phang ngo// spyir bsgrub pa thun gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// ye shes kyi ma mo brgyad dang/ las kyi ma mo brgyad dang// 'khor nag mo sa ma ya

'bum sde la sogs pa rnams la/ rgyud 'di zung zhig chongs shig phyi rabs kyi bstan pa srungs shig 'khor rnams kyis rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod pa 'di lta bu'i don yang dag par bstan pa/ bstan pa
bsrung bar bgyi'o// bskyang bar bgyi'o// zhes gsungs nas mngon par bstod do// re ma ti mched bzhi phrin las kyi rgyud rdzogs soha/// i ti//// rgya gar skad du/ DA kI ma

hA karma ta twa tri sa mA dza nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma de kho na nyid gsum du 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus

gcig na/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo byang shar gyi mtshams shing yongs 'du'i tshal chen po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la/ 'khor lha ma

srin sde brgyad la sogs pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur kyis bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul

nas/ karma DA kIs 'di skad zhus so// stobs chen drag po 'joms mdzad rdo rje can// bcud kyis bsdus pa'i 'gro ba bdag la sogs// bstan pa 'di la skye ba ci ltar smin// ye shes sprul pas rang rgyud grub pa
mo// de bzhin rigs dang nges tshig ci ltar lags/ khyed kyis bka' stsol bdag cag nyan par 'tshal// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rjes pad+ma'i gdan las bzhengs te bka' stsal
pa/ 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol du/ bcud ni bskal pa'i rnam pa'i grangs kyis 'grub// lus med shes pa chang sbrang bzhin du gnas// 'jig chags gnyis kyis stongs nas bskal pa las// dus
gcig tsha grang rlung 'thabs 'bras bur smin/ de min spyi mthun las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// lus la blta bas mi ngoms spyan gsum ma// mche gtsigs gcong rong chags pa'i gdung ba g.yos// phyag gis b+ha ga

bsgrad pa rlung gis bskyod// 'byung bzhi 'dus pa rgyu dang rkyen du 'phrad// 'gro drug ma bu til gang bzhin du smin// de min 'byung ba 'dus pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// yum chen mo las brdzus te skyes pa lnga// dbugs

dang drod dang khrag dang sha rus las// rlung gi rgyal mo 'jig rten 'degs byed ma// drod kyi rgyal mo 'jig rten sreg byed ma// rlan gyi rgyal mo 'jig rten sdud byed ma// sa yi rgyal mos 'jig rten rten par

byed// 'jig rten kun khyab rgyu ba'i rang bzhin las// spyi mthun srid pa chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro de rnams nus pa'i mthu skyes pas// 'od kyis so so'i 'jig rten gang bar gyur// so so'i nus
mthus 'jig rten dbang du 'dod// 'byung ba mi mthun rigs lnga'i ngo bo las// sprul pa'i yum gyis 'byung ba cha snyoms te// 'jig rten rgyu ba'i rang bzhin las// srid pa cha snyoms byed mkhan mkha' 'gro
ma// gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams kyis// so so rang gi lus las mkha' 'gro ma// rang lus 'dzin pa rtsi thog bzhin du skyes// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med mkha' 'gro ma// zhal dang mig

dang rna ba las ni skyes// ma rgyud thams cad mngal nas rab tu skyes// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dbugs las skyes// bgegs rigs stong phrag drug cu brdzus las skyes// mkha' 'gro ma de rnams kyi lus la

yang// skyes pa mang zhing srid pa 'di lta ste// lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro ma// srin po sha za gshin rje mkha' 'gro ma// dri za mkha' lding mi'am ci mkha' 'gro ma// lho 'phye drang srong srog gi
mkha' 'gro ma// bdud dang dur khrod mi yi mkha' 'gro ma// byol song yi dwags dmyal ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// las dang rab tu dmyal ba la sogs te// mkha' 'gro ma rigs thams cad gcig la gcig/ yid du

mi 'ong khro zhing 'khrug pa ni// spyi mthun so so'i las kyi dbang nyid kyis// nying sha nying khrag pags pa srog la spyod// 'jigs skrag 'dod pa la sogs tha dad pas// la la 'bros la 'deg cing 'tshol ba
dang// gab gsod sha za khrag 'thung 'o dod 'bod// mi bzod ngu ba mgo lus thang la rdeb// rtsal dang ldan pa rgod cing thal mo rdeb// mi mthun mgo brnyan lus ni sna tshogs te// mi lus bya gshog
mig gsum sder mo can// mche ba rwa can lus gcig mgo mang dang// mdzes 'od 'bar ba mi sdug sna tshogs rnams// sdug bsngal mang po'i tshogs kyis gdungs pa la// thabs las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro
ma chen gcig/ gzhan las 'phags shing mthu rtsal che ba yis// mi bzod sdug bsngal skad cig bder mdzad pas// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro 'dus te phyogs gcig nas// spyi mthun las kyi mkha' 'gro ma nyid
la// zhu ba'i tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to/ kha dog dbyibs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// bdag cag las dang rgyu 'bras ni// gang yin rigs dang rigs kyi gtso mo gang// yul dang las dang zas dang skal ba
gang// zhes gsol to// yum chen mo de shin tu chags pas gdung ba'i sems g.yos par gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu sbyor ba'i grogs gcig bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu stag gi lo'i dpyid zla ra ba la/ 'jig rten
yum gcig ming dgu'i rmi lam du/ mi nag lus bongs ri rab tsam// dbu gsum mdzes pa'i phyag drug gshog par ldan// 'jigs pa'i nga ros lag pa sar brdabs pas// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams brgyal

zhing snying khrag skyugs// sangs rgyas mgo bcad 'jigs pa'i rgyan mnga' bas// bde ba'i chags pa mngon gsum spyad pa rmis// lhums pa der gnas de phyi de lo dus su// srin po lcam dral gnyis skyes par gyur

te/ dral po rmi lam dang ni mthun par skyes// de nas ra la ra la ru lu ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo'i sgra byung bas/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad shing lo rlung gis bdas pa bzhin du 'dus te dbang phyug chen po lcam dral bdag cag

gi gtso bo gtso mo mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs thams cad kyis/ dgung dang nam phyed tho rangs snga dro ru// nyi khri chig stong res mchod pa byed do// bdud kyi rgyal po

des// trang ma trang ru trang/ sarba DAk+ki A kaD+D+ha ya A kaD+D+ha ya/ nirma Na a bra me ya/ a dzi te na karma sa ru/ sa mA dza sa mA dza/ zhes brjod pas/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad srog rang dbang med par 'dus te/ mchod

nas srog gi snying po phul ba/ ma rag sha kha mun dza/ trag rak+sha snying kha rag ma badzra dun ting/ rag mo yag mo ma ra Na b+h+yo// DAk+ki nI de wa a su ra nA ga yag sha rag sha bI tsa sha d+h+riSh+Tha raSh+ta ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra ga

ag ni ba ru Na/ ru tra ba ti/ gan+d+har+b+ha tir+ya ka pre ta ka na raka karma na ra ka sarba DAk+ki bA ta la bA la ba si/ sarba DAk+ki a nan ta ri ba tsa ra/ sarba DAk+ki ni b+h+yo b+hu ma ta b+h+yo b+h+yo ru ru/ zhes phul bas/ he ru ka che ba'i nga
rgyal skyes te/ 'jig rten du ha ha hi hi zhes brjod pas/ snod bcud thams cad g.yo zhing 'khrugs te/ 'og min gyi gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ldeg ldeg 'gul

lo// bde gshegs thugs khros brdas mtshon bka' bgros mdzad// gdul thabs rnam gnyis bka' mthun stangs gcod pas// srid ma'i rgyal mo kro tI shwa rIs gzigs// trang ma trang ru trang A' gad+d+ha ya A gang+d+ha ya/

ta thA ya ta thA ya/ ra la ra la b+h+yo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// sarba DAk+kI ru tra// kro ta kro tI ru ti/ sa ma ban daM ku ru zhes brjod pas/ bdud dang khro bo khro mo yab yum gyi tshogs thams cad sil gyis lhags par gyur to// yum

chen mo de'i zhal nas 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po/ 'og min gyi gnas na dpal chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po ye shes kyi rtsal dang ldan pa zhig yod/ 'khor mkha' 'gro ma dang khro bo thams cad kyis phyogs

mtshams chod cig par bsgo'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab tu bred par gyur/ shin tu sngangs pas rang gi gnas su phyin nas/ keng rus thod mkhar gsum thog brtsigs pa'i steng// b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas dur khrod
'jigs pas brgyan// rta babs mu khyud lcags ri me 'obs byas// rnag khrag bshang gci klad pa dri chen dang// bam rul zag pa mnam zhing dku ba dang// mi gtsang rnam pa sna tshogs pas bskor ro// phyi rim
dur khrod ma brgyad bka' nyan dang// rim pas 'jigs byed khro bo bcu yis bskor// srid pa'i phur bu dpag chen mda' bzhin 'phen// de yi phyi rim dbang phyug ma yis bskor// gzhan yang ral pa can gyi
tshogs rnams dang// mche ba gshog pa nu ma sder mo can// mgo brnyan ma tshogs sna tshogs pas bskor ro// dpal chen po dang nor gyis dogs pas ni// brda' ni rnam drug byed cing 'bod pa ste// spyugs la

g.yab mo thal mo se gol dang// rkun po glu ste so sos go bar byas// 'ja' dang 'brug glog stong gi sgra 'byin zhing// 'bru dang rin chen sna tshogs sman dang chu// 'gro drug mkha' 'gro sha rus za ba rnams/ kha nas
nad kyi rnam pa sna tshogs skyugs// kun nas bskor te btsan par byas pa yis// bdud kyi sems de rab tu der gnas pas// ma trang ru tras dpal la skur pa btab// dpal chen bya ba med par nges pa
las// srid pa'i rgyal mos btses pa 'dra zer ro// 'og min gnas nas dpal gyis dgongs pa mdzad// ci phyir nyon mongs de dang sems can rnams// thugs rje'i zhing du gyur pas sgrol du gshegs// mthong
ba'i logs su lha yi gzhal yas sprul// srin po'i rnam shes mdzes shing 'dzin par byas// srin po chags skyas 'khor la gdams ngag byas// dpal gyi srin po'i lus kyis gnas su phyin// sna tshogs gzugs su
'dug pa'i 'khor rnams ni// rwa gzengs mig bgrad mche gtsigs sder mo gdengs// 'jigs pa'i skad kyis co long chen po 'byin/ kha nas khrag dang nad skyugs 'di skad zer// gtso bo rje bo
lags sam gsang brda' ston// dpal gyis so so'i brda' rnams nges bstan pas// dngos nyid yin par mthong ste mchod pa phul// gzhal yas nang du byon te kha T+wAM gdengs// srin mo kro tI shwa rI cir gyis

bzung// bsgral bar byas nas rang rtags snying po phul// bka' la btags te kha T+wAM spu gri byin// ma mo'i gtso mo sbyor ba'i yum du byas// dpal gyi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas yul las// sprul pa kau rI seng ha khro
mo drag po'i tshogs// dur khrod pho nya phyogs skyong la sogs kun// rang rang 'dra ba'i sprul pa mang pos btul// kun gyis mgrin gcig dpal la 'di skad zhus// bdud kyi bdud rje thugs rje'i bdag po
khyod// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa 'bangs su mchi// zhes srog gi snying po phul nas/ tha tshig blangs te dkyil 'khor bran la gnas par byas so// de yi 'khor rnams sngar 'dus gzhal yas med// srin po
gzhal yas med pas sdangs par gyur// sangs rgyas cho 'phrul yin par rab tu shes// rang gi gnas su rgyug pas dpal dang 'phrad// mthong thos 'jigs pa chen po rab tu skyes// dpal gyi tsham rngams brtul

zhugs spyod pa mdzad// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i phyag rgya bzhi yis bzung// sgrol sngags kha T+wAM srin po'i snying gar brgyab// mgo bo lho nub rkang pa byang shar bstan// sha rus khrag la rol pa chen por mdzad// ma mo mkha'

'gro'i tshogs kyang rol du bcug/ dbang po rnam lnga ye shes khrag 'thung rdzas/ khog par zhugs nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs// bdud sde ldang ba med

par bya ba'i phyir// gnas chen brgyad du mchod rten re re brtsig/ dur khrod ma brgyad bka' nyan bcas pas bsrung// rigs lnga ye shes chos dang rang bzhin las las skyes// rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha'

'gro yang// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// re re la'ang bzhi bzhi bcu drug ye shes mnga'// dur khrod kau rI seng ha bcu drug grub pa'i rigs// a phyi sham sham man chad sman mo'i rigs// nges

pa'i tshig ni rgyu las ma byung rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// thugs rje nyi ma lta bur yongs la khyab// don dam skye med 'khor ba'i bdud las rgyal// rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ye shes ma ru bstan// srid pa nyon mongs
rgyu mthun srin po'i 'khor// chags pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs spyad// sngon spyad nyon mongs zad pas dpal chen gzhal yang mthong// dgos don ci 'dod sgrubs pas grub pa mo// dman pa'i sems
kyis chos nyid don mi rtog/ nyon mongs stug pos bde gshegs zhal ma thong// bdag tu rtog pas 'khor ba dug gsum rgyas// rang bzhin mthu bltas srid pa'i sman mor grags// las kyi mkha'

'gro ma chen mo'i rgyud las/ skye rgyud gyi gleng gzhi rigs dang nges tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o//// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya
chen po mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// mthu chen rdzu 'phrul 'gro skyabs thugs rje can// 'jig rten dbang chen mkha' 'gro 'di dag rnams// sgrub thabs gnas dang dam rdzas bkol thabs rnams// 'gro
rnams gnyis po don phyir bdag gis zhu// kun mkhyen rig pa'i rtsal chen khyod kyis gsung// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di lta ste/ gtso mo bsgrub pa'i rim pa bsdus pa'i don// gzhan

gsal med pas bdag gis 'dir bshad bya// skye med chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu las// dbang chen 'byung ba yum gyi ngo bor brtsegs// keng rus ri rab b+han d+ha'i gzhal yas khang// nang du tsakra rtsibs bzhi
ro yi steng// man ngag rim pas mkha' 'gro lnga ru bskyed/ kha dog dbyibs ni rigs dang mthun pa las// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dur khrod rgyan// dbus shar lho phyogs phyag g.yas ka pA la// nub

byang gnyis g.yas tsit+ta thod pa bsnams// g.yang gzhi sbrul zhags dgra s+t+wa zhags pa thod// g.yon pa'i phyag ni lnga ste thegs par bsam// rtse gcig dbang po gang dang gang spyod yul// bsgom na de dang de yi rang

bzhin 'gro// mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor pas mi bya// chos can med phyir chos nyid yod ma yin// brag cha'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'i chos 'di bstan// bsam pa po med bsam pa'i chos kyang med// sngags dang

lha med spros med rang bzhin las// 'khrul rtog spros pa'i rang bzhin ci yang snang// ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i lung gsum las// gnas dang rgyu rtsis dus tshod gtsug lag rgyud// mthu 'phrog las bcol

dngos grub mngon bkol rgyud// sgrub rdzas gsang tshig thugs kyi sgrom bu'i rgyud// de gsum 'dus pa'i don ni 'di lta ste// rigs dang grangs dang don kyi ngo bo ste// las yul rgyu srang 'dun pa gar rgyu'i

phyogs// dam rdzas sngags las dus tshod myur 'grub thabs// rdzu 'phrul sgrib shing 'khrugs nyams chad la sogs// don sngags lan cig phyir ni rtsis rgyud yin// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ lha'i dbang pos yang
'di skad ces gsol to// kun mkhyen don rnams 'byed pa shes rab bdag/ 'gro drug bdag cag rmongs pa'i don slad du// bsdus don re re nas ni bshad par zhu// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsdus don re re la yang gnyis gnyis te// bka' dang rang bzhin gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes chos las skye ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje mkha' 'gro shugs kyi mkha' 'gro
ma// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// rang bzhin rigs las tha dad gcig gnas pa// spyir ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi 'gro// de gsum dag tu thams cad 'dus pa yin// de las las
kyi mkha' 'gro bzhi yod de// gral rgyug dgon pa gnas 'khyar chad pas phog/ gral rgyug bcu drug dgon pa dur khrod gnas// gnas 'khyar chad pas phog pa 'di 'dra ste// gnas 'khyar 'gro ba rigs drug yod
pa las// mi dang byol song gnyis la brtag pa ni// skra dang dpral ba mig gnyis dang// sen mo lus kyi dri ma mo mtshan rtags// rmen sgrub 'khyil pa kha brag che// mgo mjug log dang lcags kyu bshul ba

rnams// 'di dag mi la yod de nus mthu che// mkha' lding 'khor ba bya yi mkha' 'gro ma// smra nyan kha dog ston pa khyi yi mkha' 'gro ma// mthong mang sgra snyan 'byin pa sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// bying rmugs mi

dga' 'phyo zhing 'gro snying 'dod// 'di dag nyams len bar chod mkha' 'gro ma// chad pas phog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// spyang gdong mig rtsa dmar la mchi ris yod// skad chung co long gzhan rnams sngangs

par nus// dred 'dra lus po kham nag yan lag ring// spre'u gzugs kha dmar lce ring bya byed mang// stag 'dra ngo dmar sha khrag dmar la dga'// gzugs chung pha wang mtshan ngan mig rtsa dmar// sen mo khwa
'dra sor mo ring la phra// chad skod rdu du yang tshul mthun 'jug spyod pa byed// dus ma yin pas spel zhing bde ba yod// ngo bo srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can rnams// lus bor shes pa nam mkhar las kyis
'gro// las ni phyi nang gnyis su shes par bya// byi li las la g.yel ba bzhi yod de// srid pa chags 'jig bskal pa dang po'i las// nam zla dus bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi las// dgun 'khyags dpyid 'ju dbyar

skye ston smin no// 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi las rnams la// sra byed sa ste rlan byed chu// tsha byed me la g.yo byed rlung// nang gi las la dbye ba gnyis yod de// skye bar byed dang 'chi bar byed// skyer mi ster dang

mod la skye// mod la 'chi dang mchir mi ster// sa g.yos 'gul dang sa rdol thog ser dang// skar mda' ko rdung la sogs rang bzhin las// yul ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro sha sar gnas// shugs kyi mkha' 'gro khrag
dang chu la gnas// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro drod dang me la gnas// las kyi mkha' 'gro dbugs dang rlung la gnas// yum chen brgyad na 'bum sde re re gnas// pho nya nag mo byang shar mtshams na
gnas// 'dzam bu gling na nyi khri chig stong gnas// ri nag phog chad mtshe'u bdun na yod// bdud kyi rigs rnams de lta bu la gnas// ri mdog dmar po sha sho bzhin mi sdug/ srin po'i rigs kyi

mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i sa// sa gzhi tsha sgor dmyal ba'i chu khol ba// las kyi gshin rje la sogs gnas pa'i sa// chu srin kha 'dra shing gcig chu sna 'thab// der ni gnod sbyin drag po gnas pa'i sa// shing

rigs chu mig mang po yod pa ni// klu rigs mang po de la gnas pa'i sa// ri rtse thang dmar shing rigs 'ga' skyes pa// gdug pa klu rigs gdol pa gnas pa'i sa// de'u mkhar rnying rgyal po gnas pa'i sa// ri

brag sa ni mi 'dra mtshan ma can// btsan btsun dmu bdud skya rengs gnas pa'i sa// dben sa re'u rul dgon shul dang// sa phug ri phug rnying pa dang// lam mdo chu gling tshugs pa dang// grog po gting zab

dur khrod dag/ sman mo nag mo gnas pa'i sa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang sa// shugs kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang chu// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang me// las kyi mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyu srang

rlung// dgun zla gsum la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu// dpyid zla gsum la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// dbyar zla gsum la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu// ston zla gsum la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// re re la yang rgyu rtsis

bzhi bzhi ste// gcig nas bdun du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu// dgu nas bcu bzhi shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// bcu drug nyi shu gnyis su chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu// nyer gsum dgu la thub pa las kyi mkha' 'gro

rgyu// de bzhin kun la so sor sbyar bar bya// srod dang snga dro rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu// dros chen dros yol shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// nyin mtshan phyed yol chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu// dgongs dang tho rangs las kyi

mkha' 'gro rgyu// nya stong brgyad la kun ka khrugs re rgyu// ting 'dzin drod nyul nyi shu dgu la rgyu// de nyid rnal 'byor yum ni mtshan mo rgyu// tshogs kyi phud nyul nyin mo rgyu// dgon pa'i mkha' 'gro kun tu rgyu// nam

langs nyi nub nyi ma rgyu// rtse srod bdun sros zla ba rgyu// sngo dro srod la dmag dpon rgyu// nying dgung nam dgung lhag pa rgyu// gung gnyis yol ba phur bu rgyu// snur dang nam chung pa sangs rgyu// nub ka tho rangs spen

pa rgyu/ khyab 'jug rgyu ba 'di lta ste// lo 'jug zla 'jug yang 'jug zung 'jug bzhi// glang lug 'brug khyi bzhi yi dbyar dgun 'bring// bco brgyad nyi shu dgu la nam phyed rgyu// byi phag gnyis kyi dpyid dbyar

'bring po la// bcu bzhi nyi shu drug gi nyi rtse la// rta sbrul gnyis kyi ston dpyid ra ba yi// yar ngo bcu gsum nyi ma smyur na rgyu// bya sprel gnyis kyi dgun dpyid ra ba la// mar ngo nyi shu dgu yi nyin phyed na// stag

yos gnyis kyi dbyar dgun tha chung la// mar ngo bco brgyad nyi ma phyed na rgyu// bcu gnyis re re'i ngos la brgyad rgyu ste// bzhi brgyad bcu gcig bco lnga bco brgyad dang// nyi shu gnyis te lnga dang

dgu rnams kyi// srod dang nyi dros nam 'jing nyin phyed dang// nam phyed nyin phyed tho rangs nyi ma myur// rim gyi nub nas shar rgyu lho nas byang// skor thabs de bzhin phyogs mtshams khyab par rgyu// dpyid ra

dbyar 'bring ston zla tha chung gi/ tshes gcig bco brgyad bcu bdun gsum la rgyu// dbyar ra ston 'bring dgun zla tha chung gi/ tshes lnga bcu bdun nyi shu gsum la rgyu// dgongs dang tho rangs bya zer tsam na

rgyu// nam gung nyin gung gnyis kyi yol nas rgyu// nam gyi srod dang nyi ma dros nas rgyu// nyi ma rtse shar mun sros tsam nas rgyu// grib chung srod kyi bar du thams cad rgyu// skya rengs shar nas thun gyi klu rigs

rgyu// las kyi mkha' 'gro nam langs yos bu rgyu// rtse shar 'brug rgyu sha ra da sab sbrul// dros na rta rgyu phyed na lug/ myur na spre'u dgong mo bya// srod la khyi rgyu 'jing la phag/ gung la byi ba nam chung glang// tho rangs
gshed po stag gi dus// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi 'dun sa ni// dur khrod brgyad dang ston pa'i zhabs kyis bcags// bya rgod ri dang grub pa thob pa'i sa// dur khrod la sogs mkha' 'gro 'dun sa ni// dbyar
gsum gangs dkar rtse la 'du// ston gsum spang snar gong du 'du// dgun gsum dgon dmar thang la 'du// dpyid gsum chu chu bo'i gzhung yang 'dus slai la 'du// tha chung bzhi la 'dun thag gcod// dbyar

zla tha chung stangs kha klu yis gcod// ston zla tha chung stangs kha sa bdag gcod// dgun zla tha chung stangs kha ma mos gcod// ston zla tha chung stangs kha btsan la 'dor// mkha' 'gro'i rigs kyi rgyu phyogs ni// rdo

rje mkha' 'gro shar nas nub tu rgyu// shugs kyi mkha' 'gro lho nas byang du rgyu// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro nub nas shar du rgyu// las kyi mkha' 'gro byang nas lho ru rgyu// mkha' 'gro mgo brnyan bcu gnyis rgyu phyogs

ni// dgun ra phag gi mgo can lho ru rgyu// 'bring po byi ba'i mgo can nub tu rgyu// tha chung glang gi mgo can byang du rgyu// dpyid ra stag gi mgo can shar du rgyu// 'bring po yos bu'i mgo can lho ru rgyu// tha chung

'brug gi mgo can nub tu rgyu// dbyar ra sbrul gyi mgo can byang du rgyu// 'bring po rta yi mgo can shar du rgyu// tha chung lug gi mgo can lho ru rgyu// ston ra spre'u'i mgo can nub tu rgyu// 'bring po bya yi mgo can gong

bzhin rgyu// tha chung khyi yi mgo can shar du rgyu// btsan btsun dmu bdud gangs gsum rtsibs la rgyu// ma yams sman gsum tha chung rtsibs la rgyu// sa bdag klu srin sa yi sbug la rgyu// thams cad dus gcig rgyu ba
'di lta ste// byi rta dpyid 'bring po'i bco lnga las// glang lug dpyid ston tha chung nyi shu gnyis// stag sprel dbyar dgun ra ba'i tshes brgyad la// bya yos dbyar dgun 'bring po'i bco lnga la/ khyi

'brug dbyar dgun tha yi nyi shu gnyis// phag sbrul ston dpyid ra ba'i tshes brgyad la// dus bzhi zla ba rab 'bring tha chung la// ra ba'i tshes drug 'bring po'i nya// tha chung bzhi yi nyi shu drug/ bar snang ri rtse sa yi

mtshams// ris med thams cad rgyu ba yin// rdzas ni bsgrub rdzas bskrad rdzas te// a mr-i ta ste sha lnga chen po lnga// bdug spos rin chen me tog sna tshogs dang// 'bru dang shing thog gcan zan gdug pa'i sha/ skyur
dang 'o ma mkhris pa tsha sman dang// g.yu rgod gser sha slub bu sha yi rigs// bskrad pa btsan btsun dmu bdud ma yams sman// sa bdag klu srin bgegs chen phal pa rnams// gsur chen 'gar sta'i khu

bas thabs kyis bskrad// ra dang ku ku ra yi khu bas bskrad// ma gi rtsi dang bse yi shing gis bskrad// gang bsrung ba la sbyar ba'i gu gul byugs// las dang dus su 'dzom pa ni// las kyi dbang gis dus su

'dzom pa dang// thabs dang man ngag shes pas 'dzom pa'o// myur du 'grub pa 'di lta ste// man ngag thabs kyis myur du 'grub pa dang// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pa'o// dus tshod rnams ni gong du
bstan pa'o// rdzu'aphrul la yang rnam pa gsum yod de// rang bzhin byin rlab thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul te// rang bzhin gcig la sna tshogs sprul pa'o// byin rlabs me 'bar dud pa 'thul ba'o// thabs kyi rdzu

'phrul thun mong dngos grub rnams// sgrib shing nyid dang rdzu ba dang// rdzu ba lha yi nga rgyal lo// ma mo'i sgrib shing dur khrod rdzas// kyung ka khu byug dang ru bdud kyi shing// wa khrag byang chub sems ni btsan rigs

shing/ khwa sgrom ma gi'i rtsi ni klu yi shing// 'ug pa srin bya'i dang ru the'u rang shing// de rnams gcig tu sbyar na mi la sgribs// 'khrugs pa'i rtags ni drug yod de// nyi ma zla ba 'chi ba dang// dus min pa yi rlung

byung dang// sgra dang 'od dang sa 'gul drug/ 'di rnams mkha' 'gro 'khrugs na 'byung// mi 'dod 'bras bu byung na nyams pa'i rtags// bcol ba dus su med na chad pa'i rtags// de byung 'khrugs na zhing gis
bcos// nyams pa rnams ni tshogs kyis bskang// chad pa thams cad mdos kyis bzlog/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po las sgrub pa'i thabs don gyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal chen
bka' yi bsdus don ni// yul dang rgyu srang rigs dang dus tshod sngags// brda' dang las tshogs blta ba bstan pa'o// rnal 'byor gnyis med dpal dang mnyam pa yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa yul zhes
bya'o// byang chub sems la rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu// rtsa la shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// drod la chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu// dbugs la las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor 'dun sa

yin// rigs ni mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro las kyi mkha' 'gro ma gsum// dpal chen bka' yi dus tshod ni// gang la mos pa'i rgyu dus gang du bstan// dpal chen bka' yi sngags ni 'di lta ste// oM shrI badzra shrI

he ru ka hUM phaT/ sarba ma hA DAk+ki nI/ dz+wa la sa ma ba ra hUM/ yo gi nI/ ma hA kro d+ha kro d+hI sar+b+ba duSh+tAn/ dz+wa ya ni bya a mU ka s+ye/ sarbA pA pam karma A ba ra NA nAn shIn+taM ku ru/ kA ya tsit+tan ta byi pa tsa le ba pa tsa le ba/ pe le

ba pe le ba/ A kar sha ya A kar sha ya/ duSh+ta big+h+nAn/ sarbA gra ha big+h+nAn/ sarba dzra rA nAn/ bya d+hi pi sha dur ni mit+ta sarba a maM ga yA nAn/ a ra ma raSh+ta gats+tsha Sh+ta/ gats+tsha pi rA yan ti/ sarba gra ha b+h+yi ga tsit+ta rak+ta A kar

sha ya A kar sha ya/ dA ra ya dA ra ya/ A gad ta ya A gad ta ya/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ badzra sr-iM kha le na ba na bad ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ku ru pa shang ku ru/ badzra mud ka re Na dan te/ nAng+d+ha ya nAng+d+ha ya/ ha na ha na b+h+yi rtsi/

ra[x] ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ khA da khA da/ pha d+ha ya pha d+ha ya/ ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ da ha na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ts+tshin+d+ha ya ts+tshin+d+ha ya/ b+hISh+maM ku ru pa ra bid d+h+wan tshe d+ha ya mAn ta krit+ya ni ka kho ra ni na/ pra yo ga da sha pa lA nAn/ ba la me

la ka sarba bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarbA de tsa nan bya pa ta ya/ u ts+tsha Ta ta ya/ badzra he he ru ru ka sarbA DAk+ki yo gI/ a mu ka s+ya/ puN+yai s+ya/ dz+nyA na s+ya/ shrI bA na te dza s+ya/ A yu She ba la s+ya/ sarba sam b+ho ga puSh+tiM ku ru/ yo gi ma hA sA

d+ha ka rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ brda' ni lus ngag yid de dkrug pa'o// las kyi tshogs ni gnyis 'byung ste// bud med gsad dang dus las zlog par byed// dbang dang dgug pa bsad pa bskrad// tshe srung ba dang bgegs

bzlog pa'o// rnal 'byor lha dang gnyis med pas// gnas dang 'dun sar bsnyen pa la sogs bya// drod tshad yod pas rgyu srang sa ru gsad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyu na dbang du bya// las kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu na dgug

par bya// chags pa'i mkha' 'gro rgyu na gsad par bya// shugs kyi mkha' 'gro rgyu na bskrad par bya// de bzhin dus rnams gang la bab pa'i tshe// rang rang sngags kyis mjug la gdags pa ni// dbang la/ ba shaM

ku ru shr-id kha le na ban+d+ha ya/ dgug pa la// A kar sha ya/ A kar sha ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bsad pa la/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khA da khA da/ bskrad pa la/ u tsh+tsha na ya a tra ma ti di sha gats+tsha gats+tsha// sngags rnams mgo 'jug

A+oM phaT gdags par bya// tshe srung bgegs bzlog 'dod pas gtor ma btang// gang la ster ba de yi sngags mjug la// a mu ka s+ye ka ya tsit+ta/ pu N+ya s+ya dz+nyA na s+ya/ shri mAn te dza s+ya/ A yu She ba la s+ya/ rak+sha rak+sha/
ka re Na karma ku ru zhes brjod pa'o// lha yi dbang po 'di lta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' mkha' 'gro nyid 'gyur te// bud med bde ba'i stobs kyis sdig pa 'joms// phyogs bcu'i mkha' la gshegs

pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// mtshan nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba las// sgyu ma lta bur 'phrul ba mdzad// kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa 'di// mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa// 'jig rten 'khrul pa zlog bar snang// snang ba de la

rang bzhin med// sems kyi rang bzhin dngos ma grub// dngos po'i ro ni kun dang bral// blo dang ldan pas mkha' ltar bsgom// smig sgyu rmi lam lta bur ni// mkhas pas rang rig rtsal gyis ni// sbyor ba'i mtha'
drug bsam gtan bya'o// dang po gleng gzhi'i gnas rgyu dang// phyag rgya sngags dang bsam gtan dang// de bzhin la sogs cho ga'i thabs// de bzhin 'dod pa'i bstan bya rnams// lha khyod la ni ngas bstan

to// gang 'di 'chang ngam 'dzin pa la// 'jig rten pas kyang nye byed de// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis srung bar byed// ces bka' stsal to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi stan las langs te/ lha ma srin sde
brgyad dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'gu ste/ thams cad kyis mchod pa chen pos mchod de/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad du bstod do// e ma ho// mthu chen kun las khyad du
'phags// thugs rje drag pos gdug pa 'joms mdzad lha// ljags ser spyan bgrad mche gtsigs pad+ma'i gdan// thugs rtags rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la bstod// ces bstod nas/ de dag thams cad rang gi

gnas su 'khod par 'gyur ro// las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn ting gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsA lce bkra shis kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////
